title: Mỹ, Nga lên tiếng về “màn tranh cãi” lịch sử tại Nhà Trắng
content: Cố vấn An ninh Quốc gia Mỹ Mike Waltz nói với đài Fox News : "Chúng tôi họp ngay sau cuộc trao đổi đó, sau khi báo chí được yêu cầu rời đi. Chúng tôi nhất trí đưa ra lời khuyên cho Tổng thống Trump rằng sau màn đấu khẩu như vậy mọi thứ khó có thể tiến triển, bất cứ đàm phán thêm nào vào thời điểm này sẽ chỉ đi lùi mà thôi". Ông Waltz nhấn mạnh các cuộc đàm phán hiệu quả và thỏa thuận khoáng sản sẽ là "khoảnh khắc tích cực cho Ukraine". Ông Waltz nói thêm: "Tôi nghĩ điều khiến tổng thống (ông Donald Trump) thất vọng và thành thật mà nói là tức giận, là không rõ ông Zelensky (Tổng thống Ukraine Vladimir Zelensky) có thực sự muốn dừng xung đột hay không". Cố vấn An ninh Quốc gia Mỹ Mike Waltz. Ảnh: Fox News Cố vấn an ninh quốc gia Mỹ cũng cho biết sau cuộc tranh luận, phái viên Ukraine tại Washington và các trợ lý của ông Zelensky "gần như khóc", đề nghị tiếp tục cuộc đàm phán nhưng ông Zelensky không ngừng tranh luận "vì ông đã quen với sự ủng hộ vô điều kiện của Washington". "Đó là những gì ông ấy đã nghe từ ông Biden trong nhiều năm. Ông ấy không nhận ra đây là một tổng thống mới và chúng tôi quyết tâm thực hiện cách tiếp cận mới hướng tới hòa bình" - ông Waltz nêu rõ. Trong khi lưu ý rằng...

title: Delhi govt introduces new rules, admission in schools for THESE categories will be done through...
creator: Vaishali Shastri
content: Now, admissions in Delhi schools will be done under new procedures for categories related to EWS (Economically Weaker Section), DG (Disadvantaged Group DG admissions), and CWSN (Children with Special Needs). The Directorate of Education, Delhi government, has issued a circular in this regard (DOE Guidelines for EWS). Schools that do not follow the new procedure have been warned of action. The Delhi government has directed all school heads to ensure that admissions for students under the categories of Economically Weaker Section (EWS), Disadvantaged Group (DG), and Children with Special Needs (CWSN) are conducted solely through a computerized draw. New admission guidelines In a circular issued on February 27, the Directorate of Education stated that the admission process for the EWS, DG, and CWSN categories in private, non-aided, recognized schools for entry-level classes (Nursery, KG, and Class 1) should be conducted through a computerized draw. It emphasized that the entire admission process should be fully computerized, leaving no scope for any human intervention at any stage. Delhi govt warns against violating new admission rules in schools The circular also issued a warning against individuals or institutions making false claims of influencing or guaranteeing admissions under the relevant categories. It stated that the public is being informed that such claims are misleading. People are advised to avoid engaging with such illegal entities. The Directorate of Education...

title: 2000년대 장거리 무료 통화 ‘추억의 서비스’ 스카이프, 5월 역사 속으로
creator: 최민지 기자 ming@kyunghyang.com
content: 2000년대 무료 통화 서비스로 세계적인 인기를 끌었던 스카이프(Skype)가 오는 5월 역사 속으로 사라진다. 마이크로소프트(MS)는 스카이프 서비스를 5월5일부로 종료한다고 지난달 28일(현지시간) 밝혔다. 서비스가 시작된 지 22년 만이다. 스카이프는 2003년 에스토니아에서 개발된 인터넷 전화 및 채팅 서비스다. 비싼 국제전화 대신 무료로 통화를 할 수 있어 큰 주목을 받았다. 해외 여행객이나 유학생들에게는 필수품으로 통했다. 전성기인 2010년대 초반까지 전 세계 수억명이 스카이프를 이용했고, 2011년에는 MS가 85억달러를 주고 스카이프를 인수했다. 그러나 2010년대 들어 스카이프의 위상은 추락하기 시작했다. 스마트폰 보급이 확산되고 모바일 메신저가 등장했기 때문이다. 코로나19 팬데믹 기간 화상회의 플랫폼 줌(ZOOM), 구글미트 등 경쟁 제품이 선전하는 동안에도 스카이프는 이용자를 회복하지 못했다. 2020년에는 약 2300만명까지 이용자가 떨어졌다. 마이크로소프트는 이날 스카이프 대신 자사의 화상 회의 플랫폼인 팀즈(Teams)를 이용할 것을 권고했다. 스카이프 이용자들이 팀즈로 쉽게 이동할 수 있도록 지원하겠다고도 밝혔다.

title: ఐటీ కారిడార్‌ బస్సు ప్రయాణికులకు TGSRTC గుడ్‌న్యూస్.. మండు వేసవిలో లగ్జరీగా చల్లని ప్రయాణం
content: తెలంగాణలో భానుడు భగ్గుమంటున్నాడు. ఎండల తీవ్రత విపరీతంగా పెరిగింది. దీంతో నగరంలో ప్రయాణాలు చేసే వారు అల్లాడి పోతున్నారు. చాలా మంది మెట్రో వైపు పరుగులు పెడుతున్నారు. మెట్రో ట్రైన్లలో ఏసీలు అందుబాటులో ఉండంటతో అటువైపుగా మెుగ్గుచూపుతున్నారు. ఇక ఆర్టీసీ బస్సుల్లో తీవ్ర ఉక్కపోత, ఎండ తీవ్రతతో ప్రయాణికులు ఇబ్బందులు పడుతున్నారు. ఈ నేపథ్యంలో ఐటీ కారిడార్‌కు ప్రయాణాలు చేసే వారికి ఆర్టీసీ తీపి కబురు చెప్పింది. మండు వేసవిలో చల్లని ప్రయాణం అందించేందుకు సిద్ధమైంది. హైదరాబాద్ ఐటీ కారిడార్‌లో ప్రయాణికుల కోసం ఆరు గ్రీన్‌ మెట్రో లగ్జరీ ఏసీ బస్సు సేవలను ప్రారంభిస్తున్నట్లు గ్రేటర్‌ ఆర్టీసీ అధికారులు వెల్లడించారు. సోమవారం (మార్చి 3) నుంచి రెండు మార్గాల్లో ఈ సేవలు అందుబాటులోకి రానున్నట్లు చెప్పారు. లింగంపల్లి నుంచి మెహిదీపట్నం (216 W) మార్గంలో నాలుగు బస్సులు నడపనున్నట్టు చెప్పారు. ఈ బస్సులు ఉదయం 6.50 నుంచి రాత్రి 10.10గంటల వరకు ప్రయాణికుల కోసం సేవలు అందిస్తాయని తెలిపారు. లింగంపల్లి నుంచి గర్‌లక్ష్మి (216 G) మార్గంలో గర్‌లక్ష్మి ఇన్ఫోబాన్‌ వరకు రెండు బస్సు ప్రారంభిస్తున్నట్లు అధికారులు వెల్లడించారు. ఉదయం 6.15 నుంచి రాత్రి 11గంటల వరకు ఈ సేవలు అందించనున్నట్లు చెప్పారు. ఇక ఆర్టీసీ బస్సుల్లో చిల్లర సమస్యకు అధికారులు చెక్ పెట్టారు. బస్సుల్లో యూపీఐ పేమెంట్లు విధానాన్ని అందుబాటులోకి తీసుకొచ్చారు. ఏసీ, స్లీపర్ బస్సుల్లో ఈ యూపీఐ పేమెంట్ విధానాన్ని తీసుకొచ్చారు. ప్రస్తుతానికి హైదరాబాద్‌ నగరంలో నడిచే సిటీ బస్సుల్లోనూ ఈ విధానాన్ని అందుబాటులోకి తీసుకురావాలని నిర్ణయించింది. ఆర్టీసీ బస్సుల్లో ప్రయాణికులు, కండక్టర్లు పడుతున్న ఇబ్బందులను పరిగణలోకి తీసుకున్న ఆర్టీసీ యాజమాన్యం.. బస్సుల్లో కూడా యూపీఐ పేమెంట్‌...

title: 太田光 カジノ関与4人「特定してない」
content: お笑いコンビ・爆笑問題の太田光が2日、TBS系「サンデー・ジャポン」に出演。自身が所属する芸能事務所「タイタン」が、事務所内で4人にオンラインカジノ利用歴があると発表したことに言及した。 「タイタン」は1日、オンラインカジノ賭博問題を受け内部調査を行った結果として、4人に利用歴があることが判明したと公表した。公式HPに「ご報告とお詫び」として謝罪文を掲出した。所属タレントら106人に対して内部調査を実施したことを報告し、謝罪した。 さらに同社は、該当者に関しては、すでに仕事上関係性のある関係先に報告、協議を行い、特別更生プログラムの実施や、外部弁護士同伴での任意出頭及び事情説明を行うことを約束していると説明。実名の公表については、弁護士ら専門家と協議し、年齢、ギャンブル依存の程度、悪質性の程度などを考慮し、現時点では公表を差し控えるべきとの判断に至ったとしている。 太田は「いろんな事務所さんの事件が発覚して、スポーツ界とか。でそれを受けて、ウチでも弁護士さんによる内部調査をしたところ、4名。過去に、あやふやな感じでオンラインカジノをしてしまったかもしれないという人が出たということなんですね。その人たちに関しては、更生プログラムというか、警察に出頭を促すということをタイタンとしてはしました。弁護士によるその人たちには更生プログラムを受けてもらう。いわゆる講習みたなことだと思いますね」と説明した。 さらに、名前を非公表としたことにも触れ、「名前を公表するしないに関してはいろんな意見があると思うんですけど。外には公表してないんですけど、実は内部調査は弁護士とマンツーマンでやってまして。内部にも公表してないんです。だから我々も誰っていうのを特定してないんですね。例えば、田中がどうだったとか、私がどうだったとか、それぞれ知らないんですよ。田中は疑ってますけど」と言ってスタジオの笑いを誘っていた。 その一方で「取引先にはちゃんと説明を行って、協議のうえ継続するしないを判断していると。外部の弁護士さんを紹介して、警察に出頭して。警察から法的責任を、この罪に対してどの程度かというのを全部やる」とも明かした。

title: 青学大・太田 喪章つけ激走も途中棄権
東京マラソン波乱 市山翼が日本人首位
content: 「東京マラソン」(2日、東京都庁~東京駅前) 今年9月の東京世界選手権の男子の最終代表選考会を兼ねて行われ、市山翼(28)=サンベルクス=が日本人トップの2時間6分0秒の10位でゴールした。井上大仁(三菱重工)が2時間6分14秒で12位、浦野雄平(富士通)が2時間6分23秒で13位となり、ここまでが世界選手権参加標準記録を突破した。 序盤から歴史的なハイペースが刻まれた中、日本勢では初マラソンに挑んだ青学大のエース、太田蒼生(22)=青学大4年=が唯一食らいつき、中間地点を1時間1分19秒で通過したが、中間点を過ぎて集団から脱落した。その後、日本歴代2位の2時間5分12秒の記録を持つ池田耀平(26)=Kao=とパリ五輪代表の赤崎暁(27)=九電工=がつけていた第2集団が太田を抜き去った。32キロ過ぎに赤崎が脱落し、池田が日本人トップに。しかし、終盤にドラマが。粘り強く先頭を追ってきた市山が40キロで池田をとらえて日本人トップに浮上し、そのままゴールまで駆け抜けた。 ◇世界選手権マラソン代表選考基準 世界陸連(WA)の定める参加標準記録2時間6分30秒の突破者、基準の世界ランクで資格を得た競技者から以下の優先順位により選考される。(1)パリ五輪3位以内の日本人最上位の競技者、(2)JMCシリーズ(23年4月から25年3月の大会)のチャンピオン、(3)海外レースを含む選考対象大会で日本記録を出した選手、(4)選考競技会で参加標準記録を満たした選手で記録、順位、気象条件等を総合的に勘案し選考、(5)参加資格を得た選手から、基準世界ランクの上位競技者より選考 パリ五輪で日本はメダル獲得者いないため、(1)は該当者なし。JMCシリーズは大阪マラソン終了時点でパリ五輪代表の小山直城(ホンダ)がポイントランキングでトップに立っている。 現在の参加標準記録突破者は次の通り 吉田祐也(GMOインターネットグループ)2時間5分16秒(24年福岡国際優勝) 近藤亮太(三菱重工)2時間5分39秒(25年大阪マラソン2位、初マラソン日本最高) 細谷恭平(黒崎播磨)2時間5分58秒(25年大阪マラソン4位) 黒田朝日(青学大)2時間6分5秒(25年大阪マラソン6位、日本学生最高) 菊地駿弥(中国電力)2時間6分6秒(25年大阪マラソン7位) 若林宏樹(青学大)2時間6分7秒(25年別府大分毎日マラソン2位) 平林清澄(国学院大)2時間6分18秒(24年大阪マラソン優勝) 鈴木健吾(富士通)2時間6分18秒(25年大阪マラソン8位) 柏優吾(コニカミノルタ)2時間6分28秒(25年大阪マラソン9位)

title: എസ്എസ്എൽസി: ജില്ലയിൽ 21,144 വിദ്യാർഥികൾ; ഇനി പരീക്ഷച്ചൂട്
content: ഇവിടെ പോസ്റ്റു ചെയ്യുന്ന അഭിപ്രായങ്ങൾ മലയാള മനോരമയുടേതല്ല. അഭിപ്രായങ്ങളുടെ പൂർണ ഉത്തരവാദിത്തം രചയിതാവിനായിരിക്കും. കേന്ദ്ര സർക്കാരിന്റെ ഐടി നയപ്രകാരം വ്യക്തി, സമുദായം, മതം, രാജ്യം എന്നിവയ്ക്കെതിരായി അധിക്ഷേപങ്ങളും അശ്ലീല പദപ്രയോഗങ്ങളും നടത്തുന്നത് ശിക്ഷാർഹമായ കുറ്റമാണ്. ഇത്തരം അഭിപ്രായ പ്രകടനത്തിന് നിയമനടപടി കൈക്കൊള്ളുന്നതാണ്.

title: Government plans to set up national registry for women with gynaec disorders - The New Indian Express
नहीं आई बारात, दूल्हा पक्ष पर दहेज मांगने के आरोप में केस दर्ज
creator: sanam grng
content: जगाधरी, 1 मार्च (हप्र)दहेज में बड़ी कार मांगने व बारात न लाने के आरोप में पुलिस ने आरोपियों के खिलाफ केस दर्ज किया है। पुलिस को को दी शिकायत में व्यक्ति ने बताया कि उसने अपनी 22 वर्षीय बेटी की सगाई गगनदीप सिंह के साथ की थी। 24 फरवरी को बारात आनी थी। उसने बताया कि सगाई में लड़का पक्ष को जेवरात दिए थे। शादी जगाधरी के पाबनी रोड स्थित एक पैलेस में तय की गई थी। शिकायतकर्ता ने पैलेस में लड़का पक्ष के कहे अनुसार सभी प्रकार के इंतजाम किए थे। शादी के दिन वह बारात लेकर नहीं आए। जब लड़के के पिता कुलदीप सिंह को काल की तो उसने कहा कि शादी में बड़ी कार दोगे तभी बारात लेकर आएंगे। उनकी काफी मिन्नतें की, लेकिन उन्होंने बड़ी कार या दस लाख रुपये का इंतजाम करने के लिए कहा। यदि यह इंतजाम नहीं किया तो वह बारात लेकर नहीं आएंगे। बाद में पता लगा कि आरोपी लालची किस्म के लोग हैं। वह पहले भी इसी तरह से दो बार रिश्ते तय करके छोड़ चुके हैं। पुलिस ने केस दर्ज किया है।The post नहीं आई बारात, दूल्हा पक्ष पर दहेज मांगने के आरोप में केस दर्ज appeared first on dainiktribuneonline.com.

title: दिल्लीवासियों को मिलेगी बड़ी राहत, जल्द सड़कों पर दौड़ेंगी 1000 से ज्यादा नई इलेक्ट्रिक बसें
content: दिल्लीवासियों को इस महीने बड़ी राहत मिलने जा रही है। परिवहन मंत्री डॉ. पंकज कुमार सिंह ने कहा कि सरकार एक रिकवरी प्लान पर काम कर रही है और उसका लक्ष्य एक साल के भीतर डीटीसी को घाटे से मुनाफे में बदलना है। उन्होंने कहा कि दिल्ली में पर्याप्त इलेक्ट्रिक बसें नहीं हैं हम और लाएंगे। 1000 से ज़्यादा इलेक्ट्रिक बसें इसी महीने से दौड़ेंगी। छह महीनों में दिखेगा क्या बदलाव?

title: U.S. Federal Workers Hit with 2nd Wave of Emails Demanding Job Details
creator: 桜井
content: Reuters 11:53 JST, March 2, 2025 WASHINGTON (Reuters) – The Trump administration sent out a second round of emails on Friday evening demanding all federal employees summarize their work over the past week after the first effort a week ago fizzled amid a wave of confusing directives. Reuters has confirmed that the emails from the government’s human resources arm, the U.S. Office of Personnel Management, were sent to multiple agencies, asking workers to list five things they accomplished during the week. The move marks a renewed push by billionaire Elon Musk and his Department of Government Efficiency team to assess the performance of government employees as the administration looks to mass layoffs to dramatically trim the federal footprint. “The President has made it clear that this is mandatory for the executive branch,” Musk wrote on X. “Anyone working on classified or other sensitive matters is still required to respond if they receive the email, but can simply reply that their work is sensitive.” Musk attempted a similar tack last week, along with a threat that noncompliant workers could be fired, but he was stymied when some agencies such as the State and Justice Departments told their employees to stick to the chain of command. Ultimately, OPM informed agencies that responding to the emails was voluntary. But Musk, with President Donald Trump’s backing, continued to press for the emails as a means they said to hold workers accountable. Both men suggested that some...

title: Familias peruanas ya pueden acceder al empadronamiento de lotes para obtener título de propiedad gratis durante todo marzo 2025, vía Cofopri
content: Dina Boluarte Papa Francisco Dólar en Perú Alianza Lima vs Sporting Cristal Niño rescatado Loreto San Marcos Senamhi Aeropuerto Jorge Chávez Sunat Donald Trump César Acuña Horóscopo Fonavi Roger Amuruz ÚLTIMAS NOTICIAS POLÍTICA ECONOMÍA SOCIEDAD MUNDO PERÚ DEPORTES ESPECTÁCULOS DATEC DÓLAR ESTADOS UNIDOS CULTURAL Últimas Noticias Cofopri avanza en la entrega de títulos de propiedad en Perú, facilitando el acceso a familias en localidades regularizadas y empadronadas durante todo el mes de marzo 2025. El Organismo de Formalización de la Propiedad Informal ( Cofopri ) continúa con la entrega de títulos de propiedad en localidades donde previamente ha ejecutado el proceso de saneamiento físico legal. Esta medida abarca asentamientos humanos, centros poblados y comunidades tradicionales que han sido regularizados e inscritos en registros públicos. Como parte del procedimiento, se lleva a cabo un empadronamiento que permite identificar a los ocupantes de los terrenos y verificar que cumplan con los criterios establecidos para acceder a la titulación . Este es un beneficio al que miles de familias peruanas pueden acceder durante el mes de marzo de 2025 . Familias peruanas pueden acceder al cronograma de marzo para empadronar sus lotes en Cofopri 2025 Las familias peruanas ya pueden revisar el cronograma oficial del mes de marzo para poder empadronar sus lotes antes de Cofopr i. Solo deben ingresar a la página web y verificar su región . El cronograma...

title: Reading’s three-goal third period sinks Maine Mariners
Cunningham breaks out of slump to lead Pistons past Nets 115-94
creator: Dave Hogg, The Associated Press
content: DETROIT (AP) — Cade Cunningham broke out of a slump by scoring nine of his 15 points in the fourth quarter and the Detroit Pistons pulled away to beat the Brooklyn Nets 115-94 on Saturday night. Cunningham scored a season-worst 11 points Friday in a 134-119 loss to Denver and only had six points through three quarters against the Nets, but had a 3-pointer and two three-point plays. Tobias Harris, Malik Beasley and Jalen Duren all scored 18 points for the Pistons, who had their eight-game winning streak snapped by the Nuggets. Tyrese Martin came off the bench to score 23 points for the Nets, who have lost four straight. Brooklyn's starters were outscored 73-47. The Nets were within six at the start of the fourth, but Cunningham scored six points in a 16-6 run that made it 95-81 with 7:33 left. Takeaways Nets: PG Killian Hayes played the first four years of his career with the Pistons before being waived in February 2024. He signed with the Nets last summer, was waived before the season and rejoined them on a 10-day contract last week. He was booed loudly by a crowd that saw him as a symbol of the 67-219 (.234) record during his time with the team. Pistons: After starting slowly in the loss to Denver, Detroit shot 68.2% (15 for 22) from the floor while outscoring the Nets 39-22 in the first quarter. That included 77.8% (7 for 9) on 3-pointers. Key moment The Pistons led 68-43 at halftime, but collapsed offensively in the third quarter. They shot just 26.3% (5 for 19) from the...

title: Si tengo que venir con los Siervos de la Nación por agua para Guanajuato, lo voy a hacer: Libia Denisse
creator: Eloisa Dominguez
content: La ‘Gobernadora de la Gente’, Libia Dennise García Muñoz Ledo, y la Presidenta de México, Claudia Sheinbaum Pardo, firmaron histórico convenio por más de 6,400 millones de pesos para tecnificar los sistemas de riego del campo guanajuatense. “Si tengo que venir a un evento de los siervos de la nación con la Presidenta, para firmar un acuerdo de agua, lo voy a hacer”, dijo. Este sábado, ambas mandatarias sostuvieron un encuentro en el marco de los Programas Prioritarios del Bienestar en el que se realizó la firma de este convenio con el titular de la Comisión Nacional del Agua (Conagua), Efraín Morales López, y el presidente del Distrito de Riego 011, Agustín Robles Montenegro. “Si como gobernadora tengo que venir a un evento de los siervos de la nación con la Presidenta, para firmar un acuerdo de agua que tanto necesita Guanajuato, lo voy hacer. Yo no vine por aplausos, yo vine a darle resultados a mi gente”, dijo la Gobernadora. García Muñoz Ledo afirmó que en Guanajuato saben reconocer el trabajo conjunto, para que le vaya bien a México y a Guanajuato, necesitamos ir juntos, de manera coordinada. “Hoy hemos tenido una gira de trabajo muy productiva por nuestro Estado, donde se ha hecho patente la colaboración para que a Guanajuato le vaya mejor”, expresó Libia Dennise. Agregó que estos son tiempos de unidad y de trabajar en equipo. “Presidenta, aquí tienes una gobernadora todoterreno por Guanajuato, construyamos juntas el mejor futuro para México y...

title: IND vs NZ: இந்தியா – நியூசிலாந்து போட்டியில் மழை பெய்யுமா? துபாய் வானிலை எப்படி?
creator: CMDoss
content: ரோஹித் சர்மா தலைமையிலான இந்திய அணி இன்று, அதாவது 2025 மார்ச் 2 ஆம் தேதி நடைபெறும் சாம்பியன்ஸ் டிராபியின் கடைசி லீக் போட்டியில் நியூசிலாந்தை எதிர்கொள்ள உள்ளது. இந்தப் போட்டி துபாய் சர்வதேச கிரிக்கெட் மைதானத்தில் நடைபெறும். லீக் சுற்றில் இரு அணிகளும் சிறப்பாக செயல்பட்டு, இரண்டு போட்டிகளிலும் வெற்றி பெற்றன. எனவே, இன்றைய போட்டியில் வெற்றி பெறும் அணி புள்ளிகள் பட்டியலில் முதலிடத்தைப் பிடிக்கும். ஆனால் இந்தப் போட்டிக்கு முன்பு துபாய் ஆடுகளம் எப்படி இருக்கும்? மழையால் போட்டி தடைபடுமா உள்ளிட்ட விவரங்களை பார்க்கலாம்.இந்த ஆடுகளம் யாருக்குப் பயனுள்ளதாக இருக்கும்?இந்தியா மற்றும் நியூசிலாந்து அணிகளுக்கு இடையிலான போட்டி துபாயில் நடைபெறும். துபாய் சர்வதேச மைதான மைதானத்தில் ஏற்கனவே நடைபெற்ற இரண்டு போட்டிகளைக் கருத்தில் கொண்டால், பேட்ஸ்மேன்கள் இங்கு கடுமையான சவாலை எதிர்கொள்வார்கள். வேகப்பந்து வீச்சாளர்களுக்கு ஆரம்பத்திலேயே உதவி கிடைக்கலாம், ஆனால் போட்டி முன்னேறும்போது சுழற்பந்து வீச்சாளர்கள் ஆதிக்கம் செலுத்தக்கூடும். மேலும், இலக்கைத் துரத்துவது அணிக்கு சற்று கடினமாக இருக்கலாம்.Also Read: நியூசிலாந்துக்கு எதிராக மாஸ் காட்டப்போகும் கோலி.. இத்தனை சாதனைகள் முறியடிக்க வாய்ப்பு!வானிலை நிலவரம் எப்படி?உண்மையில், சாம்பியன்ஸ் டிராபியில் இதுவரை 3 லீக் போட்டிகள் மழை காரணமாக ரத்து செய்யப்பட்டுள்ளன. மழை காரணமாக சில போட்டிகள் தடைப்பட்டது. ஆனால் இந்தப் போட்டிகள் பாகிஸ்தானில் நடந்தன. இந்தியாவின் போட்டிகள் துபாயில் நடைபெறுவதால் மழை பெய்ய வாய்ப்பில்லை. இதனால், ரசிகர்கள் எந்த கவலையும் இல்லாமல் போட்டியை ரசிக்கலாம் என எதிர்பார்க்கப்படுகிறது.துபாய் ஒருநாள் போட்டி புள்ளிவிவரங்கள்துபாய் சர்வதேச...

Sự kiên kinh tế thế giới nổi bật tuần qua
content: BNEWS/TTXVN tổng hợp những sự kiện kinh tế thế giới nổi bật tuần qua. Quang cảnh cảng hàng hóa tại Los Angeles, California, Mỹ. Ảnh: THX/TTXVN 1. Ukraine cần 524 tỷ USD để phục hồi và tái thiết sau 3 năm xung đột, theo thông cáo báo chí của Ngân hàng Thế giới, Liên hợp quốc, Ủy ban châu Âu và Chính phủ Ukraine. So với ước tính trước đó là 486 tỷ USD vào năm 2024, con số này đã tăng hơn 7%. Các lĩnh vực chịu ảnh hưởng nặng nề nhất do xung đột bao gồm nhà ở, giao thông, năng lượng, thương mại và giáo dục... 2. Tổng thống Mỹ Donald Trump chính thức xác nhận áp thuế 25% đối với hàng hóa Mexico và Canada, đồng thời áp thuế bổ sung 10% đối với hàng Trung Quốc từ ngày 4/3. Thông báo mới nhất trên được công bố chỉ một ngày sau khi ông Trump để ngỏ khả năng tiếp tục trì hoãn việc áp thuế 25% đối với hàng nhập khẩu từ Mexico và Canada đến ngày 2/4, muộn hơn khoảng một tháng so với thời hạn mà ông tuyên bố hồi đầu tháng Hai. 3. Tỷ phú Elon Musk vẫn giàu nhất thế giới dù mất 52 tỷ USD, theo Chỉ số Tỷ phú của Bloomberg. Ông Musk đang có khối tài sản ròng 380 tỷ USD, nhiều hơn 144 tỷ USD so với người giàu thứ hai thế giới là Giám đốc điều hành Meta, ông Mark Zuckerberg. 4. Thị trường tiền số mất hơn...

title: Travmaya karşı destek almak şart
content: Bolu Kartalkaya’daki Grand Kartal Otel’de 36’sı çocuk 78 kişinin hayatını kaybettiği yangın faciasının üzerinden bugün itibarıyla 40 gün geçti. Yangını yaşayan yetişkinlerde ve çocuklarda "travma sonrası stres bozukluğu" görülebileceğini söyleyen psikologlar, faciadan etkilenen yetişkinlerin ve çocukların yaşadığı psikolojik travmanın takip edilmesi yönünde uyardı. Türkiye Psikiyatri Derneği (TPD) Travma ve Afet Bilimsel Çalışma Birimi üyesi, TPD Kartalkaya Yangını İzleme Kurulu üyesi Profesör Dr. Mehmet Hamid Boztaş, BirGün’e yaptığı açıklamada “Ruhsal açıdan bakılırsa bu kadar büyük can kaybı olması başta yangından yaralı kurtulan, vefat eden, yaralanan yurttaşlarımızın aileleri, yangından yaralanmadan kurtulmuş ancak yangının travmatik görüntülerine maruz kalmış kimseler ile yangına müdahale eden görevliler ve kolluk güçlerinde travmatik etkiler görülmesi beklenir” dedi. Boztaş, çocukların yaşadığı travmanın yakından takip edilmesi gerektiğine dikkat çekerek şöyle devam etti: “Çocuklar yaşlarına ve gelişim dönemlerine bağlı olarak ruhsal travmaya benzer belirtiler gösterir. Ebeveynlerinin tepkisine çocuğun ruhsal özelliklerine bağlı olarak çocuklarda da travmatik stres tepkileri gelişir. Travma esasen kişilerde ‘temel güven duygusunu’ sarsabilir. Güvenlik hissi bozulur, travmanın tekrarı ile yeniden oluyormuş endişesi belirginleşir. Yas tutma, hatırlama aşamaları ile kişinin travmadan sonra...

title: തെളിവൊന്നും ശേഷിപ്പിക്കാതെ എങ്ങനെ തട്ടിപ്പു നടത്തണം: തയ്‌വാൻ സ്വദേശികൾ എത്തിയത് വ്യക്തമായ പദ്ധതിയോടെ
content: ഇവിടെ പോസ്റ്റു ചെയ്യുന്ന അഭിപ്രായങ്ങൾ മലയാള മനോരമയുടേതല്ല. അഭിപ്രായങ്ങളുടെ പൂർണ ഉത്തരവാദിത്തം രചയിതാവിനായിരിക്കും. കേന്ദ്ര സർക്കാരിന്റെ ഐടി നയപ്രകാരം വ്യക്തി, സമുദായം, മതം, രാജ്യം എന്നിവയ്ക്കെതിരായി അധിക്ഷേപങ്ങളും അശ്ലീല പദപ്രയോഗങ്ങളും നടത്തുന്നത് ശിക്ഷാർഹമായ കുറ്റമാണ്. ഇത്തരം അഭിപ്രായ പ്രകടനത്തിന് നിയമനടപടി കൈക്കൊള്ളുന്നതാണ്.

title: 2 Cases of Measles Detected in Victoria, Outbreak Declared
creator: Monica O’Shea
content: Two people in the Australian state of Victoria have caught measles, prompting the state’s health department to declare a local outbreak of measles. Measles can cause a large rash on the neck and shoulders and there have been reported deaths from the virus in other countries. The two individuals in Victoria had no links to recent cases or history of overseas travel but were infectious at a large number of locations in greater Bendigo and metropolitan Melbourne. Health officials have unveiled a large list of exposure sites requiring monitoring for symptoms during March including supermarkets, chemists, hospital emergency departments, pizza joints, and swimming pools. Chief Health Officer Tarun Weeramanthri warned anyone who developed symptoms of measles to get medical care and test for the virus. “Wear a face mask and call ahead to make sure you can be isolated from others,” he said. In 2025 to date, eight cases in Victoria have been detected. Multiple populations in Victoria are at risk of measles, including the immunocompromised, babies under 12 months and adults born between 1966 and 1992. Health professionals have been advised to stay alert for measles in patients with fever and rash, especially those who had recently come back from overseas. “Clinicians should also consider measles in people with compatible symptoms who have spent time in metropolitan Melbourne in the prior seven to 18 days,” the department said. “Suspected cases should be tested, advised to isolate, and...

title: Elon Musk apoya que EE.UU. salga de la OTAN y de la ONU
creator: RT en Español
content: El famoso empresario Elon Musk se mostró de acuerdo con la idea de que Estados Unidos abandone la OTAN y la ONU. "Estoy de acuerdo", escribió en su red social X el director general de SpaceX y de Tesla y aliado del presidente Donald Trump en la lucha con la burocracia, en su respuesta a la publicación de un comentarista político en X.

title: Habs Highlights: Caufield Sets Career High, Struble Shines
creator: Marc Dumont, Montreal Hockey Now
content: The Montreal Canadiens were hoping to earn their fourth consecutive win as they faced the struggling Sabres in Buffalo. Rookie netminder Jakub Dobes was given his first start since early February, stopping 24 of the 26 shots sent his way to secure a well-deserved 4-2 win for the Habs. Let’s dive into the highlights! Cole Train An uneventful first period set a sleepy pace to the game, a situation that was only rectified once the puck was dropped for the second period. Cole Caufield opened the scoring with his 29th goal of the year, setting a career high in the process. We also have to send some praise Patrik Laine’s way, as he’s starting find his rhythm from a playmaking standpoint. That being said, it was great defensive play by Caufield and Lane Hutson that kicked things off, which surely put a smile on Martin St-Louis’ face. Patrik Laine feeds Cole Caufield for his 29th goal of the year. #GoHabsGo pic.twitter.com/Rlw4F1zdlS — Marc Dumont (@MarcPDumont) March 2, 2025 Tis But A Scratch This may shock you, but Hutson was also directly involved in the second Canadiens goal of the game. We don’t have a metric that establishes how much time and space certain players create on the ice, but if we did, I’m sure Hutson would be among the most dominant defencemen in the offensive zone. As for the goalscorer, it was great to see Josh Anderson rewarded for his never-ending Monty Python Black Knight skit. He may be bruised, he may be broken, and he may have taken a lot of damage in...

title: Salida del cepo, acuerdo con el FMI y reforma impositiva, los ejes de un Milei recargado para 2025
Fuerte incendio en la Colonia Santa Rosa genera movilización
creator: Editor
content: Un intenso incendio se desató en un domicilio ubicado en la zona de Segunda Yurqui, Colonia Santa Rosa, luego de que un hombre adulto mayor, conocido por acumular basura y sufrir deterioro en sus facultades, prendiera fuego en su vivienda. El siniestro afectó gravemente la propiedad, quedando registrada como pérdida total.Elementos de la Policía Municipal acudieron al lugar, mientras varias cisternas del Heroico Cuerpo de Bomberos trabajaron en conjunto para sofocar las llamas. Hasta el momento, los bomberos siguen operando con sus tragaomos en un esfuerzo continuo por controlar el incendio y evitar que se propague a propiedades colindantes.Las autoridades continúan investigando las circunstancias del suceso y evaluando los daños ocasionados en el domicilio.

title: Abel Comenta Chegada De Vitor Roque No Palmeiras E Exalta Estevao 8216sou Um Felizardo 8217
content: Depois do drama para se classificar na primeira fase, o Palmeiras avançou para a semifinal do Campeonato Paulista com tranquilidade. Na noite deste sábado (01), o Verdão bateu o São Bernardo por 3 a 0 e se garantiu entre os quatro melhores do estadual, com mando de campo garantido na próxima fase. Satisfeito com a atuação do time, Abel Ferreira analisou que o Palmeiras conseguiu dar a impressão que um jogo difícil parecer fácil. O português ressaltou a campanha do São Bernardo, líder da chave na primeira fase, além de exaltar a atuação de Estêvão, que marcou duas vezes na vitória, e disse que vai desfrutar do craque até o meio do ano. “Acho que nós fizemos um jogo que seria difícil parecer fácil. Parece que foi fácil olhando agora. Primeiro dar os parabéns pela excelente campanha que fez o São Bernardo, dentro do nosso grupo, e que nos dificultou muito. Dentro daquilo que fizemos, tiinvemos o Estêvão em seu melhor nível, em três finalizações fez dois grandes gols. Vocês gostam de falar de parte individual, mas ela pode inserida dentro do coletivo da equipe. Eu sou um felizardo por poder ter o Estêvão e poder desfrutar dele até meio do ano”, ressaltou. No final da janela de transferências, o Palmeiras contratou o atacante Vitor Roque para suprir uma das maiores carências do elenco. Abel destacou que o clube precisa ajudar o jogador, assim como o reforço chega para ajudar o time. Além disso, recordou que Roque eliminou o Verdão da...

title: Rising sales for wool bedding as consumers seek to keep mattresses out of landfill
content: A wool bedding retailer has reported rising sales amid a campaign to encourage British consumers to buy sustainably and keep mattresses out of landfill. Woolroom, which launched a system allowing customers to trace its products back as far as the flock to improve desirability for local materials and prices for farmers, said sales of its premium products had increased by 20% over the last year alone. Woolroom has likened the Wool ID programme, launched in conjunction with British Wool, to the labelling on fresh supermarket fruit and vegetables such as berries and asparagus which gives shoppers details on the country of origin, farm and even the producer’s name. Increased demand, particularly in the US, for bedding products made from natural materials, is believed to be a driving force behind the growth. It follows years of difficulties for the global wool industry as retailers and customers alike opted for products made from man-made alternatives. The firm earlier launched a bedding collection made with fully traceable wool, including fleece from the Scott family farm in Rutland, with customers able to scan a QR code on every product to trace products back to the exact flock on the estate. It follows fully traceable wool in its bedding and mattresses from ‘Farm Assured’ UK farmers, who are independently audited to ensure they are adhering to animal welfare standards. Woolroom pay a premium over and above the British Wool auction price for the wool they buy, which is returned...

title: Rising sales for wool bedding as consumers seek to keep mattresses out of landfill
content: Woolroom, which launched a system allowing customers to trace its products back as far as the flock to improve desirability for local materials and prices for farmers, said sales of its premium products had increased by 20% over the last year alone. Woolroom has likened the Wool ID programme, launched in conjunction with British Wool, to the labelling on fresh supermarket fruit and vegetables such as berries and asparagus which gives shoppers details on the country of origin, farm and even the producer’s name. Increased demand, particularly in the US, for bedding products made from natural materials, is believed to be a driving force behind the growth. It follows years of difficulties for the global wool industry as retailers and customers alike opted for products made from man-made alternatives. The firm earlier launched a bedding collection made with fully traceable wool, including fleece from the Scott family farm in Rutland, with customers able to scan a QR code on every product to trace products back to the exact flock on the estate. It follows fully traceable wool in its bedding and mattresses from ‘Farm Assured’ UK farmers, who are independently audited to ensure they are adhering to animal welfare standards. Woolroom pay a premium over and above the British Wool auction price for the wool they buy, which is returned to the relevant farmers. Its latest ‘Artisan’ range includes mattresses that are made over a two-day period, using traditional techniques “honed over...

title: Casos acumulados: el preocupante dato de la Justicia de Miami que pone en riesgo a los migrantes
content: Miami enfrenta una crisis en sus tribunales de inmigración debido al elevado número de expedientes sin resolver. La ciudad ocupa el primer lugar en acumulación de casos en espera en Florida, lo que afecta a miles de extranjeros que buscan regularizar su permanencia en Estados Unidos. La saturación del sistema prolongó los tiempos de espera y aumentó la incertidumbre entre quienes aguardan una resolución.Los casos pendientes de inmigración en Florida alcanzan cifras récordSegún un informe de la Universidad de Siracusa, basado en el análisis de millones de registros de la Corte de Inmigración obtenidos a través del Transactional Records Access Clearinghouse (TRAC), en diciembre de 2024, Florida acumulaba 178.709 casos pendientes; de los cuales unos 113.239 mil pertenecían a Miami.A nivel nacional, el total supera 3,7 millones de casos, lo que refleja el colapso del sistema judicial de inmigración. Estos tribunales, creados por el Congreso para llevar a cabo procedimientos de deportación, deciden si los extranjeros acusados por el Departamento de Seguridad Nacional (DHS, según sus siglas en inglés) de violar la ley de inmigración deben ser removidos de Estados Unidos.El informe detalló que los casos analizados incluyen tanto solicitudes de asilo afirmativas como defensivas. La mayoría son defensivas, presentadas en respuesta a un proceso de deportación iniciado por el DHS. En cambio, las afirmativas son remitidas a la Corte de Inmigración cuando son...

title: Giải thể công an quận huyện, Công an TP.Đà Nẵng hoạt động thế nào?
content: Theo quyết định của Bộ trưởng Bộ Công an, ngày từ 1.3, công an 7 quận, huyện (trừ đồn công an) trên địa bàn TP. Đà Nẵng gồm H.Hòa Vang, Q.Cẩm Lệ, Q.Hải Châu, Q.Liên Chiểu, Q.Ngũ Hành Sơn, Q.Sơn Trà và Q.Thanh Khê chính thức giải thể. Trước thay đổi này, Đảng ủy, Giám đốc Công an TP.Đà Nẵng đã triển khai các biện pháp đảm bảo không gián đoạn hoạt động, không bỏ trống địa bàn, đảm bảo an ninh trật tự và ổn định tổ chức. Phòng nghiệp vụ tiếp quản công việc công an quận, huyện Việc tái cấu trúc lực lượng hướng đến mô hình tinh gọn, không có cấp trung gian, tăng cường hiệu quả lãnh đạo trực tiếp của công an cấp tỉnh đối với công an cơ sở. Theo đó, Đảng ủy, Giám đốc Công an thành phố tập trung lãnh đạo, chỉ đạo triển khai thực hiện đồng bộ, toàn diện các mặt công tác trên nguyên tắc "không thành lập tổ chức mới, không tổ chức cấp trung gian, giảm tầng nấc, tăng cường sự lãnh đạo, chỉ đạo trực tiếp, toàn diện của lãnh đạo công an cấp tỉnh với công an cơ sở; đảm bảo nguyên tắc tập trung, dân chủ, khách quan, công khai, minh bạch; làm tốt công tác tuyên truyền, giáo dục chính trị tư tưởng, chế độ, chính sách cho đội ngũ cán bộ, chiến sĩ tạo sự đồng thuận trong tổ chức thực...

title: India vs New Zealand Dream11 Prediction: Fantasy Cricket Tips For IND vs NZ ICC Champions Trophy Match
creator: Faham Uddin
content: India and New Zealand cross swords in the final league game of the ICC Champions Trophy. Both teams head into the match undefeated and the winner of the match will take the top position in Group A. India have a big advantage heading into the match as they have played all their matches in Dubai and are well used to the conditions. New Zealand, on the other hand, have played matches on flat surfaces in Pakistan so adjusting to the Dubai conditions will be slightly tough. New Zealand have troubled India in the past in ICC events but they'll need an extraordinary performance to reach the final of the ICC Champions Trophy.India Vs New Zealand Dream11Related News | Explained! title: طوفان الأقصى: السياسي والإيديولوجي
¿Qué pasó con los perros que sobrevivieron a la muerte de Hackman y su esposa?
creator: Ximena Cordova
content: SANTA FE, NUEVO MÉXICO.- El trágico hallazgo de Gene Hackman y su esposa Betsy Arakawa ha dejado conmocionados a sus seres cercanos y a la comunidad en general. La pareja, conocida por su amor por los animales, compartía su hogar con tres perros, y dos de ellos han sido importantes en la investigación tras su muerte.También te podría interesar: Hija de Gene Hackman cree que el actor y su esposa fueron envenenadosEl destino de los perros de Gene HackmanEl miércoles 26 de febrero, las autoridades encontraron sin vida a Gene Hackman y su esposa en su residencia de Santa Fe, Nuevo México. Sin embargo, no fueron los únicos afectados por la tragedia. Uno de los perros de la pareja también fue hallado muerto, mientras que los otros dos sobrevivieron.Los perros sobrevivientes, un pastor alemán y otro de raza indefinida, fueron encontrados en diferentes áreas de la propiedad. Uno de ellos estaba suelto en los terrenos de la casa, mientras que el otro merodeaba cerca del cuerpo de Betsy, en el interior de la vivienda. Según las autoridades, los dos canes ahora están bajo el cuidado de la Oficina de Control Animal de Santa Fe, mientras la familia de Hackman decide qué hacer con ellos. La Oficina de Control Animal de Santa Fe está coordinando con la familia de Hackman para garantizar la seguridad de los dos perros”indicó el portal TMZ este viernesLa relación de Hackman y Arakawa con los animalesGene Hackman y Betsy Arakawa eran grandes amantes de los animales,...

title: నగ్నంగా రణ్ బీర్ కపూర్ సీన్.. వివరించిన సందీప్ రెడ్డి వంగా
content: సందీప్ రెడ్డి వంగా యానిమల్ సినిమా గురించి చెబుతున్న డీటైలింగ్స్ ఇప్పుడు వైరల్ అవుతున్నాయి. సందీప్ రెడ్డి వంగా ఇస్తున్న వివరణలు చూసి షాక్ అవుతున్నారు. ఇలా దీనిపైనే ఓ బుక్కు రాయొచ్చు కదా అన్నా అంటూ అందరూ మాట్లాడుకుంటున్నారు. సందీప్ రెడ్డి వంగా, రణ్ బీర్ కపూర్‌ల మధ్య జరిగిన ఓ ఘటన గురించి ఇప్పుడు అంతా చర్చించుకుంటున్నారు. యానిమల్ చిత్రంలో రణ్ బీర్ కపూర్ నగ్నంగా నటించిన సంగతి తెలిసిందే. ఆ సీన్ గురించి సందీప్ రెడ్డి వంగా వివరించిన తీరు అందరినీ ఆకట్టుకుంటోంది. ముందుగా ఈ సీన్‌ను ప్రోస్థటిక్ మేకప్‌తోనే చేయాలని అనుకున్నారట. అప్పర్ బాడీ అలానే పెట్టి.. లోబర్ బాడీకి మాత్రం ప్రోస్థటిక్ మేకప్‌తో మ్యానేజ్ చేయాలని అనుకున్నారట. టెస్ట్ షూట్ చేసినప్పుడు చాలా బాగా వచ్చిందట. కానీ సెట్స్ మీదకు వెళ్లే సరికి ఏదో తేడా కొడుతోందట. సీన్ సరిగ్గా రావడం లేదని, ఆ ఫీల్ రావడం లేదని సందీప్ రెడ్డి వంగా హీరోతో అన్నాడట. ఇక ఈ ఇద్దరూ పది నిమిషాలు చర్చించుకుని.. అసలు ఈ ప్రోస్థటిక్ మేకప్ లేకుండానే చేసేస్తా అని రణ్ బీర్ కపూర్ అన్నాడట. ఆ నిర్ణయంతో అంతా షాక్ అయ్యారని సందీప్ రెడ్డి వంగా చెప్పుకొచ్చాడు. రణ్ బీర్ కపూర్ లాంటి వాడు.. అలాంటి వెంటనే ఒప్పుకోవాల్సిన పని లేదు.. కావాలంటే నెక్ట్స్ డే షూటింగ్ పెట్టుకోండి.. మళ్లీ మేకప్ సెట్ చేసుకోండి అని చెప్పొచ్చని, కానీ రణ్ బీర్ కపూర్ మాత్రం సీన్ పర్ఫెక్షన్ కోసం వెంటనే ఒప్పేసుకున్నాడని సందీప్ రెడ్డి వంగా చెప్పుకొచ్చాడు. ఇలా ఓ దర్శకుడు, హీరో మధ్య సింక్ కుదిరితే సినిమా అద్భుతంగా వస్తుందని అంటున్నాడు. ప్రభాస్ స్పిరిట్ గురించి సందీప్ రెడ్డి వంగా మాట్లాడుతూ.. నేను ఇప్పుడు కచ్చితంగా రెండు వేల కోట్లు ఇవ్వాల్సి ఉంటుంది.. కలెక్షన్ల గురించి చెప్పలేను కానీ.. సినిమా మాత్రం అద్భుతంగా...

title: Danforth’s late goal lifts Blue Jackets over Red Wings in Stadium Series
creator: Associated Press
content: COLUMBUS, Ohio — Justin Danforth scored with 2:17 remaining to lift the Columbus Blue Jackets over Detroit 5-3 on Saturday night in the Stadium Series, leapfrogging the Red Wings to take sole possession of the first Eastern Conference wild-card spot. Denton Mateychuk notched the team’s first-ever outdoor goal, Dmitri Voronkov and Mathieu Olivier scored 32 seconds apart in the second period, and Adam Fantilli added an empty-netter. Elvis Merzlikins made 43 stops to help Columbus beat Detroit for the second time in three days and win its fourth straight. Alex DeBrincat scored twice to extend his point streak to nine games. Patrick Kane added a goal, and Cam Talbot made 16 stops for Detroit, which snapped a five-game road win streak and clings to the second wild-card spot. The 43rd outdoor game in league history was Columbus’ first and played before a crowd of 94,751 at Ohio Stadium. Takeaways Detroit: The Red Wings took early control of the puck, outshooting Columbus 14-6 in the first period but fell behind in the second. Despite dominating the third period, they had no answer for Columbus’ late goals. Columbus: With a game-time temperature of 29.4 degrees and gusts up to 18 mph, Columbus took time to warm up before scoring three second-period goals. The Blue Jackets stayed calm and overcame Detroit’s third-period surge. Key moment DeBrincat pulled Detroit even from a two-goal deficit with 3:24 left, but Danforth responded just over a minute later. Fantilli added an insurance...

title: Fast Start Wiped Away By Another Poor Third Period; Sharks Losing Streak Reaches Eight With Loss To Senators
creator: The Hockey News - San Jose Sharks
content: Marc DesRosiers-Imagn Images Another third-period lead would go wrong for the San Jose Sharks, who lost 5-3 to the Ottawa Senators on Saturday. San Jose is now on an eight-game losing streak, and Ottawa snapped a five-game losing streak. Tim Stutzle, Shane Pinto, Brady Tkachuk, and David Perron scored for the Senators, and Linus Ullmark made 33 saves. Tyler Toffoli and Timothy Liljegren scored for the Sharks, and Will Smith had a goal and an assist to extend his point streak to three games. Vitek Vanecek made 27 saves. Macklin Celebrini also had two assists. San Jose outskated the Sens early in the game, but the third period struggles reared their ugly head once again as the Sharks blew a one-goal third period lead for the third straight game. Pinto takes a breakaway pass and beats Vanecek by the glove shorthanded to give the Senators a 1-0 lead at 11:05 of the first period. Toffoli ties the game up 1-1 on the power play at 5:17 of the second period after a feed in front to Macklin Celebrini went off the defenseman's foot and in. Liljegren gave the Sharks a 2-1 lead with another power-play goal as his one-timer from the point beat Ullmark over the glove. Tkachuk tied the game 2-2 on a two-man advantage at 1:26 of the third period. After a bad bounce off the boards, Tim Stutzle put the puck into an open net to give the Senators a 3-2 lead at 3:00. David Perron scores to give the Senators a 4-2 lead after a rebound went right back to him. Smith finished a pretty passing play...

title: 財政預算案2025|陳茂波:全力發展人工智能為關鍵產業
content: 財政司司長陳茂波表示,新一份《財政預算案》提出,全力發展人工智能為關鍵產業,賦能傳統產業升級轉型;強調重視人工智能的發展,加大投入推進算力、算法、數據、人才及資金等5方面要素的提升,加強開拓新的應用場景,並已取得一定進展。 陳茂波在網誌說,《預算案》預留10億元成立香港人工智能研發院,加速推動人工智能的上游研發、中下游成果轉化和產業應用。在人才培育方面,當局聯繫了多家在港的大型科技企業,並將組織逾百家本地前沿的科技公司和初創公司,將行業裡最優秀的資源連接到本港中學和小學。他說,希望通過不同模式的互動交流以及實地考察,激勵學生參與其中,對科技的理論與應用產生好奇和興趣,將是學習的最大動力。 陳茂波說,面對國際大環境的變化,必需以變革回應挑戰、以創新驅動發展,以科技引領未來;跳出舊有的發展模式和框架,以新的經濟增長點為香港創造新的就業機會和增加收入,推動香港的經濟結構和產業發展邁向更多元和更高水平。

title: अजित पवारांनी दोन दिवसांपूर्वीच धनंजय मुंडेंचा राजीनामा घेतला, जवळच्या व्यक्तीचा खळबळजनक दावा, पोस्टमुळे चर्चांना उधाण
creator: Namrata Patil
content: राष्ट्रवादीचे नेते आणि मंत्री धनंजय मुंडेंचा उद्या राजीनामा होणार आहे, असा दावा करुणा शर्मा यांनी केला आहे. त्यांनी एक फेसबुक पोस्ट केली आहे. त्या पोस्टमुळे खळबळ उडाली आहे.मला १०० टक्के याबद्दलची माहिती मिळालेली आहे की धनंजय मुंडे यांचा राजीनामा दोन दिवस आधीच घेतला गेला आहे. वाल्मिक कराड जर दोषी असेल तर मी स्वत: राजीनामा देईन, असे सांगितले होते. त्यामुळे आता त्यांच्यासमोर काहीही राहिलेले नाही. त्यामुळे उद्या अधिवेशनाआधी त्यांचा राजीनामा होईल.धनंजय मुंडे यांचा राजीनामा अजित पवारांनी घेतला आहे. ते अजून जाहीर का झालेले नाही, याबद्दलची माहिती नाही. पण काल एसआयटी, सीआयडी चौकशीचा अहवाल समोर आला आहे. त्यामुळे १०० टक्के उद्या अधिवेशनाआधी त्यांचा राजीनामा होणार आहे. मला १०० टक्के असं वाटतंय की अधिवेशनाआधी अजित पवार स्वत: राजीनामाबद्दलची घोषणा करतील. अजित पवार हे पत्रकार परिषद घेऊन याबद्दलची माहिती देतील. आता धनंजय मुंडेंकडे बोलण्यासारखे काहीही राहिलेले नाही. वाल्मिक कराड हा त्यांचा एकदम जवळचा व्यक्ती आहे. आपण त्याला त्यांची सावली असं म्हणू शकतो. त्यांच्याशिवाय धनंजय मुंडेंच्या पोटाचे पाणी हलत नाही. त्यामुळे ही १०० टक्के खरी गोष्ट आहे.धनंजय मुंडे यांनी सांगितलं होतं की कोणीही दोषी असेल तर त्याला फाशीची शिक्षा झाली पाहिजे. वाल्मिक कराड जेव्हा सरेंडर झाला तेव्हा संतोष देशमुख हत्याप्रकरणी फाशीची शिक्षा व्हावी, असे म्हटले होते. संतोष देशमुख यांची निर्घृण हत्या झाली. या हत्येमुळे लोकांच्या मनात खूप मोठा प्रश्न निर्माण झाला आहे. बीडमध्ये वाल्मिक कराडकडून लोकांना गुंड प्रवृत्तीत परिवर्तन करायचं काम सुरु होतं. जे १० लोक आहेत, त्यात वाल्मिक कराड जे आका आहेत, त्यांचं वय हे जास्त आहे. बाकी...

title: Kai Jones plans to sign two-way contract with Mavericks
creator: Arthur Hill, Hoops Rumors
content: Kai Jones , who was released earlier today by the Clippers, expects to sign a two-way deal with the Mavericks once he clears waivers, sources tell NBA insider Chris Haynes ( Twitter link ). The 24-year-old center saw limited action in 28 games with L.A. this season, averaging 2.2 points and 1.6 rebounds in 7.4 minutes per night. He was getting consistent playing time earlier in the season, but was only used once during February and hasn’t played more than three minutes in a game since January 15. At 6’11”, Jones can provide valuable size for a Dallas team that is trying to survive while its top three big men recover from injuries. Anthony Davis is set to be reevaluated March 6 for the adductor strain he suffered in his Mavericks debut. Daniel Gafford , who has a grade 3 MCL sprain, and Dereck Lively , who’s dealing with a fractured ankle, will have their conditions checked on that same date, although they aren’t expected to return for a while. Moses Brown has been the Mavs’ starting center for the past two games, but he will become a free agent when his 10-day contract expires tonight. Hard cap restrictions will prevent Dallas from offering Brown another contract until April 10. That could create an opportunity for Jones to make an immediate impact. Even though his NBA career has been disappointing so far, he was regarded highly enough to be the 19th pick in the 2021 draft. Dallas’ two-way slots are currently filled by Brandon Williams , Kessler Edwards and Kylor Kelley , so...

title: India's First World Peace Centre to Be Inaugurated Today | Here's All You Need to Know
creator: editor@republicworld.com (Digital Desk)
content: Updated 08:21 IST, March 2nd 2025 The first-ever World Peace Centre will be inaugurated on March 2 at Sector 39, Gurugram. Gurugram: A historic milestone for India’s spiritual and social landscape, the first-ever World Peace Centre will be inaugurated on March 2 at Sector 39, Gurugram. The centre has been established under the leadership of Jain Acharya Lokesh Muni and the efforts of Ahimsa Vishwa Bharti. The inauguration event will be attended by several prominent dignitaries, including former President Ram Nath Kovind, Governor of Punjab Gulab Chand Kataria, Governor of Bihar Arif Mohammad Khan, Haryana Chief Minister Nayab Singh Saini, and Delhi Chief Minister Rekha Gupta. The occasion will also feature the Virat Sant Sammelan, where respected spiritual leaders such as Sri Sri Ravi Shankar, Founder of Art of Living; Yogrishi Swami Ramdevi, Founder of Patanjali Yogpeeth; Shri Morari Bapu, Ram Kathavachak; Swami Avdheshanand; and Sadhvi Ritambhara will address the gathering with messages of world peace, non-violence, and social harmony. Read Also: King of Kolkata’s Streets: Yellow Taxis Are Back With a Modern Twist – What’s Changing? Acharya Lokesh Muni emphasized that the World Peace Centre aims to be a beacon of spirituality and social unity, offering a platform for peace education, environmental preservation, equality, and institutional peace-building. Devotees from around the world have gathered in Gurugram for this momentous event, reflecting the widespread enthusiasm...

title: 'ഡോക്ടർ കഞ്ചാവ് ഉപയോഗിച്ചിട്ടുണ്ടോ, ട്രൈ ചെയ്തു നോക്ക്, കിടിലം ഫീൽ ആണ്; 17 വയസ്സുകാരൻ പറഞ്ഞത്
content: ഇവിടെ പോസ്റ്റു ചെയ്യുന്ന അഭിപ്രായങ്ങൾ മലയാള മനോരമയുടേതല്ല. അഭിപ്രായങ്ങളുടെ പൂർണ ഉത്തരവാദിത്തം രചയിതാവിനായിരിക്കും. കേന്ദ്ര സർക്കാരിന്റെ ഐടി നയപ്രകാരം വ്യക്തി, സമുദായം, മതം, രാജ്യം എന്നിവയ്ക്കെതിരായി അധിക്ഷേപങ്ങളും അശ്ലീല പദപ്രയോഗങ്ങളും നടത്തുന്നത് ശിക്ഷാർഹമായ കുറ്റമാണ്. ഇത്തരം അഭിപ്രായ പ്രകടനത്തിന് നിയമനടപടി കൈക്കൊള്ളുന്നതാണ്.

title: Exaprendiz de K-Pop revela que pasó una semana sin comer tras brutal ultimátum de su agencia para asistir a unas premiaciones
creator: Gabriela Rivera P.
content: El mundo del K-Pop sigue mostrando su lado más oscuro. Recientemente, la exaprendiz y modelo Lee Sian compartió una impactante experiencia sobre las dietas extremas que vivió mientras entrenaba para convertirse en idol, revelando que llegó a ayunar durante una semana tras recibir un ultimátum de su agencia.Las estrictas normas de peso en la industriaEl K-Pop es conocido por imponer estándares de belleza extremadamente exigentes, donde el peso es uno de los factores más vigilados. Muchos idols y aprendices se ven obligados a seguir dietas rigurosas o someterse a medidas drásticas para cumplir con las expectativas de sus agencias.Te puede interesar: ZeroBaseOne habla sobre la posible renovación de su contratoLee Sian, quien participó en los programas Idol School y Produce 48, relató su experiencia en el canal de YouTube Natty’s House, conducido por la idol Natty, donde ambas recordaron su etapa como aprendices y compañeras de cuarto.Natty de Kiss of Life a la izquierda y a la derecha Lee Si An. / The Zaal Company. Una semana sin comer para poder asistir a los MAMA AwardsDurante la entrevista, Lee Sian contó que en 2017 su agencia le permitió asistir a los MAMA Awards junto al grupo fromis_9, pero con una condición: debía pesar menos de 60 kg. En ese momento, ella pesaba 63 kg, por lo que, desesperada por cumplir la exigencia, decidió ayunar durante una semana completa.También te puede interesar: ¿44 Mil pesos por un pedazo de cartón? Esto es lo que pagan...

title: 冷暖兩樣情!與川普大吵後,澤倫斯基獲英相送暖,英烏簽署935億貸款協議
creator: 兩岸中心
content: 烏克蘭總統澤倫斯基2月28日訪問華府與美國總統川普發生衝突,川普批評澤倫斯基的行為可能會導致第三次世界大戰。美烏談判破局、不歡而散之後,澤倫斯基3月1日飛抵英國會見英國首相施凱爾(Keir Starmer),受到熱情接待,英國更與烏克蘭簽署總值22億6000萬英鎊的貸款協議,支持烏克蘭提升國防。 透過 追蹤風傳媒 澤倫斯基1日會見英國首相施凱爾,兩位領導人在英相官邸唐寧街10號的黑色大門外熱情擁抱,施凱爾還不斷對澤倫斯基拍背、搭肩,互動相當熱絡,施凱爾告訴澤倫斯基:「正如你所聽到外面街道上的歡呼聲,你得到了全英國的全力支持,無論需要多長時間,我們都會與你、與烏克蘭站在一起。」與川普和澤倫斯基兩人之間的不愉快,形成強烈對比。 而且關鍵的是,英國還跟烏克蘭簽署1項總值22億6000萬英鎊(相當約935億台幣)的貸款協議,支持烏克蘭提升國防能力。澤倫斯基表示,這筆貸款將用於生產武器,報導更指出,這筆貸款將用遭到凍結的俄國資產償還。 澤倫斯基預計2日會見英國國王查爾斯三世,在美烏裂痕加深之際,英國和歐洲持續展現堅定的挺烏決心。同日,加拿大總理杜魯道也將出席施凱爾主持的歐洲峰會。逾10位歐洲領袖將討論與烏克蘭的共同防衛安全計畫,及歐洲能提供的安全保證。 澤連斯基離開白宮後,在社群媒體上說了37個「感謝」,目前仍在繼續。除對美國連說4個「感謝」之外,他對法國總統馬克宏、德國總理蕭茲、歐委會主席馮德萊恩和加拿大總理杜魯道等多位「支持烏克蘭」領導人致謝。

title: Лидер Франции допустил возобновление диалога с Путиным
creator: Ирина Зражевская
content: Французский президент Эммануэль Макрон не стал исключать того, что Европа может возобновить диалог с президентом России Владимиром Путиным. «Ничего не исключено, я всегда это говорил. Диалог с президентом Путиным может состояться в подходящее время. У меня крайне прагматичный подход, и моя главная цель - безопасность французов», - приводит слова политика Le Journal du Dimanche. При этом Макрон указал, что урегулирование конфликта на Украине без участия Европы поставило бы под угрозу безопасность региона. Прокомментировал французский лидер и попытки Штатов урегулировать боевые действия на Украине. Он отметил, что разрешение украинского конфликта без участия Киева стало бы нарушением международного права. «Это был бы вопрос безопасности, это стало бы расколом внутри НАТО», - добавил Эммануэль Макрон.

title: Chuyển nhượng MU 2/3: Bất ngờ Antony, Garnacho được 'gã khổng lồ' quan tâm
creator: Thethao247
content: Man Utd có động thái bất ngờ với Antony hay Garnacho được ông lớn tại châu Âu quan tâm,... sẽ là một trong những tin chuyển nhượng MU đáng chú ý trong ngày 2/3. Theo Fichajes, Man Utd sẵn sàng để Antony ra đi vĩnh viễn vào mùa hè nhưng sẽ yêu cầu mức phí khoảng 50 triệu Euro. Cầu thủ người Brazil hiện đang khoác áo Real Betis theo dạng cho mượn sau khi gia nhập đội bóng Tây Ban Nha ở kỳ chuyển nhượng tháng Giêng. Anh đã thể hiện phong độ ấn tượng, khiến Betis muốn mua đứt. Bên cạnh đó, Juventus cũng đang dành sự quan tâm đến cựu sao Ajax. Theo Fichajes, Barcelona đang theo dõi chặt chẽ Alejandro Garnacho và hy vọng chiêu mộ cầu thủ chạy cánh của Man UTd vào mùa hè. Đội bóng xứ Catalan hiện có tài năng trẻ Lamine Yamal tỏa sáng bên cánh phải và xem Garnacho là sự bổ sung lý tưởng để tăng cường sức mạnh cho cánh trái. Theo The Daily Briefing, Angel Gomes sẽ rời Lille khi hết hợp đồng và trở thành cầu thủ tự do vào mùa hè này. HLV Ruben Amorim được cho là rất muốn đưa tiền vệ 23 tuổi trở lại Man Utd, nơi anh từng trưởng thành từ học viện. Gomes đang nhận được sự quan tâm từ Tottenham, Newcastle và Aston Villa, trong khi Bayern Munich và RB Leipzig cũng theo dõi tình hình. Dù vậy, cầu thủ người Anh được cho là ưu tiên trở lại...

title: «Сан-Хосе» уступил «Оттаве», у Костина результативная передача
खालिस्तान आतंकवाद पर लिखा आर्टिकल, डर के मारे हार्वर्ड ने हटाया, स्टूडेंट्स बोले- टेक दिए घुटने
creator: Zee News Hindi
Zee News हिन्दी
content: Khalistan: हार्वर्ड यूनिवर्सिटी में खालिस्तानी आतंकवाद को लेकर लिखे एक आर्टिकल को अनपब्लिश कर दिया गया है. इसको लेकर यूनिवर्सिटी को आलोचना का सामना करना पड़ रहा है. Khalistan: दुनिया के सबसे प्रतिष्ठित शिक्षा संस्थान 'हार्वर्ड यूनिवर्सिटी' का दोहरा चेहरा सामने आया है. खुद को फ्री स्पीच का समर्थक कहने इस संस्थान ने खलिस्तानियों के दबाव में आकर खालिस्तानी आतंकवाद और इससे भारत-कनाडा के संबंधों पर पड़ने वाले प्रभाव को लेकर लिखे गए एक लेख को हटा दिया. इस आर्टिकल को अनपब्लिश करने पर यूनिवर्सिटी की कड़ी आलोचना की जा रही है. ये भी पढ़ें- सुरंग में फंसे 4 मजदूरों का चल गया पता, लेकिन आ गई बुरी खबर, मंत्री बोले- सिर्फ 1 परसेंट... लेख को किया गया अनपब्लिश खालिस्तान से जुड़ा यह आर्टिकल यूनिवर्सिटी के 'हार्वर्ड इंटरनेशनल रिव्यू' में छापा गया था. इसे जिना ढिल्लन नाम की एक स्टूडेंट ने लिखा था. लेख का शीर्षक था, 'ए थॉर्न इन द मेपल: हाउ द खालिस्तान क्वेशन इज रीशेपिंग इंडिया-कनाडा रिलेशंस.' इस आर्टिकल को 15 फरवरी 2025 को हार्वर्ड इंटरनेशनल रिव्यू में पब्लिश किया गया था. लेख में भारत में बढ़ते खालिस्तानी आतंकवाद, कनाडा में इसका उदय और इससे भारत-कनाडा के प्रभावित होते रिश्ते के बारे में बताया गया था. आर्टिकल को 22 फरवरी 2025 को अनपब्लिश किया गया. लेखिका का बयान 'हार्वर्ड इंटरनेशनल रिव्यू' ( HIR)'हार्वर्ड यूनिवर्सिटी' में में 'हार्वर्ड इंटरनेशनल रिलेशंस' काउंसिल की ओर से प्रकाशित एक तिमाही पत्रिका है. इस आर्टिकल की लेखिका जीना ढिल्लन पंजाब से हार्वर्ड की स्टूडेंट हैं. पत्रिका में उन्हें हार्वर्ड की स्टाफ राइटर कहा गया था, लेकिन विवाद के बाद से अचानक HIR की वेबसाइट से उनका बायो गायब हो गया....

title: Talks for permanent Gaza truce inconclusive
creator: none@none.com (Agencies)
content: GAZA CITY: While the first phase of the Gaza truce drew to a close on Saturday, negotiations on the next stage, which should secure a permanent ceasefire, have so far been inconclusive.Hamas has made it clear that no Gaza ceasefire talks on the second phase were happening as it rejected “Israel’s formulation” to extend the first stage, Al Jazeera reported.However, the Palestinian group reaffirmed keenness to complete the remaining stages of the ceasefire agreement, leading to “a permanent ceasefire, full withdrawal of the occupation forces from the Gaza Strip, reconstruction and lifting the siege”.In a letter to the Arab League summit, due to be held on March 4, Hamas said: “We categorically reject the attempt to impose any non-Palestinian projects or forms of administration or the presence of any foreign forces on the territory of the Gaza Strip.”Israel’s negotiating delegation returned from Cairo on Saturday and Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu was scheduled to meet his security team, according to local media.On the other hand, the US announced its approval of the sale of more than $3bn in munitions, bulldozers and related military equipment to Israel.As the deadline for the initial ceasefire that took effect on Jan 19 was about to expire, UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres said the truce “must hold”, asking the parties to “spare no effort” to avoid a breakdown of the agreement. He warned against a return to hostilities in Gaza, saying such an outcome would be...

title: ノルディックスキー=世界選手権、複合男子で山本涼太が11位
content: [1日 ロイター] - ノルディックスキーの世界選手権は1日、ノルウェーのトロンヘイムで複合男子個人ノーマルヒルをコンパクト方式で行い、山本涼太が日本勢最高の11位だった。 山本は前半飛躍(ヒルサイズ=HS102メートル)で99.5メートルを飛んで2位だったが、後半距離(7.5キロ)で順位を下げた。 渡部暁斗は13位、谷地宙は26位、畔上祥吾は30位だった。ヤールマグヌス・リーベル(ノルウェー)が優勝した。

title: Опубликована статистика главного боя Асу Алмабаева в UFC
content: Официальный сайт UFC опубликовал статистику поединка казахстанского бойца Асу Алмабаева (21-3) и ангольца Манела Капе (21-7), которые сразились в главном бою турнира UFC Fight Night 253 в Лас-Вегасе (США) , сообщает Sports.kz. Нокаутом закончился главный бой Асу Алмабаева в UFC Капе победил Алмабаева техническим нокаутом в третьем раунде. В этом поединке Манел выбросил 115 значимых ударов, 61 из которых оказались точными (53%). Статистика Асу — 40 ударов из 80 (50%). Алмабаев предпринял шесть попыток тейкдаунов, однако ни одна из них не увенчалась успехом. Капе попытался провести тейкдаун один раз — также неудачно. В контроле казахстанец не преуспел, а время бойца из Анголы составило 29 секунд. Видео полного исторического боя Асу Алмабаева с нокаутом в UFC

title: Michael Jordan confirma patrocinador principal para su equipo de NASCAR con una marca líder
creator: LW
content: l equipo de de , el , ha confirmado una importante asociación con la conocida marca de artículos coleccionables de deportes y entretenimiento, . Este desarrollo supone la ampliación de una relación existente entre , que es copropiedad de y el , y . La asociación comenzó en 2024 y se centró en la creación de tarjetas coleccionables y recuerdos exclusivos que resaltan la exitosa historia del equipo en el deporte. Michael Jordan consolida una unión trascendente . Se han establecido como líderes en la industria de los artículos coleccionables durante los últimos 30 años, conocidos principalmente por sus tarjetas coleccionables premium y productos autografiados. Se centran en una variedad de ligas deportivas importantes, incluidas la , la y la . Con 23XI Racing, han dado un paso atrás en el deporte de NASCAR después de una pausa de 20 años. Esta es una gran noticia tanto para la empresa como para el equipo y los aficionados, ya que promete inyectar nueva energía al mercado de artículos coleccionables de NASCAR una vez más. Upper Deck será el patrocinador principal del Toyota Camry XSE N.° 45 de , con el logotipo de la marca visible en la decoración del auto. Los fanáticos de 23XI Racing también están de enhorabuena. Pueden esperar cromos coleccionables de 23XI Racing y una variedad de recuerdos autografiados y artículos coleccionables de edición especial. Dado que NASCAR actualmente lucha por retener el patrocinio, esta asociación ayudará a respaldar...

title: एमालेको सचिवालय बैठक बस्दै
content: नेकपा (एमाले)को सचिवालय बैठक आज बस्दैछ। आइतबार दिउँसो २ बजे पार्टी केन्द्रीय कार्यालय च्यासलमा बैठक बस्ने तय भएको उपाध्यक्ष अष्टलक्ष्मी शाक्यले जानकारी दिइन्। बैठकमा सरकारले जारी गरेको अध्यादेश लगायत समसामयिक राजनीतिक परिस्थितिबारे छलफल हुनेछ। सरकारले जारी गरेको ६ वटा अध्यालेश संसदमा पेश हुन सकेको छैन। प्रतिनिधि सभामा सत्ता पक्षको बहुमत भए पनि राष्ट्रिय सभामा संख्या अपुग छ। सत्तापक्षमै रहेका लोकतान्त्रिक समाजवादी, जनता समाजवादी पार्टी नेपालले भूमि अध्यादेशको विरोध गरेकाले सरकारले संसदमा स्वीकृतिका लागि कार्यसूचीमा राख्न सकेको छैन। जसपाले भूमि अध्यादेश फिर्ता हुनुपर्ने अडान राख्दै आएको छ। सत्ता पक्षले भूमि अध्यादेश छलफलका लागि कार्यदल गठन गर्ने भने पनि प्रक्रिया अघि बढ्न सकेको छैन।

title: Audi A3 o BMW Serie 1, cuál de los dos es el mejor urbano premium
creator: motor
content: Entre los compactos premium, dos modelos destacan sobre el resto: el Audi A3 y el BMW Serie 1. Ambos representan la entrada a sus respectivas marcas y combinan diseño, tecnología y prestaciones para quienes buscan un vehículo urbano con un toque de exclusividad. Sin embargo, cada uno ofrece una filosofía distinta que puede inclinar la balanza según las preferencias del conductor.BMW Serie 1El BMW Serie 1 presume de unas dimensiones de 4.361 mm de largo, 1.800 mm de ancho y 1.459 mm de alto, con una distancia entre ejes de 2.670 mm. Su diseño destaca por un estilo deportivo y agresivo, con molduras exteriores M en negro brillo, llantas de aleación ligera y faros LED. En el interior, equipa el avanzado BMW Live Cockpit Plus con BMW Curved Display, el sistema Operating System 9 con navegador, climatizador y un volante deportivo.BMW Serie 1 2024En cuanto a motorizaciones, el BMW Serie 1 ofrece opciones para todos los gustos, desde el 116 con 122 CV hasta el potente M135 xDrive con 300 CV y tracción total. Todas sus variantes cuentan con cambio automático, garantizando una conducción refinada y eficiente. Además, incorpora avanzados sistemas de asistencia como el control de crucero con frenado automático y el Parking Assistant con cámara trasera. Su precio parte de 34.100 euros.BMW Serie 1 2025Audi A3Por su parte, el Audi A3 tiene unas dimensiones similares: 4.353 mm de largo, 1.816 mm de ancho y 1.486 mm de alto, con una batalla de 2.628 mm. title: Old tradition brings Marawi Muslims together as Ramadan begins
creator: Abdul Hafiz Tacoranga Malawani
content: MARAWI, Philippines – On the eve of Ramadan , Meranao families gathered for pegang , a tradition steeped in faith, unity, and the shared warmth of a meal. Derived from the Meranao words “paganay” (first) and “pagana” (ceremonial feast), it marks important and sacred occasions. In predominantly Muslim Marawi, a city with a population of about 200,000, food sustains as well as strengthens kinship and community bonds. Pegang , also called pagang , refers specifically to the family gathering and meal preparations on the first day of Ramadan, marking the beginning of the month-long spiritual commitment. It is not just about cooking but about shared experience, strengthening family unity and devotion. Much like noche buena during Christmas, which brings families together for a special feast, pegang is an important occasion, setting the tone for the month of fasting and reflection. Then there is the iftar , the meal that breaks the daily fast during the Ramadan, which takes place daily throughout the month. FIL KHAIR. A view outside the Masjid Fil Khair at Mindanao State University Marawi campus on February 28, 2025. Abdul Hafiz Malawani/Rappler Ramadan, the ninth month of the Islamic lunar calendar , is a time of fasting, prayer, and reflection for millions of Muslims worldwide. Its start is determined by the crescent moon’s sighting, an event closely monitored by the Bangsamoro regional government, which deployed moon sighting teams across Manila, Misamis Oriental, and General...

title: വൈരാഗ്യബുദ്ധിയുമായാണ് ഇന്ന് കുട്ടികൾ നടക്കുന്നത്, പുതുതലമുറ ലഹരി തേടി പോകാതെ നോക്കണം; ഐഎം വിജയൻ
content: തിരുവനന്തപുരം: സമൂഹത്തിലെ കൂടി വരുന്ന അക്രമ സംഭവങ്ങൾക്കെതിരെ ജാഗ്രതാ സന്ദേശവുമായി ഏഷ്യാനെറ്റ് ന്യൂസ് നടത്തുന്ന ലൈവത്തോണിന് ആശംസകളുമായി ഇന്ത്യൻ ഫുട്ബോൾ ഇതിഹാസം ഐഎം വിജയൻ. ലഹരി തേടി പോകാതെ കുട്ടികൾ തങ്ങൾക്കുള്ളിലെ കലാ കായിക കഴിവുകളെ ലഹരിയാക്കി മാറ്റണമെന്ന് ഐഎം വിജയൻ പറഞ്ഞു. വലിയൊരു സന്ദേശമാണ് ഏഷ്യാനെറ്റ് ന്യൂസ് ന്യൂജനറേഷന് നൽകുന്നത്, അതിൽ പങ്കെടുക്കാനായതിൽ സന്തോഷമുണ്ട്. പുതു തലമുറയിൽ ലഹരി ഉപയോഗത്തെക്കുറിച്ച് ബോധവത്കരണ നടത്തേണ്ടത് അനിവാര്യമാണെന്നും ഐംഎം വിജയൻ പറയുന്നു. നമ്മുടെ കാലത്തും സ്കൂളുകളിൽ അടി നടക്കാറുണ്ട്. പക്ഷേ അത് ഏറെ സമയത്തേക്ക് നീളില്ല. അടി കഴിഞ്ഞാലുടൻ കെട്ടിപ്പിടിച്ച് അത് ഉടനെ സോൾവാക്കും. ഇന്ന് വൈരാഗ്യബുദ്ധിയും കൊണ്ട് നടക്കുകയാണ് കുട്ടികൾ. നമ്മുടെ ജീവിതം വളരെ ഷോർട്ട് പിരീഡിയിലാണ്. അതുപോലെ ലഹരിയൊക്കെ ഷോർട്ട് പിരീഡിൽ ഉള്ളതാണ്. എന്‍റെ ലഹരി ഫുട്ബോളാണ്. കുട്ടികളൊക്കെ കായിക രംഗത്തേക്ക് വരണം, അതിൽ ലഹരി കണ്ടെത്തണം. ചിലർക്ക് കായിക രംഗമാകാം, പാട്ടോ, നൃത്തമോ ഒക്കെയാകാം ചിലർക്ക് ലഹരി. കുട്ടികൾ ആ ലഹരി തേടി പോകണം. ആ ലഹരി ലൈഫ് ലോങ് കൂടെയുണ്ടാകും. എന്തൊക്കെ പ്രശ്നമുണ്ടെങ്കിലും ഷെയർ ചെയ്യാൻ ഉണ്ടാവുക ഫ്രണ്ട്സാണ്. കുട്ടികളിൽ എന്തെങ്കിലും പ്രശ്നമുണ്ടെങ്കിൽ സുഹൃത്തുക്കളോടെങ്കിലും പങ്കുവെക്കണമെന്ന് ഐഎം വിജയൻ പറയുന്നു. വർധിക്കുന്ന ലഹരി ഉപയോഗത്തിനും അക്രമണ പരമ്പരകൾക്കുമെതിരായ ഏഷ്യാനെറ്റ് ന്യൂസിന്‍റെ ലൈവത്തോണിൽ വിവിധ മേഖലകളിലെ പ്രമുഖരും സാധാരണക്കാരും പങ്കെടുക്കുന്നുണ്ട്. രാവിലെ ഏഴ് മുതൽ തത്സമയം തുടങ്ങിയ പരിപാടിയിൽ പുതുതലമുറയടക്കം ലഹരിയിലേക്ക് എത്തുന്നതിനുള്ള കാരണങ്ങളും അതിൽ നിന്ന് രക്ഷനേടാനുള്ള പരിഹാരങ്ങളും തേടാം. അനിയന്ത്രിതമാകുന്ന ലഹരി ഉപഭോഗമടക്കം ലൈവത്തോണിൽ...

title: Late goal lifts Jackets over Wings in Stadium Series
creator: Reuters
content: March 2 - Justin Danforth scored the go-ahead goal with 2:17 left and Elvis Merzlikins made 43 saves to lead the Columbus Blue Jackets over the Detroit Red Wings 5-3 in the Stadium Series on Saturday night at chilly Ohio Stadium in Columbus. Denton Mateychuk, Dmitri Voronkov, Mathieu Olivier and Adam Fantilli also scored, Zach Werenski and Boone Jenner each had two assists and Danforth added an assist for Columbus, which leapfrogged Detroit into the Eastern Conference's top wild-card spot with its fourth straight win. Alex DeBrincat scored twice and Patrick Kane had a goal and two assists for Detroit. Cam Talbot finished with 16 saves for the Red Wings. Danforth drove past defenseman Simon Edvinsson at the blue line and then put in a rebound of his own shot for the game-winner. Fantilli then sealed the win with an empty-netter with 1:08 to go. The crowd of 94,751, braving 27-degree temperatures with a wind chill of 17 degrees, was the second largest ever to watch an NHL game behind only the 2014 Winter Classic crowd of 105,491 at Michigan Stadium in Ann Arbor, Mich. Columbus took a 1-0 lead at 5:31 mark of the second period when Mateychuk fired a wrist shot from the bottom of the left circle into the top far corner. Detroit tied it midway through the period with a power -play goal when DeBrincat, stationed by the left post, slammed in a crossing pass from Kane. The goal extended DeBrincat's point streak to nine games, matching his career high set with the Chicago Blackhawks...

title: Buy or sell: Ganesh Dongre of Anand Rathi recommends three stocks to buy on Monday - 3 March
content: Buy or sell : Again Broader indices underperformed major indices due to concerns over high valuations and fears surrounding U.S. tariffs. During the week, large-cap and mid-cap indices shed nearly 3-4%, while the small-cap index declined by more than 5%. Nifty and Bank Nifty recorded losses of 2.9% and 1.3%, respectively. Weekly Trading Overview As anticipated in the previous weekly analysis, the formation of daily lower-high closing patterns, which is inherently bearish, dragged Nifty down to 22,124, breaching the key support level of 22,400-22,500. Daily candlestick patterns continue to exhibit lower lows, signalling persistent weakness. Until Nifty decisively closes above the 23,200 marks on a weekly basis, traders should remain cautious on the buy side. Options data indicates the current Put-Call Ratio (PCR) stands at 0.90. For the upcoming week, the index is expected to trade within the 21,700 to 23,000 range, with key support at 21,700 and resistance at 22,800-23,000. Bank Nifty Performance The Bank Nifty index declined by 1.3% but managed to hold its previous low at 47,700. After beginning the week on a positive note, the index experienced persistent selling pressure. Looking ahead, Bank Nifty has crucial support at 47,500 and resistance at 49,500. Conclusion Both Nifty and Bank Nifty closed below their respective monthly resistance zones. Nifty’s key resistance level stands at 23,200, while Bank Nifty faces resistance at 49,500. A sustained close below these levels...

title: MLB considers major move over disgraced legend Pete Rose in the wake of Trump's scathing attack
content: MLB considers major move over disgraced legend Pete Rose in the wake of Trump's scathing attack READ MORE: Mets' Pete Alonso suffers gruesome injury after getting hit in face PODCAST: Trump’s favorites and frenemies, Zelensky, the Epstein files and an invitation from the King! Listen here By ISABEL BALDWIN Published: 21:50 EST, 1 March 2025 | Updated: 21:50 EST, 1 March 2025 e-mail View comments Major League Baseball is reportedly mulling a move to posthumously reinstate controversial former player Pete Rose. Rose, a three-time World Series winner, passed away at the age of 83 in September without ever fulfilling his wish to be inducted into the National Baseball Hall of Fame . While he is considered one of the greatest players in history, the legend was slapped with a lifetime ban for betting on the Cincinnati Reds as both a player and manager of the team in 1989. The lifetime ban, which landed him on the ineligible list, prevented him from induction into the Hall of Fame, something which President Donald Trump took aim at MLB for Friday night. Less than 24 hours after the President's bizarre attack on MLB, it has been revealed that Commissioner Rob Manfred is considering a petition filed on January 8 by Rose's family to have the all-time hit king removed from the ineligible list, according to ESPN . The reinstatement petition was filed after Fawn Rose, the oldest daughter of the baseball icon, and Jeffrey Lenkov, a lawyer who represented Rose before his death, reportedly...

title: PMLA court issues production warrant against hawala operator
content: MUMBAI: A special PMLA (Prevention of Money Laundering Act) court has issued a production warrant against Alpesh Khara, a hawala operator from Charni Road, arrested in connection with the alleged fraud Ponzi scheme run through Torres Jewellery stores, in which thousands of investors were duped of crores of rupees. Acting on a plea filed by the Enforcement Directorate (ED), special judge AC Daga passed the order on Friday, directing the superintendent of Arthur Road Jail, where Khara is lodged, to produce him before the court on March 17. The court said that the accused is required for the purpose of investigation by the ED and issued a production warrant under section 302 of the Bharatiya Nagarik Suraksha Sanhita (BNSS) 2023 and section 65 of the PMLA, 2002. Under section 302 of the BNSS, a criminal court has the power to order the production of a prisoner to face charges. The court order came on an application filed by the ED, seeking production of Khara, who is currently under judicial custody, in the FIR registered by the Economic Offences Wing (EOW) of the Mumbai police. Earlier, in February, the court had allowed the ED to record the statements of Khara along with arrested three top executives of Torres Jewellery - Tazagul Xasatova, Valentina Kumar and Sarvesh Ashok Surve. As per the EOW, Khara, a hawala operator, allegedly facilitated the illicit transfers that were used to set up the jewellery store chain in Mumbai Metropolitan Region. The multi-crore fraud came to...

title: Fiscal de la Nación enfrenta tercera denuncia constitucional en su contra: Mininter presentará recurso ante el Congreso
creator: David Solar Silva
content: Este lunes 3 de marzo, el Ministerio del Interior (Mininter) anunció que presentará una denuncia constitucional ante el Congreso de la República contra la fiscal de la Nación, Delia Espinoza, por presuntas infracciones al marco constitucional y omisión de actos funcionales. La acusación surgió tras la decisión de Espinoza de retirarse de una mesa de trabajo interinstitucional relacionada con el Protocolo de Actuación Interinstitucional de Investigación del Delito.En su comunicado, el Mininter indicó que Espinoza estaría incurriendo en un comportamiento que afecta tanto la gobernabilidad como la seguridad del país. Aseguraron que la omisión de actos funcionales de la fiscal podría estar relacionada con la desestabilización de la lucha contra el crimen organizado, uno de los temas prioritarios para el gobierno actual.El retiro de la mesa de trabajo interinstitucionalEl conflicto se originó cuando el Ministerio Público decidió retirarse de la mesa de trabajo destinada al Protocolo de Actuación Interinstitucional de Investigación del Delito, un espacio creado para coordinar y optimizar los esfuerzos de diferentes entidades para enfrentar el crimen. La decisión fue vista como un obstáculo para el avance en la colaboración entre diversas instituciones del Estado, y en particular, en el fortalecimiento de la lucha contra la delincuencia.El Mininter expresó en su comunicado que lamentaba profundamente la postura adoptada por Espinoza y el Ministerio...

title: 煮金針菇前要洗嗎?農糧署揭正確解答!懶人料理1分鐘完成「鹹香爽口超下飯」
creator: 風生活綜合報導
content: 金針菇是許多家常菜中常見的食材,不但富含營養,無論用來煮湯、涼拌、加火鍋裡都很美味,不過金針菇應該如何挑選、保存?煮之前要洗嗎?還有什麼好吃的料理方式?這些問題帶你一一了解。 透過 追蹤風傳媒 農業部在臉書發文指出, 應該挑選 菇體白淨、菌傘無異色凹陷的金針菇, 若金針菇包裝出現破裂, 則會有外包裝腫脹之情形, 購買時應避免。 由於屬於低溫栽培, 因此若是購買袋裝金針菇,只要 將其放置於4度C冰箱中即可。 農糧署表示,目前臺灣栽培的食用生鮮菇類, 如:金針菇、杏鮑菇、鴻喜菇等, 多採無菌生長的太空包或瓶栽方式栽種,且生長過程不需使用化學藥劑,只要清除木屑、切除根部, 其實不用特別清洗,便可直接加熱料理。 至於在半開放式環境中種植的菇類, 如:香菇、木耳等,則建議在料理前,用「清水快速簡單沖洗」沖去表面灰塵,同時應以「避免浸泡」為原則, 並於沖洗後儘速料理,以維持菇類最佳風味 一名網友在臉書社團「家常菜」分享了一道適合炎熱天氣的辣拌金針菇料理,並附上成品照片與詳細食譜。這道料理的食材包括金針菇、蒜頭、蔥(分量可自行調整)及一根辣椒。 醬汁部分則由醬油兩大匙、醋一大匙、糖半匙與一匙麻油或香油調製,比例為2:1:0.5。 製作過程相當簡單, 先將水煮滾後加少許鹽,再將金針菇川燙30秒撈起。接著,將蒜頭切末、蔥切花,與金針菇拌勻,最後淋上調好的醬汁即可完成。 該網友表示,這道菜可以事先準備好放入冰箱,想吃時隨時取出,既簡單又方便。 完整討論: 《家常菜》 責任編輯/蔡惠芯

title: Child sex offender lured girl to park before toilet block horror
creator: Sarah McPhee
content: Warning: Graphic Content A registered child sex offender lured a 14-year-old girl to a park toilet block in Sydney’s south before giving her drugs and forcing her to perform sexual acts which he then filmed. The Herald can reveal that William “Billy” Henry Smith, 47, has pleaded guilty to the horrifying incident involving the teenager in Pole Depot Park in Penshurst in August 2023. Pole Depot Park in Penshurst, where the 14-year-old was sexually assaulted. Credit: Wolter Peeters “Got to be careful ppl dnt see [sic],” Smith messaged his victim before the meeting. “Il [sic] go to jail.” Smith, using the account name “Bit Inya”, first messaged the teenager on the encrypted chat application Telegram. He asked “16?” to which she replied, “a little younger”, before Smith correctly guessed “14”, according to the agreed facts obtained from the NSW District Court last week. Over four days, Smith “engaged in several fantasy conversations” with the girl about sexual acts and incited her to send him explicit photographs of herself, as he “groomed and procured” her for unlawful sexual activity. Smith sent the girl videos including pornography and bestiality. He asked if they could meet so she could “try on outfits” for him to see, and “suggested a park ... where no one goes”. Billy Henry Smith was arrested on the same day as the incident. Credit: NSW Police “I promise you I won’t hurt you in any way. U can trust me,” Smith messaged the girl. “I want u to enjoy urself.” The teenager...
