title: N. Korea's Mount Paektu to be designated as UNESCO Global Geopark
creator: yonhap@koreatimes.co.kr(KoreaTimes)
content: This Nov. 22, 2024 photo shows Mount Paektu on the North Korean-Chinese border. Korea Times photo by Park Jun-kyu The North Korean side of Mount Paektu, an active stratovolcano on the North Korean-Chinese border, is expected to be designated as a UNESCO Global Geopark next month, sources said Sunday. UNESCO said its executive board is set to meet from April 2-17 to review 16 sites for Global Geopark designation, including Mount Paektu. The session follows the UNESCO Global Geopark Council's proposal to endorse those sites as Global Geopark networks. The executive board typically endorses Geopark designations as proposed by the council, making it almost certain that Mount Paektu will be listed as North Korea's first UNESCO Global Geopark. UNESCO Global Geoparks are single, unified geographical areas where sites and landscapes of international geological significance are managed with a holistic concept of protection, education and sustainable development, according to UNESCO. Its executive board designated the Chinese side of the mountain as Mount Changbaishan UNESCO Global Geopark under its Chinese name last year. North Korea sought the UNESCO listing for the mountain in 2019, a year before China, but China secured the designation first as an on-site inspection in North Korea was delayed due to the COVID-19 pandemic. "The Geopark is marked by spectacular volcano-geological heritage and landscapes made up by volcanic eruptions," the UNESCO said of the mountain. "The territory...

title: Trump orders national security impact probe on lumber imports, could target Korean kitchen cabinets
creator: yonhap@koreatimes.co.kr(KoreaTimes)
content: U.S. President Donald Trump pumps his fist as he steps from Air Force One upon his arrival in West Palm Beach, Fla., U.S., Feb. 28. Reuters-Yonhap U.S. President Donald Trump signed an executive order Saturday to launch an investigation into the impact of lumber and timber imports on America's national security, a move that could lead to a new tariff imposition. Trump directed Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick to initiate the probe, saying the United States faces "significant" vulnerabilities in the wood supply chain from imported timber, lumber and their derivative products being dumped onto the U.S. market. A White House official mentioned South Korea and China as he stressed the probe will also target derivative products, including kitchen cabinets. It is to proceed under Section 232 of the Trade Expansion Act of 1962 that allows the president to impose import restrictions if an import threatens to hurt national security. On the same day, Trump also inked an executive order designed to increase domestic timber production and help reduce construction and housing costs in the U.S. Timber refers to unprocessed trees or tree parts, while lumber refers to processed wood. "Our disastrous timber and lumber policies, the legacy of the previous administration, trigger wildfires and degrade our fish and wildlife habitats," the official told reporters in a telephonic press briefing. "They drive up construction and housing costs, and impoverish America through large trade deficits...

title: George Harris, Naya Fácil, Paola Volpato y el apagón: Pedro Ruminot fulmina al Festival de Viña 2025 en el inicio de su rutina
creator: José Ferrada
content: El humorista chileno saco carcajadas con sus críticas a la edición 64 del certamen, adelantando que su rutina será una de las que más sacará carcajadas en la Quinta Vergara. “Siempre pasa algo”. Con estas palabras comenzó su rutina Pedro Ruminot , el encargado de cerrar el humor de la edición o64 del Festival de Viña . El humorista con más de 20 años de experiencia partió su rutina haciendo ácidos comentarios sobre la cancelación de la tercera noche festival por culpa del apagón, asegurando que la “producción del Festival es como las h...”. Pero eso no fue todo, porque Ruminot hizo referencia a George Harris en su presentación , burlándose de su comentario “tengo más de 20 años de experiencia” y que estaba tan aburrido “ encerrado con Morat y Sebastián Yatra ” que hasta se rieron con su rutina. Ruminot también hizo comentarios sobre Paola Volpato y su cuestionada animación, sacando carcajadas de la Quinta Vergara, prometiendo uno de los shows que más logrará sacar risas del “Monstruo” . Un poco más adelante, bromeó con Naya Fácil, los “facilines” y la frustrada Gala del Pueblo , para la cual la influencer incluso pidió transferencias antes que se suspendieran. Recordemos que esta noche la cierra Sebastián Yatra, artista colombiano que pondrá broche de oro al Festival de Viña 2025.

title: वाल्मिक कराड कैदेत असलेल्या बीडच्या कारागृहातील सीसीटीव्ही कॅमेरे बंद, धक्कादायक माहिती समोर
creator: Namrata Patil
content: मस्साजोगचे सरपंच संतोष देशमुख हत्या प्रकरणात नवनवीन खुलासे होत आहेत. यातील खंडणी प्रकरणी वाल्मिक कराड अटकेत आहेत. वाल्मिक कराड कैदेत असलेल्या बीड जिल्ह्यातल्या कारागृहातील सीसीटीव्ही कॅमेरे बंद अवस्थेत असल्याची धक्कादायक माहिती समोर आली आहे. कारागृहातील काही महत्वाच्या ठिकाणांचे आणि बराकमधील कॅमेरे बंद असल्याचे समोर आले आहे. संतोष देशमुख हत्या प्रकरणातील आरोपी वाल्मिक कराडला कारागृहात व्हिआयपी सुरक्षा मिळत असल्याचा आरोप होत आहे. संतोष देशमुखांच्या निकटवर्तीयांनी कारागृहातील सीसीटीव्हींच्या फुटेजची आरटीआयमध्ये मागणी केली आहे. मात्र कारागृह अधीक्षकांचे एक पत्र सध्या समोर आले असून त्या पत्रात कॅमेरे बंद असल्याचे म्हणण्यात आले आहे. कारागृहात सीसीटीव्ही कॅमेरे बसवेलल्या डी एम सेल्स कॉर्पोरेशन या संस्थेला हे पत्र कारागृह अधीक्षकानी दिले असून यात कॅमेरे दुरुस्त करण्यास सांगितले आहे. कॅमेरे बंद तर आहेतच शिवाय बैकअप साठी असणाऱ्या यंत्रणेची केबलही जळाली असल्याच पत्रात म्हणण्यात आलय. बातमी अपडेट होत आहे....

title: Efraín Juárez es un inicio, pero aún falta mucho que corregir en Pumas, aseguran aficionados
creator: Pablo Sánchez
content: La afición de Pumas se mostró emocionada por el regreso del canterano, pero sabe que no es solo trabajo del técnico. Después de que Gustavo Lema fuera destituido como director técnico de Pumas tras sumar 4 derrotas, 3 victorias y 2 empates en lo que va del Clausura 2025, Efraín Juárez adelantó que sería el encargado de tomar el timón azul y oro para redirigirlo el rumbo de los Universitarios, cosa que emocionó a los aficionados.Te podría interesar: Efraín Juárez aterrizó en la CDMX para firmar con Pumas: “Se van a sentir identificados por lo que es Universidad”“Es de casa, es lo principal. Yo creo que muchos otros además de mi le tenemos confianza total, solo es darle tiempo, va a funcionar”, señaló Ragnar, seguidor de Pumas para el Diario de los Deportistas.Efraín Juárez ilusiona a la afición universitariaAlgo que distingue a Juárez de los últimos técnicos que lo precedieron en el banquillo felino es la estrecha relación que mantiene su carrera con los Pumas, pues no solo salió de la cantera, sino que también ganó a los 21 años su primer título a nivel de clubes al portar la casaca auriazul.“Es una perfecta opción. Tiene el ADN Puma, sabe lo que es tener la garra, viene de la cantera y va a regresar a Pumas a lo que era antes”, afirmó Manu, integrante de la Curva Orquesta para el ESTO.Es un inicio, pero no es la solución completa Los fanáticos de Pumas están contentos con la llegada de Efraín Juárez, pero saben que la mala racha no se va...

title: Kerala: MVD to crack down on auto rickshaws not using fare meters; Know how to lodge a complaint
content: Palakkad: The Motor Vehicles Department has initiated action against auto rickshaws in Palakkad that are not operating fare meters. Earlier, the department had announced that from March 1st, it would be mandatory for auto rickshaws to use fare meters. As part of this initiative, the department conducted an inspection in Palakkad town on the first day, taking action against 12 auto rickshaws. A fine of Rs 250 was imposed on those without meters, while Rs 2,000 was charged for the lack of a fitness certificate. Of the 10 auto rickshaws inspected, although they had meters installed, they were not in operation. Additionally, two auto rickshaws lacked fitness certificates. Palakkad RTO C.U. Mujeeb stated that strict action, including the cancellation of fitness certificates, will be taken against repeated offenders. During the fitness inspection on Saturday, it was confirmed that eight auto rickshaws had stickers on them stating, "Free ride if the fare meter is not working," as part of the ongoing checks. The action in Palakkad district is part of a state-level initiative aimed at preventing excessive charging and any related arguments by ensuring that all auto rickshaws use fare meters. When asked about auto rickshaws operating without meters, passengers mentioned that, due to fewer rides, drivers in the district found using meters ‘inconvenient’. Passengers can file complaints regarding auto rickshaws without meters, and those who have video or photographic evidence of such...

title: $2.84 பில்லியன் கடன் ஒப்பந்தம்; உக்ரைனில் ஆயுத உற்பத்தி - பிரிட்டன் விசிட்டில் நடந்தது என்ன?
content: Volodymyr Zelenskyy: உக்ரைன் ஜனாதிபதி வோலோடிமிர் ஜெலென்ஸ்கியின் அமெரிக்கப் பயணம் ஒரு மோசமான அனுபவமாக இருந்தது. அமெரிக்காவைத் தொடர்ந்து பிரிட்டனுக்கு வந்த ஜெலென்ஸ்கியை, பிரிட்டன் பிரதமர் கீர் ஸ்டார்மர் டவுனிங் ஸ்ட்ரீட் அலுவலகத்தில் அன்புடன் வரவேற்றார். இந்த சந்திப்பின்போது, ​​உக்ரைனின் இராணுவ திறன்களை மேலும் வலுப்படுத்தும் நோக்கில், பிரிட்டனுக்கும் உக்ரைனுக்கும் இடையே 2.84 பில்லியன் டாலர் பாதுகாப்பு கடன் ஒப்பந்தம் கையெழுத்தானது. இந்த ஒப்பந்தம் குறித்து கருத்து தெரிவித்த ஜனாதிபதி ஜெலென்ஸ்கி, இந்த தொகை ஆயுத உற்பத்திக்கு பயன்படுத்தப்படும் என்றார். இந்த ஒப்பந்தம் உக்ரைனுக்கான தனது "உறுதியான மற்றும் தொடர்ச்சியான அர்ப்பணிப்புக்கான" சான்று என்று பிரிட்டிஷ் அரசாங்கம் கூறியுள்ளது. பிரிட்டன் பிரதமர் கீர் ஸ்டார்மர் ஜெலென்ஸ்கியை வரவேற்று கூறியதாவது: "டவுனிங் தெருவுக்கு உங்களை அன்புடன் வரவேற்கிறேன். வெளியில் மக்களின் உற்சாகத்தையும் ஆதரவையும் நீங்கள் கேட்டது போல், பிரிட்டனில் உங்களுக்கு முழு ஆதரவு உள்ளது. தேவைப்படும் வரை உக்ரைனுக்கும் உங்களுக்கும் நாங்கள் துணை நிற்போம்." உக்ரைன் ஜனாதிபதி வோலோடிமிர் ஜெலென்ஸ்கி மற்றும் பிரிட்டன் பிரதமர் கீர் ஸ்டார்மர் இடையே 75 நிமிடங்கள் மூடிய கதவுகளுக்குப் பின் தீவிர விவாதம் நடைபெற்றது. இந்த முக்கியமான சந்திப்புக்குப் பிறகு ஜெலென்ஸ்கி தனது காரை நோக்கிச் சென்றபோது, ​​இரு தலைவர்களும் ஒருவரையொருவர் கட்டிப்பிடித்து ஒற்றுமையை வெளிப்படுத்தினர். உக்ரைனுடன் துணை நிற்கும் பிரிட்டிஷ் பிரதமர் அலுவலகமான டவுனிங் ஸ்ட்ரீட் இந்த சந்திப்பை வரலாற்று சிறப்புமிக்கது என்று கூறி அறிக்கை வெளியிட்டது. அதில், பிரதமர் ஸ்டார்மர் உக்ரைனுக்கான தனது முழு ஆதரவை மீண்டும்...

title: 2PM’s Lee Junho Suffers Sexual Harassment By Foreign Fan
creator: Koreaboo
content: 2PM ‘s Junho was recently inappropriately touched by a fan. Junho is currently on his Midnight Sun fan-con tour, most recently in São Paulo, Brazil. The idol-actor greeted fans for the first time during the special event. During one part of the show, Junho leaned down to allow a fan to take a photo with him. However, the fan instead wrapped their arms around his neck and pulled him down, kissing him on the cheek. The idol stands back up, seemingly laughing off the moment before moving away. Many argued that despite the fan’s intentions and their culture potentially being more open about affection, Junho should have been asked for consent. title: Red Wings Stunned Late, Drop Stadium Series to Columbus 5–3
creator: The Hockey News - Detroit Red Wings
content: The Detroit Red Wings spent most of Saturday night's Stadium Series game against the Blue Jackets at Ohio Stadium in Columbus chasing. They never led, and, after Denton Mateychuk scored the opening goal five minutes into the second period, Detroit couldn't manage to stay tied for so much as four minutes running. The Red Wings played their best hockey of the night in the third period, peppering Jackets goaltender Elvis Merzlikins with 21 shots. With just under 3:30 to play, Detroit finally found the breakthrough it had been building toward: a perfectly placed Alex DeBrincat wrist shot from the high slot, tying the game at three. After finally converting at the conclusion of a period-long barrage, the Red Wings looked well positioned for at least one point out of the night's action, and the full two points were also squarely within their sights. Instead, Justin Danforth stunned the visitors and delighted the home fans with a controversial goal just a minute and seven seconds after DeBrincat's equalizer. He'd fought his way through Simon Edvinsson, catching the towering Swedish defenseman in the face with his stick on the way past. Danforth then blasted a slap shot, which Red Wings goaltender Cam Talbot stopped, only for Danforth to pounce on the rebound and tuck it home for the game-winning goal with the clock showing just 2:17 to play. Adam Fantilli would add an empty netter, and Columbus earned a 5–3 victory. Bookmark The Hockey News Detroit Red Wings team site to stay...

title: ¿Tendrá sanción? Toluca comete error infantil ante el América y podría tener graves consecuencias
creator: Emiliano Pereira Garcia
content: La victoria del América ante el Toluca por 3-0 en el Estadio Ciudad de los Deportes tuvo varias situaciones particulares. Una de ellas salió directamente de las redes sociales, en un detalle que notaron los aficionados azulcrema y que rápidamente se viralizó.Está claro que no fue la mejor noche para el conjunto escarlata, que presentó errores en todas sus líneas e incluso también en el cuerpo técnico. ¿Qué pasó con el Turco Mohamed y sus asistentes? Ver También Liga MX: América vence al Toluca como local, pero las polémicas manchan su victoria en el Clausura 2025 ¿Qué problema tuvo el Toluca ante el América?Sin dudas que fue uno de los partidos más esperados por los seguidores de la Liga MX y tuvo de todo. Más allá de los golazos que le dieron la victoria a los de Coapa, las polémicas marcaron el encuentro en varios momentos.Una de ellas fue el gol que no convalidaron para los Diablos Rojos, pero que efectivamente era válido. Sin embargo, el resultado final ya no se puede cambiar y además, se reveló un insólito error por parte del Turco Mohamed y sus ayudantes.Los aficionados del América, muy atentos a lo que pasaba en el campo de juego, notaron que el Toluca estaba con más extranjeros en cancha de lo permitido. Según el reglamento de la Liga MX, se puede contar con 9 futbolistas foráneos, pero sólo siete pueden estar en el campo de juego al mismo tiempo.Y es cierto, el equipo escarlata tuvo en cancha en simultaneo a Pau López, Bruno Méndez,...

title: 2-0. Los New York Red Bulls superan al Nashville y estrenan su casillero de victorias
creator: Newsroom Infobae
content: Harrison (EE.UU.), 1 mar (EFE).- Los New York Red Bulls, finalistas el año pasado de la MLS Cup, se impusieron este sábado por 2-0 al Nashville y sellaron su primer triunfo en la temporada 2025 de la MLS. El joven ghanés Mohammed Sofo y el veterano sueco Emil Forsberg anotaron los goles del partido, ambos en la primera mitad. El Sports Illustrated Stadium de Harrison (Nueva Jersey, EE.UU.) acogió este duelo de la segunda jornada de la MLS en una noche fría con unos 3 grados centígrados cuando sonó el pitido inicial y temperaturas ya bajo cero cuando terminó. Los dos equipos llegaban con deberes a este encuentro después de que los Red Bulls perdieran por 1-0 ante el Cincinnati en la primera jornada y de que el Nashville firmara un 0-0 en casa ante el New England Revolution. Por los Red Bulls, Eric Maxim Choupo-Moting se estrenaba esta noche ante su nueva afición y el exdelantero del Bayern Munich no tardó nada en dejar detalles de calidad en ataque. En el minuto 7, un remate de Choupo-Moting desde la frontal acabó en el palo, pero el rechace lo cazó un atento Sofo para anotar el 1-0 ante la portería vacía. El conjunto de Nashville arriesgó con una defensa muy adelantada y con su línea de cuatro en la divisoria del terreno de juego. Pero el combinado local, con la confianza del marcador a su favor, tuvo paciencia para superar esa presión y encontrar huecos por ambas bandas. En el 27, Choupo-Moting acarició su primer gol en la MLS con un potente misil desde...

title: サッカー=クリスタルパレスがFA杯8強入り、鎌田は出場せず
content: [ロンドン 1日 ロイター] - サッカーのイングランド協会カップ(FA杯)は1日、各地で5回戦の試合を行い、鎌田大地が所属するクリスタルパレスはミルウォール(2部)に3─1で勝利。8強入りを果たした。 クリスタルパレスは開始早々にFWジャンフィリップ・マテタが負傷交代となるアクシデントに見舞われた。マテタは前半6分、ロングボールをクリアしようとした相手GKリアム・ロバーツに頭部を蹴られて負傷。ピッチ上で酸素吸入を受けた後、病院に搬送された。 ロバーツは退場処分となり、クリスタルパレスは前半に2得点。後半にエディ・エンケティアがダメ押しの3点目を決めた。鎌田はベンチ入りしたが、出場しなかった。 同大会8回目の優勝を目指すマンチェスター・シティーはプリマス(2部)に3─1で逆転勝ち。ボーンマスは1─1で迎えたPK戦を5─4で制し、ウルバーハンプトンを退けた。 三笘薫が所属するブライトンは2日の5回戦でニューカッスルと対戦。前回王者マンチェスター・ユナイテッドはフラムと戦う。

title: El secretario general de la OTAN instó a Zelensky a recomponer su relación con Donald Trump tras su tensa reunión en la Casa Blanca
content: El secretario general de la OTAN, Mark Rutte, instó al presidente de Ucrania, Volodimir Zelensky, a reparar su relación con el mandatario estadounidense, Donald Trump, tras la tensa reunión pública que ambos sostuvieron el viernes en la Casa Blanca, según declaraciones recogidas por la BBC.“He hablado dos veces por teléfono con el presidente Zelensky para decirle lo siguiente: hay que permanecer unidos, Estados Unidos, Ucrania y Europa, para llevar a Ucrania a una paz duradera”, afirmó Rutte en la entrevista.El jefe de la OTAN defendió la postura de Trump en relación con Ucrania, asegurando que se debe “respetar lo que ha hecho hasta el momento” y recordó la entrega de misiles antitanque Javelin a Kiev durante su primer mandato (2017-2020).“Sin esos misiles, Ucrania no habría tenido ninguna oportunidad” frente a la invasión rusa, añadió Rutte. El secretario general enfatizó la necesidad de evitar divisiones entre los aliados occidentales en un momento crítico para el conflicto en Ucrania.Por su parte, Zelensky reafirmó este sábado su agradecimiento al apoyo de Estados Unidos, pese al tenso encuentro que mantuvo el viernes con el mandatario estadounidense. En un mensaje publicado en sus redes sociales, el mandatario ucraniano subrayó que ambos países siguen siendo “socios estratégicos” y destacó la importancia de la ayuda de Washington en la guerra contra Rusia.“Estamos muy agradecidos a Estados Unidos por todo el apoyo. Doy las gracias al presidente...

title: Гражданские самолеты нарушили воздушное пространство у резиденции Трампа
content: Три гражданских самолета нарушили воздушное пространство рядом с поместьем президента США Дональда Трампа Мар-а-Лаго в штате Флорида, сообщил ведущий телеканала Newsmax Тодд Старнс в соцсети Х (Twitter). Самолеты сопроводили истребители F-16. Все три инцидента произошли в течение двух часов. «Во время двух перехватов истребителям пришлось выпустить осветительные ракеты», — написал Старнс. Все три воздушных судна благополучно вывели из опасной зоны, добавил журналист. Резиденция Трампа, где он проводит выходные, находится в городе Палм-Бич. Это закрытая территория в 5,8 тыс. кв. м, в поместье расположены построенный в 1927 году особняк, спа-зоны и поля для гольфа. Читайте РБК в Telegram .

title: Harrison Ford withdraws from Oscars ceremony after shingles diagnosis
content: Harrison Ford strolled the red carpet at the 2024 Critics Choice Awards, where he will receive the Career Achievement Award. Harrison Ford will no longer be presenting at the Academy Awards this Sunday after he was diagnosed with shingles, according to several reports. The 82-year-old actor is doing well and resting following the diagnosis on Friday, Entertainment Weekly reported. Shingles is a painful rash illness that happens when the virus that causes chickenpox reactivates in a person’s body after they’ve had chickenpox, according to the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. About one in three Americans will get shingles in their lifetime, and it can sometimes lead to complications like long-term nerve pain or even vision loss. HARRISON FORD DISMISSES AI'S POWER TO ‘STEAL MY SOUL’ Harrison Ford will no longer be presenting at the Academy Awards this Sunday after he was diagnosed with shingles, according to several reports. (Savion Washington/GA/The Hollywood Reporter via Getty Images) The best way to protect against the disease is a vaccination, the CDC says. It’s unclear if Ford had been vaccinated against it. title: West Bengal Weather Update 2nd March: মার্চেই ৪০ ডিগ্রি ছুঁতে পারে তাপমাত্রা, কোন কোন জেলায় তাপপ্রবাহের আশঙ্কা?
creator: Priyanka Dutta
content: রাজ্যে গরমের দাপট বাড়ছে, মার্চেই তাপমাত্রা ছুঁতে পারে ৪০ ডিগ্রিতে। পশ্চিমবঙ্গে (West Bengal Weather Update) গ্রীষ্মের শুরুতেই তাপমাত্রা বাড়তে শুরু করেছে। আবহাওয়া দফতরের পূর্বাভাস বলছে, মার্চের মাঝামাঝি সময়েই কলকাতার পারদ ৪০ ডিগ্রি ছুঁতে পারে। রাজ্যের অন্যান্য জেলাতেও তাপমাত্রার ঊর্ধ্বগতি বজায় থাকবে বলে আশঙ্কা করা হচ্ছে। যদিও রাজ্যের উত্তর থেকে দক্ষিণে আগামী পাঁচ দিন তাপমাত্রার কোনও হেরফের হবে না। দার্জিলিঙে (Darjeeling Weather) হালকার বৃষ্টির সঙ্গে হতে পারে তুষারপাত। দক্ষিণবঙ্গ আপাতত শুষ্কই থাকবে। তাপপ্রবাহের সম্ভাবনা, সতর্কবার্তা জারি ভারতীয় আবহাওয়া দফতর (IMD) দেশের বেশ কয়েকটি রাজ্যে তাপপ্রবাহের (Heatwave) পূর্বাভাস দিলেও পশ্চিমবঙ্গ সেই তালিকায় নেই। তবে, পশ্চিমাঞ্চলের জেলাগুলিতে তাপপ্রবাহের সম্ভাবনা থাকায় সতর্কবার্তা দেওয়া হয়েছে। বৃষ্টি হলেও কমবে না গরম আলিপুর আবহাওয়া দফতরের তথ্য অনুযায়ী, রাজস্থানে একটি ঘূর্ণাবর্ত সক্রিয় রয়েছে, যার ফলে দেশের কিছু অংশে বজ্রবিদ্যুৎ-সহ বৃষ্টি হতে পারে। তবে এতে গরম কমার সম্ভাবনা নেই। উত্তরবঙ্গে বৃষ্টি, দক্ষিণবঙ্গে শুষ্ক আবহাওয়া আগামী সপ্তাহে দার্জিলিং, কালিম্পং, জলপাইগুড়ি, আলিপুরদুয়ার, উত্তর দিনাজপুর ও কোচবিহারে হালকা বৃষ্টির সম্ভাবনা রয়েছে। উঁচু পার্বত্য অঞ্চলে তুষারপাতের সম্ভাবনাও রয়েছে। তবে দক্ষিণবঙ্গে বৃষ্টির সম্ভাবনা প্রায় নেই। রবিবারও দার্জিলিঙে হালকার বৃষ্টির সম্ভাবনা রয়েছে। সেই সঙ্গে তুষারপাতের পূর্বাভাসও দিয়েছে হাওয়া অফিস। তবে উত্তরের বাকি জেলা বৃষ্টির কোনও সম্ভাবনা নেই। হাওয়া অফিস জানিয়েছে, আগামী শুক্রবার পর্যন্ত শুষ্ক থাকবে উত্তরবঙ্গ। তাপপ্রবাহ চলবে মে পর্যন্ত, সতর্কতা প্রয়োজন আবহাওয়া বিশেষজ্ঞদের মতে,...

title: Class 11 CAP expanded statewide
content: MUMBAI: The state government has announced that the Centralised Admission Process (CAP) for first-year junior college (FYJC) or Class 11 will be expanded to cover entire Maharashtra. Until now, the system was limited to five urban regions: Mumbai Metropolitan Region (MMR), Pune-Pimpri Chinchwad, Amravati, Nagpur and Nashik. The government has also decided that after completing the regular four rounds of admission, junior college classes should commence. Following this, open admission will be available to all students at the junior college level, with admissions being granted based on merit. The divisional deputy director of education will be responsible for issuing the necessary orders to higher secondary schools and junior colleges. The decision has drawn criticism from activists, who argue that allowing colleges to handle open admissions independently could lead to corruption in the FYJC admission process. The CAP system was first introduced in MMR in 2009-10 and later extended to Pune-Pimpri Chinchwad in 2014-15, aiming to streamline the admission process through a common online counselling mechanism. With the latest expansion, students from all districts across the state will now have access to a uniform, transparent and efficient admission system. The move is intended to simplify the process, reduce delays, and ensure fairness, particularly benefiting students from rural areas. Under the revised system, junior college admissions will take place through four regular...

title: யார் அந்த ரம்யா? 5 படத்துக்கும் ஒரே பெயரா? குட் பேட் அக்லீ படத்துக்கும் அதே பேர வச்ச ஆதிக் ரவிச்சந்திரன்!
content: Adhik Ravichandran Select Same Name Ramya For All His Movies in Tamil : த்ரிஷா இல்லனா நயன்தாரா படம் மூலமாக இயக்குநராக அறிமுகமானவர் ஆதிக் ரவிச்சந்திரன். டபுள் மீனிங் காமெடி கதையை மையப்படுத்திய இந்தப் படம் ரசிகர்களிடையே நல்ல வரவேற்பு பெற்றது. ஜிவி பிரகாஷ், ஆனந்தி, மணீஷா யாதவ், சிம்ரன், விடிவி கணேஷ் என்று ஏராளமான நட்சத்திரங்கள் நடித்திருந்தனர். கேமியோ ரோலில் ஆதிக் ரவிச்சந்திரன் நடித்திருந்தார். இந்தப் படத்தில் ஹீரோயின் ஆனந்தி ரம்யா என்ற ரோலில் நடித்திருந்தார். 2015 ஆம் ஆண்டு திரைக்கு வந்த இந்தப் படத்திற்கு பிறகு அன்பானவன் அசராதவன் அடங்காதவன் படத்தை இயக்கினார். இந்தப் படத்தில் சிம்பு, தமன்னா, ஷ்ரேயா, விடிவி கணேஷ், கோவை சரளா ஆகியோர் பலர் நடித்திருந்தனர். ஆனால், இந்தப் படம் போதுமான வரவேற்பு பெறவில்லை. இந்தப் படத்திலும் ஆதிக் ரவிச்சந்திரன் கேமியோ ரோலில் நடித்திருந்தார். இந்தப் படத்தில் தமன்னாவை ரம்யா என்ற ரோலில் நடிக்க வைத்திருந்தார் இயக்குநர். மூன்றாவதாக ஆதிக் ரவிச்சந்திரன் இயக்கத்தில் பகீரா படம் வெளியானது. இதில், பிரபு தேவா, ஸ்ரீகாந்த், அமிரா தஸ்தூர், காயத்ரி, ரெம்யா நம்பீசன், ஜனனி என்று ஏராளமான நட்சத்திரங்கள் நடித்திருந்தனர். இந்தப் படத்தில் அமைரா தஸ்தூர் ரம்யா என்ற ரோலில் நடித்திருந்தார். கடைசியாக ஆதிக் இயக்கத்தில் மார்க் ஆண்டனி படம் வெளியானது. இதுவரையில் வந்த படங்களில் இந்தப் படம் வசூல் ரீதியாகவும், விமர்சன ரீதியாகவும் நல்ல வரவேற்பு பெற்றது. இந்தப் படத்தில் விஷால் இரட்டை வேடங்களில் நடித்திருந்தார். இதே போன்று தான் எஸ் ஜே சூர்யாவும் இரட்டை வேடங்களில் நடித்திருந்தார். இவர்கள் தவிர ரிது வர்மா, செல்வராகவன், அபிநயா, ரெடின் கிங்ஸ்லி ஆகியோர் பலர் நடித்திருந்தனர். இந்தப்...

title: Knapp sigue liderando en el PGA National, seguido por más de una docena aspirantes reales
creator: Agencia AP
content: PALM BEACH GARDENS, Florida, EE.UU. (AP) — Jake Knapp sobrevivió a un sábado salvaje en el Cognizant Classic y evitó la calamidad en el problemático hoyo 15 par-tres, anotándose un par de birdies postreros. El californiano entregó una tarjeta de 68 golpes, tres debajo del par, y conservó la ventaja de un impacto, de cara a la ronda final en el PGA National. Knapp, quien abrió el torneo con un marcador asombroso de 59, comenzó la tercera ronda con una ventaja de un golpe y estaba tres atrás cuando cubrió la mitad del campo. Embocó un putt de 12 pies para birdie en el hoyo 16 y terminó con un chip y putt de birdie en el hoyo de cierre par-cinco para mantenerse al frente. “Un poco descontrolado”, dijo Knapp, quien tiene un acumulado de 197 golpes, 16 bajo par. Justo detrás se ubicó Michael Kim — y casi dos docenas de golfistas más. Hubo tanto movimiento en esta cautivadora tercera ronda que diez jugadores compartieron al menos la punta en un momento. Algunos de ellos fueron descarrilados por el hoyo 15, que se juega a 163 yardas sobre una trampa de agua enmarcada por un muro de roca. Taylor Montgomery, quien tuvo seis birdies en los primeros nueve hoyos y fue el primer jugador en alcanzar 15 bajo par, tenía una ventaja de un golpe cuando sumergió dos tiros de salida en el hoyo 15. El primero fue un tiro recto que casi golpea a un caimán en el agua. El segundo, desde el área de caída, rodó de regreso a la hendidura de una roca. Esto sumó siete golpes para...

title: Talleres, otra derrota por errores propios: aquí las clave
creator: Javier Flores
content: Talleres no puede arrancar en el campeonato y mientras espera la final de la Supercopa Internacional del miércoles con River en Paraguay, perdió con River con estas clave: Historia repetida I. Talleres arrancó para comerse crudo a Tigre, le generó seis chances claras de gol que no pudo plasmar en la red y fue el Matador de Victoria el que se puso en ventaja, otra vez con un error defensivo impensado, a los 34 minutos. Esta vez fue de Benavídez, quien en su intención de darle un pase atrás a Guido le regaló la pelota a Romero y “el Rulo” pasó a cobrar. La revancha del “Chaco”. Benavídez, en un día especial en el que fue padre por primera vez, tuvo su desquite 9 minutos después. A los 44′ inició la jugada, lo habilitó a Depietri, fue a buscar la devolución al área rival y consiguió el empate que la “T” merecía. Historia repetida II. Sin Rick en la cancha por una lesión y con Botta en su reemplazo, y cuando intentaba acomodarse en el ST, otro error en el retroceso de su bloque defensivo le posibilitó a Tigre para marcar el segundo y quedarse con el partido en el que Talleres volvió a fallar en las dos áreas y lo terminó pagando muy caro. title: Trump Orders New Tariff Probe into U.S. Lumber Imports
creator: 桜井
content: Reuters 11:46 JST, March 2, 2025 WASHINGTON (Reuters) – U.S. President Donald Trump on Saturday ordered a new trade investigation that could heap more tariffs on imported lumber, adding to existing duties on Canadian softwood lumber and 25% tariffs on all Canadian and Mexican goods due next week. In his third new tariff probe in a week, Trump signed a memo ordering Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick to initiate a national security investigation into U.S. lumber imports under Section 232 of the Trade Expansion Act of 1962. The trade law is the one Trump also used to impose tariffs on global steel and aluminum imports. The probe covers derivative products made from lumber which could include furniture such as kitchen cabinets, which in some cases are made of U.S. lumber that had been exported. The order said the Commerce Department investigation must be completed within 270 days. Trump also ordered new steps within 90 days to increase the domestic supply of lumber by streamlining the permitting process for harvesting lumber from public lands and improving the salvage of fallen trees from forests and waterways. The order calls for new or updated agency guidance to facilitate increased timber production, including quicker approvals for forestry projects under the Endangered Species Act. White House trade adviser Peter Navarro said the lumber import probe would counteract the actions of big lumber exporters including Canada, Germany and Brazil, which he said were “dumping lumber...

title: किसानों को CM मोहन यादव का तोहफा, धान की खेती पर मिलेंगे प्रति हेक्टेयर 4000 रुपये
content: मुख्यमंत्री डॉ. मोहन यादव ने किसानों के लिए बड़ी घोषणा की है। उन्होंने कहा कि प्रदेश के धान उत्पादक किसानों को धान उपार्जन पर प्रति हेक्टेयर 4000 रुपये की प्रोत्साहन राशि इसी माह प्रदान की जाएगी। मुख्यमंत्री डॉ. मोहन यादव ने कहा कि राज्य सरकार ने किसानों के कल्याण के लिए यह ऐतिहासिक निर्णय लिया है। उन्होंने आगे कहा कि किसानों को पहले भी कई सौगातें दी गई हैं। मध्य प्रदेश में गेहूं उपार्जन पर 2600 रुपये प्रति क्विंटल की दर से भुगतान का निर्णय लिया गया। वहीं मुख्यमंत्री डॉ. मोहन यादव ने बताया कि धान उत्पादक पात्र किसानों को धान उपार्जन किए जाने पर प्रति हेक्टेयर 4 हजार रूपये की अतिरिक्त राशि प्रदान करने का महत्वपूर्ण निर्णय लिया गया है। राज्य सरकार संकल्प पत्र के अनुसार जन कल्याण के महत्वपूर्ण निर्णय निरंतर ले रही है। इससे पहले भी किसानों के हित को ध्यान में रखते हुए केन बेतवा नदी जोड़ो परियोजना पर काम किया जा रहा है। यह परियोजना भी किसानों के लिए कृषि उत्पादन बढ़ाने में सहायक सिद्ध होगी। सीएम मोहन यादव ने कहा कि प्रदेश की समृद्धि में ऐसी परियोजनाएं महत्वपूर्ण होंगी। उन्होंने प्रदेश के किसानों को धान उपार्जन पर प्रोत्साहन राशि के लिए बधाई भी दी। सीएम मोहन यादव ने कहा कि गेहूं उत्पादक किसानों को भी प्रति क्विंटल 175 रूपये अतिरिक्त बोनस राशि दी जायेगी। उन्होंने कहा कि मूल्य संवर्धन योजना (प्राइस सपोर्ट स्कीम) के तहत वर्ष 2024 में 6.69 लाख किसानों द्वारा 12.2 लाख हेक्टेयर रकबे में उत्पादित धान का विक्रय किया गया है। धान उत्पादक किसानों को मुख्यमंत्री कृषक प्रोन्नति योजना में प्रति हेक्टेयर 4000 रूपये का लाभ मिलेगा। इससे प्रदेश के किसानों को 488 करोड़ रूपये का अतिरिक्त लाभ होगा।...

title: Late goal lifts Jackets over Wings in Stadium Series
creator: Field Level Media
content: Justin Danforth scored the go-ahead goal with 2:17 left and Elvis Merzlikins made 43 saves to lead the Columbus Blue Jackets over the Detroit Red Wings 5-3 in the Stadium Series on Saturday night at chilly Ohio Stadium in Columbus. Denton Mateychuk, Dmitri Voronkov, Mathieu Olivier and Adam Fantilli also scored, Zach Werenski and Boone Jenner each had two assists and Danforth added an assist for Columbus, which leapfrogged Detroit into the Eastern Conference's top wild-card spot with its fourth straight win. Alex DeBrincat scored twice and Patrick Kane had a goal and two assists for Detroit. Cam Talbot finished with 16 saves for the Red Wings. Danforth drove past defenseman Simon Edvinsson at the blue line and then put in a rebound of his own shot for the game-winner. Fantilli then sealed the win with an empty-netter with 1:08 to go. The crowd of 94,751, braving 27-degree temperatures with a wind chill of 17 degrees, was the second largest ever to watch an NHL game behind only the 2014 Winter Classic crowd of 105,491 at Michigan Stadium in Ann Arbor, Mich. Columbus took a 1-0 lead at 5:31 mark of the second period when Mateychuk fired a wrist shot from the bottom of the left circle into the top far corner. Detroit tied it midway through the period with a power -play goal when DeBrincat, stationed by the left post, slammed in a crossing pass from Kane. The goal extended DeBrincat's point streak to nine games, matching his career high set with the Chicago Blackhawks from Jan....

title: Thousands flee after Japan's biggest wildfire in decades
content: TOKYO: Thousands of people have been evacuated from parts of northern Japan as the country's largest wildfire in three decades raged unabated on Sunday (Mar 2) after killing at least one person, officials said. Around 2,000 people fled areas around the northern Japan city of Ofunato to stay with friends or relatives, while more than 1,200 were evacuated to shelters, according to officials. "We're still examining the size of the affected area, but it is the biggest since the 1992 wildfire" in Kushiro, Hokkaido, a disaster management agency spokesman told AFP on Saturday. Some reports estimated the fire had spread over 1,800ha. Aerial footage by the Japan Broadcasting Corporation (NHK) showed columns of white smoke billowing, four days after the blaze first materialised, with military helicopters trying to douse them. One burnt body has been discovered so far, with more than 80 buildings damaged and around 1,700 firefighters mobilised from across the country. The number of wildfires has declined since the peak in the 1970s, according to government data, but there were about 1,300 across Japan in 2023 - concentrated in the February to April period when the air dries and winds pick up.

title: Рубио подписал документ об ускорении поставок оружия Израилю
content: Москва. 2 марта. INTERFAX.RU - Госсекретарь США Марко Рубио объявил, что подписал документ об ускорении поставок Израилю вооружений на $4 млрд. "Я подписал декларацию об использовании чрезвычайных полномочий для ускорения предоставления военной помощи Израилю на сумму около $4 млрд", - говорится в сообщении на сайте американского Госдепа. Рубио отметил, что решение принято в соответствии с отменой американским президентом Дональдом Трампом введенного предыдущей администрацией частичного эмбарго на поставки Израилю ряда видов оружия и боеприпасов. "С момента вступления в должность администрация Трампа одобрила крупные продажи Израилю вооружений почти на $12 млрд", - сообщил госсекретарь Это еще раз свидетельствует, что у Израиля в Белом доме нет более надежного союзника, чем Трамп, добавил Рубио. Он подчеркнул: "Администрация Трампа продолжит использовать все доступные инструменты для выполнения давних обязательств Америки по обеспечению безопасности Израиля, включая средства противодействия угрозам безопасности".

title: Hết lòng vì sự nghiệp trồng người
content: Nhìn lại chặng đường đã qua, cô Trần Thị Hương Lan - Tổ trưởng chuyên môn Tổ Tiếng Anh, Trường THPT Trần Hưng Đạo (quận Gò Vấp, TP HCM) - rất tâm đắc với câu "nghề chọn người". Để nghề chọn mình, cô giáo 9X này đã bền bỉ nâng cao năng lực. Hương Lan cũng may mắn vì có những người thầy luôn tin tưởng, dìu dắt cô. Công việc không tránh khỏi áp lực song tình thương dành cho học trò, điểm tựa từ gia đình, sự gắn kết và ủng hộ của nhà trường đã giúp Hương Lan không ngừng tiến về phía trước .Ảnh: QUỐC THẮNG Hương Lan sinh ra ở Hà Nam. Năm cô 8 tuổi, gia đình chuyển vào TP HCM. Cha mẹ bận mưu sinh, 3 chị em cô tự bảo ban nhau học tập. Nhìn xung quanh toàn các bạn xuất sắc, Hương Lan từng hoài nghi bản thân. Ai hỏi cô muốn làm gì khi lớn lên, câu trả lời chỉ là cái cúi đầu im lặng. Tuy vậy, giai đoạn ấy, cô có niềm yêu thích đặc biệt với tiếng Anh. Được mẹ mua cho chiếc máy cassette nhỏ, cô nghe tiếng Anh mỗi ngày. Với Hương Lan, mỗi thử thách đều giúp cô mạnh mẽ hơn, mỗi thành công của học trò là minh chứng cho ý nghĩa cao đẹp của nghề giáo. Bước ngoặt lớn là khi lên cấp 3, Hương Lan nộp đơn vào Trường Trần Hưng Đạo - lúc ấy mới thành lập, với suy nghĩ đơn giản là muốn...

title: Lomaivuna overcomes adversity, fields three teams
creator: KRISTINA DIKONSTATINO
content: LOMAIVUNA High School is determined to rise above adversity after a fire last year destroyed four classrooms and much of its training equipment.Despite the challenges, the school has fielded three teams, under-15, U17 and U19 in the Fiji Secondary Schools Rugby League competition, which kicked off yesterday with matches in the eastern and western zones.With more than 100 teams participating across the country, the competition provides a crucial platform for young players to develop.In the South-East division, games were held at St. Marcelin primary school grounds where 10 teams competed in the U15 grade, 8 in the U17 and 7 in the U19.Assistant coach Manasa Radrotini said the lack of a proper training ground and limited resources have made preparations difficult, but the team remains focused.“A small donation allowed us to get some equipment, and efforts are underway to rebuild our classrooms,” Radrotini said.“For us, it’s not about winning, it’s about exposing these boys to this level of competition. The results will come with time, they just need to stay disciplined and take it one game at a time.”Radrotini believes rugby provides more than just competition, serving as a way to keep young players away from negative influences such as drugs and crime.“Youths today are surrounded by toxic environments, but rugby teaches them discipline, healthy living and life skills that will help them in the future,” he said.In round one, Lomaivuna High School’s U15 team secured a solid...

title: Five-member child trafficking gang busted, 3 infants rescued
creator: Md Ameen
content: Vijayawada : Vijayawada city task force police and Nunna police in a joint operation apprehended a five-member women child trafficking gang at Prakash Nagar under the limits of Nunna police station and rescued three infants.The gang purchase babies for Rs 1 to Rs 2 lakh and sell each one at around Rs 4-5 lakh to the childless couples. The gang so far sold four babies and are preparing to sell three more. Vijayawada commissioner of police S V Rajasekhara Babu told the media on Saturday that the gang targets the childless couples and sells children to them to make easy money.He identified the arrested members of the gang as Bagalam Sarojini of Sitara junction, Shaik Fareena and Shaik Saidabi of Ajit Singh Nagar, Kovvarapu Karunasri and Pedala Sirisha of Prakash Nagar.The main accused Sarojini purchases babies from Ahmedabad and Hyderabad and sells to the childless couples. Shaik Fareena and Shaik Saidabi take the responsibility of trafficking the children and Pedala Sirisha and Karunasri take care of the children at their homes. Gang leader Sarojini visits fertility centres and talks to the issueless couples, strikes a bargain and sells infants to them for Rs 4 to Rs 5 lakh for each baby.Sarojini was earlier arrested on charges of child trafficking and later released on bail. CP Rajasekhara Babu said Sarojini did not change her ways and continued child trafficking after release. She purchased seven children in the last six months and has sold four of them so far while three...

title: Depression: ઉદાસી, વધારે પડતી ભુખ સહિતના આ 5 લક્ષણોને ન કરો ઈગ્નોર, ડિપ્રેશનની શરુઆતમાં થાય છે આવું
creator: Zee News Gujarati
content: Early Signs Depression: ડિપ્રેશન એક માનસિક કંડીશન છે. આ કંડીશનની શરુઆતમાં કેટલાક લક્ષણો જોવા મળે છે. જો કોઈ વ્યક્તિને સતત ઉદાસી, વધારે ભુખ, નકારાત્મક વિચારો સતત રહેતા હોય તો તેણે આ લક્ષણોને ઈગ્નોર કરવા નહીં. Early Signs Depression: વ્યક્તિ ઘણી વાર જીવનમાં એકલતા અનુભવે છે. પ્રેમમાં દગો, નિષ્ફળતા કે પછી જીવનના સંઘર્ષ દરમિયાન વ્યક્તિને ઉદાસી અને એકલતા અનુભવાય તે સામાન્ય છે. પરંતુ જો કોઈ માણસના મનમાં સતત નિરાશાનો ભાવ રહેતો હોય તો તે યોગ્ય નથી. જ્યારે કોઈ વ્યક્તિના જીવનમાંથી ખરાબ સમય દૂર થઈ જાય તેમ છતાં તે ખુશ ન રહે અને એકલતા અનુભવે તો તે ડિપ્રેશનની સમસ્યાનું લક્ષણ હોઈ શકે છે. આ પણ વાંચો: ધમનીઓ બ્લોક હોય ત્યારે શરીરમાં દેખાય આ લક્ષણો, 5 માંથી 1 ને પણ ઈગ્નોર ન કરતાં ડિપ્રેશન એવી સમસ્યા છે જેમાં વ્યક્તિને એકલતા, નિરાશા અને દુઃખ સતત અનુભવાય છે. પરંતુ મોટાભાગના લોકોને એ વાતની જ ખબર હોતી નથી કે તેઓ ડિપ્રેશનના શિકાર છે. જો કોઈ વ્યક્તિને ડિપ્રેશનના આ લક્ષણો જણાતા હોય તો યોગ્ય સારવાર લઈને ડિપ્રેશનને દૂર કરી શકાય છે. ડિપ્રેશન શરૂઆતથી લક્ષણ આ પણ વાંચો: શરીરના આ અંગોમાં થતો દુખાવો કિડની ડેમેજનું હોય શકે લક્ષણ, સમયસર ધ્યાન આપવું જરૂરી હંમેશા ઉદાસી ઉદાસ રહેવું ડિપ્રેશનનું સૌથી પહેલું લક્ષણ હોઈ શકે છે. જો બધું જ બરાબર ચાલતું હોય તેમ છતાં તમે ઉદાસી અનુભવતા હોય તો તે ડિપ્રેશનનું લક્ષણ હોઈ શકે છે. કરણ વિના મૂડ ખરાબ થઈ જતો હોય તો ડોક્ટર ની મદદ લેવી. આ પણ વાંચો: શું તમે પણ દિવસ દરમિયાન વારંવાર ટચાકા ફોડે રાખો છો ? તો આ વાત તમારા માટે જાણવી જરૂરી ઊંઘ ન આવવી ડિપ્રેશનનું બીજું લક્ષણ છે ઊંઘની પેટર્ન બગડી જવી. ઘણા લોકોને ડિપ્રેશનમાં વધારે પડતી ઊંઘ આવે છે તો ઘણા લોકોને બિલકુલ ઊંઘ આવતી નથી. ઊંઘ ન આવવાની...

title: Javier Milei anunció que enviará al Senado el pliego del Procurador y de todos los jueces que falta nombrar
creator: Hernán Cappiello
content: El presidente Javier Milei anunció ante la Asamblea Legislativa que va a enviar al Senado los pliegos de todos los cargos vacantes en la justicia federal, incluido el del Procurador General de la Nación; pidió apoyo para aprobar una ley que baje la edad de imputabilidad penal y dijo que va a reformar el Código agravando las de todos los delitos. El ministro de Justicia, Mariano Cúneo Libarona , que estaba sentado junto a Luis “Toto” Caputo, apenas si fue nombrado por Milei cuando mencionó a todo el gabinete y no le dedicó un elogio especial, como sí lo hizo con el ministro de Economía, con Federico Sturzenegger , con Patricia Bullrich y hasta con el vocero Manuel Adorni . Sí mencionó Milei que se puso en marcha “el sistema acusatorio en doce provincias, la mitad del país” y dijo que eso “permitió lograr condenar por narcotráfico en tan solo un mes, cuando antes tardaban más de tres años”. Añadió que impulsa “el juicio por jurados”, una de las reformas que -dijo- se debe el país desde su “fundación” para “que la vida, la libertad y la propiedad de los argentinos dependan en última instancia de la decisión de sus conciudadanos, y no de un juez, eliminando así el último vestigio de poder monárquico en la Justicia”. Estas dos iniciativas son, al igual que el proyecto de ley para bajar la edad de imputabilidad, los pilares de la gestión de Cúneo Libarona. Lo mismo ocurre con la reforma del Código Penal. Todos estos anuncios del capítulo judicial se...

title: El Festival de Viña cierra con la esperada noche de Morat y Yatra, aplazada por el apagón
creator: Newsroom Infobae
content: Viña del Mar (Chile).- El Festival Internacional de la Canción de Viña del Mar (Chile), concluyó la noche de este sábado su 64a edición con los conciertos de los colombianos Morat y Sebastián Yatra, dos de los números más esperados de este año, que fueron aplazados debido al apagón que afectó al 99 % del país el martes pasado. El humorista chileno Pedro Ruminot completó la parilla de la última jornada del evento, que se vio obligado a reprogramar las actuaciones previstas para el pasado martes por ser incompatibles con el estado de emergencia y el toque de queda decretados por el gobierno de Chile. La banda Morat, que llegó por primera vez al escenario de la Quinta Vergara, inauguró la velada con su característica propuesta musical que fusiona pop y rock, esencia de populares canciones como ‘No se va’, ‘Salir con vida’ y ‘Besos en guerra’ pero se coleccionó las críticas de una parte de los espectadores, que criticaron un supuesto play-back. Ruminot, uno de los nombres más destacados del humor nacional, volvió al emblemático anfiteatro viñamarino por tercera vez con el objetivo de conseguir que su comedia aguda basada en la cotidianidad hiciera reír al ‘monstruo’, nombre con el que se conoce al exigente público del festival. El aclamado cantante Sebastián Yatra, uno de los platos fuertes de esta edición, cerró la noche llenando el estadio con la combinación de baladas románticas, pop latino y reagguetón que le han convertido en uno de los...

title: Боевики ВСУ хотят задержать ВС РФ под Купянском, «закидывая мясом»
content: Военный аналитик Андрей Марочко прокомментировал обстановку на Купянском направлении фронта. Его слова приводит «ТАСС». «Касаемо Кондрашовки и Радьковки. Здесь украинское командование прислало дополнительные силы и средства для удержания и стабилизации фронта...», — процитировали Андрея Марочко в «ТАСС». Эксперт добавил, что солдаты Российской Армии ведут приготовление к штурму данных рубежей боевиков ВСУ. Андрей Марочко подчеркнул, что киевских радикалов беспрестанно «перемалывают» на данном участке фронта — особую роль в этом играют артиллерийские расчеты и военная авиация. Наступление на Купянском направлении не прекращается уже несколько недель. Ранее эксперты рассказали, как ведется подготовка к финальному штурму этого главного рубежа украинских боевиков на подступах к Харькову.

title: Van al 90% oficinas del Registro Civil en Teatro Lux: Alcaldesa
creator: Gil Reyna
content: Mexicali, Baja California.-Están en un 90% las oficinas del Registro Civil en el Teatro Lux del Centro Histórico de Mexicali, esperan abrirlas en menos de dos semanas luego de varios retrasos en la entrega del edificio.La alcaldesa de Mexicali, Norma Bustamante, dio a conocer que ya visualizó los avances que hay en las nuevas oficinas del registro civil y comprobó que está casi terminado.Ya va al 90%, tengo hasta fotos y videos, está quedando precioso, yo creo en unas dos semanas ya estará” comentó la alcaldesa de Mexicali.La intención de remover el Registro Civil a la Zona Centro es para que la zona tenga más flujo de gente durante el día tal y como lo tiene durante la noche con diversos eventos y comercios. “Queremos revivir el Centro Histórico de dia y el tener aquí el Registro Civil, es una oportunidad para eso, para que venga la gente que se case, se tomen fotos, esta calle está peatonalizada y hay mucho proyectos para la zona”El proveedor está a punto de terminar con lo que necesitan para que el edificio esté funcional, por lo que continúan con el traslado de mobiliario y puedan comenzar a dar el servicio. Síguenos en TikTok: www.tiktok.com/@lacronicacom

title: Uttarakhand avalanche: Of 50 workers rescued, 4 die; search on for 4 amid bad weather
creator: PTI
content: DEHRADUN: Fifty workers have been pulled out of snow from the site of an avalanche-hit BRO camp in Mana village in Uttarakhand's Chamoli district, but four of them died on Saturday as rescuers raced against time to trace four more labourers feared trapped. According to latest rescue updates provided by the Uttarakhand State Disaster Management Authority (USDMA), five labourers were missing but one of them -- Sunil Kumar from Kangra in Himachal Pradesh -- has reached home safely on his own and now, the search is focused on the four remaining workers. The avalanche hit the Border Roads Organisation (BRO) camp between Mana and Badrinath between 5:30 am and 6 am on Friday, burying 55 workers inside eight containers and a shed, according to the Army. Thirty-three of them were rescued by Friday night and 17 on Saturday. Rain and snowfall hampered the rescue efforts on Friday and the operation was suspended as the night fell. As the weather cleared up on Saturday morning, the Army and Indo-Tibetan Border Police (ITBP) personnel based in Mana resumed the rescue operation, District Disaster Management Officer N K Joshi said. Six helicopters -- three of the Indian Army Aviation Corps, two of the Indian Air Force (IAF) and a civil chopper hired by the Army -- have been engaged in the operation, Army's Public Relations Officer (PRO) Lieutenant Colonel Manish Shrivastava said. Located three kilometres from Badrinath, Mana is the last village on the India-Tibet border at a height of 3,200...

title: Jardine afirma que secreto de América es que el equipo está por encima de lo individual
creator: Newsroom Infobae
content: México, 1 mar (EFE).- El brasileño André Jardine, entrenador del América mexicano, aseveró este sábado que el secreto del buen paso de su equipo está en que sus jugadores comprenden que la institución está por encima del lucimiento individual. "Creo que ese secreto está en que tenemos jugadores que entienden la fortaleza del proceso. Que saben que el equipo está por encima de lo individual, que siempre están en busca de ser mejores, que son felices jugando en el equipo, no sólo si son campeones. Eso lo ha entendido este grupo", dijo el técnico luego del triunfo de América 3-0 sobre Toluca en la décima jornada del Clausura 2025. En el partido el América fue más efectivo a pesar de que el Toluca se adueñó de la pelota en varios lapsos del juego. Las Águilas marcaron gracias al español Álvaro Fidalgo, el estadounidense Alejandro Zendejas y al colombiano Cristian Borja. Toluca intentó acercarse en el marcador, pero le faltó profundidad. Con el resultado el América llegó a 23 puntos, se ubica primero en el certamen en el que acumula siete triunfos, dos empates y una derrota, registros que Jardine dijo son producto del gran nivel de cada uno de sus jugadores. "Estamos en gran momento. La mayoría de mis jugadores tienen buen nivel. Aún creo que nos falta un poco de ritmo de juego, pero me voy con muy buenas sensaciones. Hoy la contundencia nos favoreció, todo nos salió bien, ahora debemos mantener este nivel", explicó. El estratega subrayó la...

title: Lula invita a tres países latinoamericanos a la cumbre de los BRICS
creator: RT en Español
content: El presidente de Brasil, Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva, abogó por el desarrollo del multilateralismo y el comercio internacional e invitó a Uruguay, Colombia y México a la cumbre de los BRICS que se celebrará en julio en Río de Janeiro. "Estoy invitando a todos estos países que están aquí, Uruguay, Colombia, México, a participar en los BRICS en Brasil. Aunque no sean miembros permanentes, es importante que estos países participen, porque es un momento de debate con todo el mundo ", señaló a la prensa el mandatario brasileño desde Montevideo, donde asistió a la investidura del nuevo presidente uruguayo, Yamandú Orsi, informan medios locales. "Es importante que en esta reunión de los BRICS fortalezcamos realmente dos cosas importantes : el multilateralismo y el comercio", añadió Lula. Por otra parte, el mandatario izquierdista abogó por el fortalecimiento de grupos como el Mercosur. "No podemos seguir buscando soluciones individuales para cada país, porque no hay manera. El mundo está dividido en bloques, y el que está más organizado puede más, el que está más organizado vende más", aseveró .

title: CM approves gratuity for ASHA workers, raises retirement age
creator: The Hans India
content: Vijayawada : The NDA government in the state announced gratuity for ASHA workers, enhanced the retire-ment age from 60 to 62 years and other sops.Chief Minister N Chandrababu Naidu on Saturday gave a green signal for payment of gratuity to ASHA (Accredited Social Health Activist) workers.Each of them will get Rs 1.5 lakh at the time of retirement after serving for 30 years.Andhra Pradesh will be the first and only state in the country to pay gratuity to ASHA workers, said an official statement.The government has also announced paid maternity leave for 180 days for the first two deliver-ies.The sops will benefit 42,752 ASHA workers across the state. There are 37,017 workers in rural areas while 5,735 are serving in urban areas.The Chief Minister gave approval for a series of sops during a review meeting of the health department.He directed officials to study the salaries of ASHA workers, the facilities they are getting and related issues in other states to suggest modalities for payment of gratuity.ASHA workers had long been demanding gratuity. Considering this, the Chief Minister decided to introduce the scheme. According to an official release, they were not being paid wages during maternity leave but now the TDP-led coalition government decided to give them maternity leave for 180 days with wages for the first two deliveries. This step will benefit each of the ASHA workers availing ma-ternity leave to the tune of Rs 60,000.According to the release, even before 2019, it was...

title: Jueces acusan a jefe de seguridad mexicano de desviar presiones con acusaciones sin razón
creator: Newsroom Infobae
content: Ciudad de México, 1 mar (EFE).- La Asociación Nacional de Magistrados de Circuito y Jueces de Distrito del Poder Judicial de la Federación (Jufed) acusó al secretario de Seguridad y Protección Ciudadana, Omar García Harfuch, de realizar señalamientos sin pruebas contra jueces federales con el fin de desviar la atención de presiones internacionales. En un comunicado, la Jufed rechazó categóricamente las declaraciones del funcionario y aseguró que buscan desacreditar la labor del Poder Judicial. “La seguridad y la justicia en México no se contruyen con discursos que buscan deslegitimar al Poder Judicial ni con intentos de debilitar las instituciones, sino atacando las causas, acciones que no han sido realizadas, sino hasta la denuncia de un Gobierno extranjero”, señaló. La nota sostiene que las acusaciones de García Harfuch sobre supuestos acuerdos entre jueces y capos de la droga carecen de pruebas y forman parte de una estrategia para desviar la atención de presuntas irregularidades señaladas por el Gobierno de Estados Unidos. Su postura ocurre luego de que García Harfuch admitiera ayer en conferencia de prensa que los 29 narcotraficantes mexicanos fueron extraditados por el riesgo de ser liberados por jueces o que sus procesos de extradición fueran retardados. “El Gabinete de Seguridad cuenta con información que existía un riesgo de que algunos de estos objetivos solicitados por el Gobierno de Estados Unidos fueran liberados o siguieran atrasándose sus...

title: Karina AESPA Pamer Pesona dengan Gaya Rambut Bob Nikmati Momen di Milan
content: Setiap kali seorang idol K-Pop mengalami perubahan dalam gaya, hal tersebut selalu menjadi perbincangan hangat di antara para penggemar. Terutama jika perubahan tersebut berkaitan dengan penampilan fisik dan gaya rambut, yang sering kali menjadi identitas seorang artis. Baru-baru ini, Karina AESPA menarik perhatian publik dengan penampilan rambut pendeknya yang baru. Dalam postingan terbaru di Instagram, ia menunjukkan tampilan yang lebih segar dan elegan dengan gaya rambut yang berbeda dari biasanya. Baca Juga Penampilan baru Karina langsung mendapat respons positif dari para penggemar. Banyak yang memberikan pujian, menyatakan bahwa potongan rambut pendek tersebut semakin menonjolkan kecantikannya, bahkan ada yang berspekulasi bahwa perubahan ini mungkin menjadi bagian dari konsep baru AESPA. Advertisement Pada tanggal 1 Maret 2025, Karina mengunggah beberapa foto di Instagram yang menunjukkan penampilannya dengan rambut pendek. Dalam gambar-gambar itu, ia terlihat mengenakan busana yang sederhana namun tetap memiliki kesan modis, dengan pencahayaan yang membuat tampilannya semakin menarik. Postingan ini segera mendapatkan banyak komentar dari penggemar yang merasa terkejut dan terpesona oleh transformasi penampilannya. Banyak di antara mereka yang berpendapat bahwa gaya rambut pendeknya semakin menonjolkan aura chic dan urban Karina, sehingga ia terlihat lebih elegan dan modern. Sejumlah pengguna internet berpendapat bahwa perubahan gaya rambut yang dilakukan oleh AESPA...

title: Holi 2025:होली किस तारीख को है? जानें सही तिथि और होलिका दहन का मुहूर्त
content: Holi 2025: हिंदू धर्म में होली का त्योहार प्रमुख त्योहारों में से एक माना जाता है। देशभर में बड़े धूमधाम और हर्षोल्लास के साथ होली मनाया जाता है। यह त्योहार फाल्गुन माह की पूर्णिमा तिथि को पड़ता है, लेकिन इससे एक दिन पहले रात्रि में होलिका दहन किया जाता है। जिसे छोटी होली के नाम से भी जाना जाता है। होली का महापर्व बुराई पर अच्छाई की जीत का प्रतीक माना जाता है। इस त्योहार को लेकर कई अलग-अलग पौराणिक कथाएं और मान्यताएं प्रचलित हैं। रंगों का पर्व होली काम, क्रोध, मद,मोह और लोभ जैसे दोषों को त्यागकर ईश्वर की भक्ति में समय व्यतीत करने का संदेश देता है। इस दिन लोगों एक-दूसरे को अबीर-गुलाल और रंग लगाते हैं और आपस में खुशियां बांटते हैं। इस साल होलिका दहन के दिन भद्रा का साया रहेगा। धार्मिक मान्यताओं के अनुसार, भद्राकाल में होलिका दहन करना शुभ नहीं माना जाता है। ऐसे में आइए जानते हैं होली की सही तिथि और होलिका दहन का शुभ मुहूर्त... होली कब है? द्रिक पंचांग के अनुसार, फाल्गुन माह के शुक्ल पक्ष की पूर्णिमा तिथि की शुरुआत 13 मार्च 2025 को सुबह 10 बजकर 35 मिनट पर होगी और अगले दिन 14 मार्च 2025 को दोपहर 12 बजकर 35 मिनट पर समाप्त होगी। ऐसे में उदयातिथि के अनुसार, 14 मार्च को होली मनाई जाएगी और 13 मार्च की रात्रि को होलिका दहन किया जाएगा। इस साल होलिका दहन के दिन भद्रा का भी साया रहेगा। होलिका दहन पर भद्रा : 13 मार्च को होलिका दहन के दिन 10:35 ए एम से 11:26 पी एम तक भद्राकाल रहेगा। इस दौरान होलिका दहन करने से बचें। होलिका दहन का मुहूर्त : पंचांग के अनुसार, 13 मार्च को देर रात 11 : 27 पीएम से लेकर 14 मार्च को 12:30 एएम तक लगभग 01 घंटा 40 मिनट तक होलिका दहन का शुभ मुहूर्त है। डिस्क्लेमर: इस...

title: India vs New Zealand: ಇಂದು ಟಾಸ್‌ ಗೆದ್ದವರೇ ಬಾಸ್‌, ದುಬೈ ಪಿಚ್ ರಿಪೋರ್ಟ್‌ಗೆ ಫ್ಯಾನ್ಸ್‌ ಖುಷ್‌;‌ ಆದ್ರೆ ಹವಾಮಾನ ವರದಿ...
creator: Shrikrishna Bhat
content: ಭಾರತ ಮತ್ತು ನ್ಯೂಜಿಲೆಂಡ್ ತಂಡಗಳು ಚಾಂಪಿಯನ್ಸ್‌ ಟ್ರೋಫಿಯ ಕೊನೆಯ ಲೀಗ್ ಹಂತದ ಪಂದ್ಯದಲ್ಲಿ ಮುಖಾಮುಖಿಯಾಗಲಿವೆ. ಉಭಯ ತಂಡಗಳು ಈಗಾಗಲೇ ತಲಾ 2 ಗೆಲುವು ಸಾಧಿಸಿದ್ದು, ಭಾರತ ಮತ್ತು ನ್ಯೂಜಿಲೆಂಡ್ ಈಗಾಗಲೇ ಸೆಮಿಫೈನಲ್‌ಗೆ ಅರ್ಹತೆ ಪಡೆದಿವೆ. ಭಾರತ ಪಾಯಿಂಟ್ ಪಟ್ಟಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಅಗ್ರಸ್ಥಾನದಲ್ಲಿದೆ ಮತ್ತು ನ್ಯೂಜಿಲೆಂಡ್ ಎರಡನೇ ಸ್ಥಾನದಲ್ಲಿದೆ. ಆದರೆ ಬಿ ತಂಡದಲ್ಲಿ ಯಾವ ಎದುರಾಳಿ ಸಿಗಬೇಕು ಎಂಬ ರಣತಂತ್ರದ ಮೇಲೆ ಇಂದು ಪಂದ್ಯದ ಫಲಿತಾಂಶ ಹೊರಬರುವ ಸಾಧ್ಯತೆ ಇದೆ. ಇದಕ್ಕೂ ಮುನ್ನ ದುಬೈ ಪಿಚ್‌ ರಿಪೋರ್ಟ್‌ ಮತ್ತು ಹವಾಮಾನ ವರದಿ ಹೇಗಿದೆ ಎಂದು ನೋಡೋಣ. ರೋಹಿತ್‌ ಶರ್ಮಾ ಫಿಟ್: ಇನ್ನು, ನಾಯಕ ರೋಹಿತ್ ಶರ್ಮಾಅವರು ಸಂಪೂರ್ಣ ಫಿಟ್ ಆಗಿದ್ದು, ಇಂದು ಕಿವೀಸ್‌ ವಿರುದ್ಧದ ಪಂದ್ಯದಲ್ಲಿ ಕಣಕ್ಕಿಳಿಯುವುದು ಖಚಿತವಾಗಿದೆ. ಪಾಕಿಸ್ತಾನ ವಿರುದ್ಧದ ಪಂದ್ಯದ ಸಮಯದಲ್ಲಿ ಅವರು ಮಂಡಿರಜ್ಜು ಸಮಸ್ಯೆಯಿಂದ ಬಳಲುತ್ತಿದ್ದರು ಮತ್ತು ಸ್ವಲ್ಪ ಸಮಯದವರೆಗೆ ಮೈದಾನದಿಂದ ಹೊರಗಿದ್ದರು. ಆದರೆ ಹಿರಿಯ ಆಟಗಾರ ಮೊಹಮ್ಮದ್‌ ಶಮಿ ಅವರು ಸಂಪೂರ್ಣವಾಗಿ ಪಿಟ್‌ ಆಗದ ಕಾರಣ ಅವರು ಆಡುವುದು ಅನುಮಾನವಾಗಿದ್ದು, ಸೆಮಿ ಫೈನಲ್‌ ಮುನ್ನ ಶಮಿಗೆ ವಿಶ್ರಾಂತಿ ನೀಡುವ ಸಾಧ್ಯತೆ ಹೆಚ್ಚಿದೆ. ಇದರ ನಡುವೆವಿರಾಟ್ ಕೊಹ್ಲಿ ತಮ್ಮ 300ನೇ ಏಕದಿನ ಪಂದ್ಯದಲ್ಲಿ ಆಡಲಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ವಿರಾಟ್ 300 ಏಕದಿನ, 100 ಟೆಸ್ಟ್ ಮತ್ತು 100 ಟಿ20 ಪಂದ್ಯಗಳನ್ನು ಆಡಿದ ವಿಶ್ವದ ಮೊದಲ ಆಟಗಾರ ಎಂಬ ಹೆಗ್ಗಳಿಕೆಗೆ ಪಾತ್ರರಾಗಲಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಪಿಚ್ ವರದಿ: ದುಬೈನ ಪಿಚ್ ಬ್ಯಾಟಿಂಗ್ ಮತ್ತು ಸ್ಪಿನ್ ಬೌಲಿಂಗ್‌ಗೆ ಉತ್ತಮವಾಗಿದೆ. ಭಾರತವು ತಮ್ಮ ಎರಡೂ ಪಂದ್ಯಗಳನ್ನು ಚೇಸಿಂಗ್‌ನಲ್ಲಿ ಗೆದ್ದಿದೆ, ಇದು ಪಂದ್ಯ ಮುಂದುವರೆದಂತೆ ಪಿಚ್ ಬ್ಯಾಟಿಂಗ್‌ಗೆ ಸುಲಭವಾಗುತ್ತದೆ ಎಂದು ಸೂಚಿಸುತ್ತದೆ.‌ ಹೀಗಾಗಿ ಟಾಸ್ ಗೆದ್ದ ತಂಡ ಮೊದಲು ಬೌಲಿಂಗ್ ಮಾಡಲು ಬಯಸುತ್ತದೆ. IND vs NZ, Champions Trophy 2025: ನಾಳಿನ ಪಂದ್ಯದಿಂದ ರಾಹುಲ್‌-ಶಮಿ ಔಟ್?‌ ಸ್ಟಾರ್‌ ಪ್ಲೇಯರ್ಸ್‌ ಎಂಟ್ರಿ, ಇಲ್ಲಿದೆ ಪ್ಲೇಯಿಂಗ್‌ 11 ಹವಾಮಾನ ವರದಿ: ದುಬೈನಲ್ಲಿ ಹವಾಮಾನವು ಸ್ಪಷ್ಟವಾಗಿದೆ ಮತ್ತು ಆಟದ ಸಮಯದಲ್ಲಿ ಮಳೆ ಬರುವ...

title: ഉറങ്ങികിടന്ന ആശമാരെ കൊണ്ട് മഴ നനയാതിരിക്കാൻ കെട്ടിയ ടാർപോളിൻ ഷീറ്റ് അഴിപ്പിച്ച് പൊലീസ്
creator: വെബ് ഡെസ്ക്
content: തിരുവനന്തപുരം: സെക്രട്ടേറിയറ്റിന് മുന്നിൽ 21 ദിവസം പിന്നിട്ട ആശ വർക്കർമാരുടെ അനിശ്ചിതകാല രാപകൽ സമരത്തിന് നേരെ പൊലീസ് നടപടി. ഉറങ്ങികിടന്ന ആശ വർക്കർമാരെ കൊണ്ട് മഴ നനയാതിരിക്കാൻ കെട്ടിയ ടാർപോളിൻ ഷീറ്റ് പൊലീസ് അഴിപ്പിച്ചു. പുലർച്ചെ മൂന്നു മണിയോടെ മഴ പെയ്തപ്പോഴാണ് ഉറങ്ങികിടന്ന ആശ വർക്കർമാരെ വിളിച്ചുണർത്തി ടാർപോളിൻ ഷീറ്റ് പൊലീസ് അഴിപ്പിച്ചത്. പൊലീസ് എത്തിയപ്പോൾ ടാര്‍പോളിൻ ഷീറ്റിന് താഴെ പായ വിരിച്ച് ഉറങ്ങുകയായിരുന്നു ആശ വർക്കർമാർ. മനുഷ്യരാണോ എന്ന് പൊലീസുകാരോട് സമരം ചെയ്യുന്ന ആശ വര്‍ക്കര്‍മാർ ചോദിച്ചു. അതേസമയം, മഴ നനഞ്ഞ് കൊണ്ട് ആശ വർക്കർമാർ സെക്രട്ടേറിയറ്റിന് മുമ്പിലെ സമരം തുടർന്നു. 21-ാം ദിവസത്തിലേക്ക് കടന്ന സാഹചര്യത്തിൽ രാപ്പകല്‍ സമരം ശക്തിപ്പെടുത്താനാണ് സമരസമിതിയുടെ തീരുമാനം. വേതനം അടക്കമുള്ള ആവശ്യങ്ങൾ ചൂണ്ടിക്കാട്ടി ആശ വര്‍ക്കര്‍മാർ തിങ്കളാഴ്ച നിയമസഭയിലേക്ക് മാര്‍ച്ച് നടത്തും.

title: Alicia Villarreal dio concierto mientras velaban a su padre
creator: Paula Ruiz
content: En medio del dolor por la muerte de su padre, Alicia Villarreal aplicó la famosa frase en el mundo del espectáculo: el show tiene que continuar porque mientras velaban el cuerpo de don Víctor Villarreal en una funeraria ubicada sobre la Avenida Lázaro Cárdenas, en San Pedro, la cantante se presentó en el Bert Ogden Arena, en Edinburg, Texas.

title: Nuova vita per l'ex Zaffera, da ristorante a polo culturale: lavori per 1,8 mln di euro
content: Una nuova vita per l'ex Zaffera. Questo ristorante nel cuore del quartiere medievale di Viterbo è stato per decenni il salotto migliore, prescelto quando c’era da fare bella figura. Di qui sono transitati personaggi del calibro di Sandro Pertini, in visita in città nel 1984 per inaugurare l’anno accademico. Chiuso da anni, l’immobile di proprietà comunale in piazza san Carluccio ora è destinato a rinascere in una nuova veste: non più ristorante, diventerà uno spazio multimediale. Il progetto rientra nei cantieri targati Fesr Lazio 2021-2027 e per realizzarlo Palazzo dei Priori ha in dote 1,8 milioni di euro. La relazione tecnica descrittiva rivela come il fabbricato “da tempo in disuso, anche nell’ottica di una rivitalizzazione del centro storico, a seguito degli interventi di restauro e risanamento conservativo, verrà adibito a mediateca ovvero uno spazio per giovani studenti e non”. Cosa significa? Che “la nuova struttura andrà a far rete con il sistema universitario e delle biblioteche andando a realizzare un vero e proprio polo culturale al centro della città”. Nello specifico l’intervento prevederà lavori di consolidamento e manutenzione straordinaria del fabbricato “che, nelle parti di pregio, saranno ascrivibili alla categoria del restauro. Di particolare importanza – continua la relazione tecnica - sarà il rifacimento di tutti gli impianti che dovranno garantire uno spazio tecnologicamente avanzato con il massimo dell’efficienza energetica. Inoltre, verrà...

title: Marital Rape: Are We A Democracy Worse Than Monarchy?
content: Since independence, Indian laws for women have changed for the better. But some rulings have sparked debates. Recently, a High Court in India courted controversy when it stated that domestic rape and unnatural rape is not a legal crime. It raises inquiries about women’s fight against domestic abuse and protection. On International Women’s Day, we speak on this legal battle for women.Verdict on verdictAdv. Virat Vilas Pawar, a family lawyer practising in Mumbai High Court, calls rape as forced sex intrinsically wrong. “However, just as it is commonly believed that a woman cannot rape a man (as there are no provisions to protect men from rape), there is also a misconception that rape cannot occur between a husband and wife. This is incorrect because even a married woman has the right to say no to her husband. Unnatural sex, which refers to anal or oral sex, is a matter of personal preference between couples and is acceptable only when consensual.”Dr Malini Saba, a psychologist, human and social rights activist, global advocate for women and girls, and the founder of the Ananke Foundation, calls the verdict deeply disturbing. “Rape is rape, whether inside or outside of marriage. It’s a forced act, and forcing someone into an intimate act without consent is, by definition, a violation of their body and dignity. Marriage does not erase a person’s right to say no. It’s truly disappointing to see that, even today, we find ourselves debating a woman’s autonomy over her body after...

title: Young Socceroos’ Asian Cup triumph shows better days are on the horizon
creator: Vince Rugari
content: The Matildas are in a deep, dark hole. A high-profile court case , a seven-month stretch without a full-time coach, a series of poor results and an ill-advised radio rant has turned Australia’s favourite team into a national punching bag. The Socceroos are about to resume their tightrope pursuit of a direct qualifying berth at next year’s World Cup, but the outlook for them is also fairly bleak ahead of this month’s must-win clashes against Indonesia and China. Three of the team’s best centre-backs are injured: first it was Alessandro Circati, then Harry Souttar , and now Hayden Matthews – the Sydney FC product who has made an immediate impact at English Championship outfit Portsmouth since transferring there in January for a record fee – is confirmed to be out for the rest of the season with an ankle problem, leaving coach Tony Popovic desperately short of defensive options. But there are better days ahead. In the early hours of Sunday morning (AEDT), the Young Socceroos, the men’s under-20 national team, created history by winning the Asian Cup for their age group. Undefeated. Most of the country was tucked away in bed when they prevailed 5-4 in a penalty shootout over Saudi Arabia, thanks to a Mark Schwarzer-esque one-handed save by Steven Hall with the final spot kick – but the significance of this achievement should not be slept on. This team had already made history by reaching the semi-finals and clinching a spot at the FIFA U-20 World Cup in Chile later this year,...

title: [단독]‘정치인 통화’ 선관위 전 사무총장, 작년 국힘 예비후보 경선···선관위 내부 우려 있었다
creator: 문광호 기자 moonlit@kyunghyang.com
content: 대선 전 정치인 통화 논란이 제기된 김세환 전 중앙선거관리위원회(선관위) 사무총장이 지난해 인천 강화군수 보궐선거에 국민의힘 소속으로 출마해 경선을 치렀던 것으로 2일 확인됐다. 김 전 사무총장은 2022년 대선과 지방선거를 앞두고 선관위 명의 휴대전화를 개통해 정치인들과 연락을 주고받았다는 감사원 지적을 받은 인물이다. 선관위 내부에서도 “당시 퇴직 후 특정 정당 후보로 출마하는 등의 행보에 비판적 시각이 많았다”는 목소리가 나왔다. 선관위 내부 제보 등 취재를 종합하면 김 전 총장은 지난해 8월4일 강화군수 보궐선거에 국민의힘 소속 예비후보로 등록했다. 김 전 총장은 아들 특혜 채용 의혹이 제기된 데 이어 2022년 3월 대선 사전투표 부실 관리 논란이 불거지자 자진사퇴했다. 그는 지난해 7월 출마를 선언하며 “아들이 정당하게 임용됐다”고 주장했다. 그러나 지난해 12월 검찰은 김 전 총장이 2019년 아들이 인천 강화군선관위에 8급 공무원으로 채용되도록 부당한 영향력을 행사했다며 불구속 기소했다. 국민의힘은 당시 선관위의 부실선거 관리 논란, 자녀특혜 의혹 등을 강하게 비판했음에도 부적격자 컷오프(공천배제)를 모든 강화군수 예비후보에 적용하지 않기로 하고 1차 경선을 실시했다. 그 결과 김 전 총장은 2차 경선에 진출한 최종 4인에 들었다. 김 전 총장은 지난해 9월13일 당원 선거인단 투표와 여론조사로 실시된 2차 경선에서 떨어져 최종 후보로 선출되지는 않았다. 김...

title: “1人負け”との指摘も...インバウンドの回復伸び悩む中部国際空港 切り札は愛知独特の「食文化」
content: 中部国際空港=セントレアは2025年2月17日、開港から20周年を迎えた。インバウンドの伸び悩みで「1人負け」との指摘もある中、発酵食を中心とした「愛知の食」で巻き返しを図ろうと、新たなプロジェクトが動き出した。 愛・地球博の開幕をおよそ1カ月後に控えた2005年2月17日、中部国際空港、通称セントレアが開港した。 開港初日は新しい空港を一目見ようと、朝早くからファンが殺到した。 記念すべき一番機は、弾丸ツアーのチャーター機で、前日の夜に県営名古屋空港を出発し、サイパン経由でセントレアに降り立った。 感じいいね、やっぱり。何でも一番。 滑走路が見えてきましたら感動でした。本当にいい思い出ができました。 “名古屋めし”などが味わえる飲食店や、みやげ物店が集まるスカイタウンも連日大混雑で、セントレアには開港からわずか3日間で25万人以上が訪れた。 あれから20年、2020年には新型コロナウイルスの感染拡大で、一時は国際線がゼロになるなど、大きな打撃を受け、その後も回復が遅れている。 2024年度の国際線利用者数は約354万人で、コロナ前のピークだった2019年度の約620万人だけでなく、開港直後の2005年度の約533万人も下回った。 インバウンドの回復で、国内の空港がにぎわう中、セントレアは“1人負け”の状態となっている。 開港20周年を迎えた2月17日、国際線の到着ロビーに、直径およそ2メートルの大きな木の桶が設置された。地元、愛知県の「桝塚(ますづか)味噌」で、90年以上前から使われている味噌樽だ。 「発酵王国」とも呼ばれる愛知県は、味噌煮込みや味噌カツに欠かせない「豆味噌」や、豆味噌の製造過程から生まれた「たまり醤油」、さらに三河地方の「みりん」や、香り豊かな「日本酒」など、古くから豊かな食文化を誇ってきた。 インバウンド需要が伸び悩むセントレアでは、これらの「発酵食」を世界にアピールしようというプロジェクトが進められている。 プロジェクトの仕掛人は、中部国際空港に入社し18年になる森勇樹さんだ。中部国際空港では2025年1月、インバウンドの増加を目指す「地域ブランド共創室」が新設され、森さんもメンバーに選ばれた。 森さんは、まず空港で働くスタッフに発酵食について知ってもらおうと、豆味噌づくりの体験会を企画した。 この地域に住んでいる以上、しっかりと自分の言葉で、魅力を語れるようになるべきだと思っていまして、それが我々が目指している訪日外国人・インバウンドを誘致する取り組みにつながってくると思ったので、まずは体験してそれを知っていただきたい。 リーマンショックや新型コロナなど、数々のピンチを経験した森さんは、地域ならではの個性を打ち出す必要を感じていた。そして、インバウンド獲得へ巻き返し策を探る中で、愛知独特の「食」に注目した。 海外の方からみた愛知とか名古屋というのは残念ながら知名度が低くて、そこが課題の1つかなと思っています。そういうところに「名古屋といえば○○」みたいなものをしっかり作らないといけないなと思っていますし、それを地域の方と作っていく、今は発酵食文化に注目している。 セントレアに、韓国のLCC「エアロK」が新たに就航した1月31日。...

title: Кунья забил больше всего голов из-за пределов штрафной среди игроков АПЛ
content: Хавбек «Вулверхэмптона» Матеус Кунья во встрече против «Борнмута» отметился забитым мячом, который стал для него шестым голом из-за пределов штрафной во всех соревнованиях этого сезона – больше всего среди всех игроков АПЛ 2024/25. 1 марта состоялся поединок 1/8 финала Кубка Англии между командами «Борнмут» и «Вулверхэмптон». Основное время и овертаймы матча завершились со счетом 1:1, а в серии пенальти «вишни» одержали победу (5:4) . Кроме «Борнмута», Кунья забил дальними ударами в ворота «Ливерпуля», «Астон Виллы», «Саутгемптона», «Фулхэма» и «Манчестер Юнайтед». В текущем сезоне бразилец сыграл 29 матчей во всех турнирах, забив 15 голов и отдав 4 результативные передачи. 2 марта «вишни» узнают своего соперника в четвертьфинале Кубка Англии. 6 - Matheus Cunha has scored six goals from outside the box in all competitions this season, at least two more than any other Premier League player. Technician. #BOUWOL

title: Sao Ngoại hạng Anh phải khâu 25 mũi sau cú song phi kinh hoàng của đối thủ, tranh cãi tiếp tục nổ ra
content: Crystal Palace đã cập nhật về tình trạng của Jean-Philippe Mateta sau khi tiền đạo này phải khâu vết rách ở tai. Mateta đã phải nhập viện sau một pha phạm lỗi kinh hoàng từ thủ môn Liam Roberts của Millwall trong trận đấu thuộc Cúp FA tại sân Selhurst Park. Chủ tịch Crystal Palace, Steve Parish, cáo buộc thủ môn của Millwall đã đe dọa tính mạng của Mateta. Ông gọi đó là pha phạm lỗi tệ nhất ông từng chứng kiến trong bóng đá. Theo Mail Sport, huấn luyện viên trưởng Millwall Alex Neil và chủ tịch James Berylson đã kiểm tra tình trạng của Mateta sau trận đấu, trong khi các nguồn tin cho biết Roberts cũng đã liên lạc với tiền đạo của Palace. Chỉ mới 5 phút trôi qua trong trận đấu Cúp FA căng thẳng giữa hai đội bóng Nam London, vốn được cảnh sát giám sát chặt chẽ, thì Roberts đã bị truất quyền thi đấu vì pha va chạm mạnh vào Mateta. Cận cảnh cú song phi của Liam Roberts với Mateta Tại Crystal Palace, mọi người đều ngỡ ngàng khi trọng tài Michael Oliver phải sử dụng VAR mới nhận ra pha phạm lỗi của Roberts đáng bị thẻ đỏ. Một tuyên bố từ Palace cho biết: "Chúng tôi rất vui mừng xác nhận rằng tối nay JP Mateta đã được xuất viện từ Bệnh viện St George, nơi anh ấy đã nhận được điều trị chuyên khoa và khâu 25 mũi vì vết rách nghiêm trọng...

title: Young Socceroos’ Asian Cup triumph shows better days are on the horizon
creator: Vince Rugari
content: The Matildas are in a deep, dark hole. , a seven-month stretch without a full-time coach, a series of poor results and has turned Australia’s favourite team into a national punching bag. The Socceroos are about to resume their tightrope pursuit of a direct qualifying berth at next year’s World Cup, but the outlook for them is also fairly bleak ahead of this month’s must-win clashes against Indonesia and China. Three of the team’s best centre-backs are injured: first it was Alessandro Circati, , and now Hayden Matthews – the Sydney FC product who has made an immediate impact at English Championship outfit Portsmouth since transferring there in January for a record fee – is confirmed to be out for the rest of the season with an ankle problem, leaving coach Tony Popovic desperately short of defensive options. But there are better days ahead. In the early hours of Sunday morning (AEDT), the Young Socceroos, the men’s under-20 national team, created history by winning the Asian Cup for their age group. Undefeated. Most of the country was tucked away in bed when they prevailed 5-4 in a penalty shootout over Saudi Arabia, thanks to a Mark Schwarzer-esque one-handed save by Steven Hall with the final spot kick – but the significance of this achievement should not be slept on. This team had already made history by reaching the semi-finals and clinching a spot at the FIFA U-20 World Cup in Chile later this year, ending the Young Socceroos’ decade-long absence from the global stage....

title: ممثلة سورية تهاجم سلاف فواخرجي: كاذبة
creator: المحرر
content: #سواليف بعض #الضجة_الواسعة التي فجرتها #تصريحات #الممثلة_السورية_الشهيرة #سلاف_فواخرجي حول رئيس #النظام_السوري_السابق #بشار_ الأسد، أطلت ممثلة ومخرجة بانتقاد لاذع. فقد وصفت ليلى عواد فواخرجي بالكاذبة. وكتبت في تغريدة على حسابها في منصة إكس أمس الجمعة “دولتك ما احتضنت الفنانين المعارضين واعتقلت كتير منهم!”. كما أكدت أنها تعرض للاعتقال والسجن 16 شهرا. ذكّرت بغيرها من الفنانين الذين تعرضوا لانتهاكات النظام السابق، لافتة إلى أن سمر كوكش سجنت أكثر من 3 سنوات، فيما لا يزال الغموض يلف مصير زكي كورديللو وابنه مهيار. تفاصيل صادمة حول وفاة النجم الأمريكي جين هاكمان وزوجته 2025/03/01 كذلك، أشارت أيضا إلى أن الفنان الكبير علي فرزات تعرض لاعتداء دائم، فيما مات “المونتير” هشام موصللي تحت التعذيب، وفق قولها. بحر من الانتقادات وكانت فواخرجي التي لعبت العديد من الأدوار القوية في عشرات الأعمال الدرامية لاسيما مسلسل أسمهان، أثارت بحر من الانتقادات بين السوريين. لاسيما بعدما ظهرات قبل أيام قليلة في مقابلة تلفزيونية مطلقة مواقف نارية، وصفت بالمستفزة، لجهة إنكارها مضايقة النظام السابق للفنانين خلال حكمه. كما اعتبرت أن الثورة السورية كانت سلمية خلال الأيام الأولى فقط، لكنها سرعان ما انقلبت واتجهت نحو التسليح، ما دفع الحكومة آنذاك لمواجهتها. كذلك بررت وجود عناصر روسية وإيرانية في سوريا خلال الحرب، بأنهم “حلفاء للدولة السورية”، مشيرة إلى أن حزب الله اللبناني حرر “صيدنايا والراهبات في معلولا. ولطالما كانت تلك الممثلة التي يتغنى الكثيرون بجمالها الأخاذ، مؤيدة شرسة للنظام السابق خلال السنوات الماضية.

title: Christopher McDonald talks Happy Gilmore 2 after detailing Beverly Hills Cop cameo
creator: Connor McCrory
content: Christopher McDonald , known for his iconic role as Shooter McGavin in Happy Gilmore , has opened up about his cameo in the latest Beverly Hills Cop movie and his return in Happy Gilmore 2 . McDonald recently made a surprise appearance in the new Beverly Hills Cop film, where his character’s identity, reminiscent of his Happy Gilmore persona, Shooter McGavin. When asked about the unexpected crossover, McDonald shared that it was a "little gift" from his friend, Maryanne, the casting director who brought him on board. SNL's Bill Hader and Ali Wong make first red carpet debut as a couple Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson set to reunite for SNL years after split “It was a chance to do like a little sneaky little cameo,” McDonald told Daily Express US exclusively. “I love Eddie Murphy, always have been a big fan. They needed a golfer, and I was available.” McDonald reflected on the opportunity to work with Murphy, revealing that while their time together was limited, it was filled with ad-libbed moments. “We ad-libbed a lot of stuff together, and that was fun. But it was a small thing, a blip, you know? There are no small parts,” he added. Looking into 2025, McDonald is gearing up for Happy Gilmore 2, a film that has already generated a significant amount of buzz. While the actor remained quite tight-lipped about the film, due to a non-disclosure agreement, he hinted at a few exciting details. “I can’t really talk about plot points, but there have been some leaks out there about...

title: Young Socceroos’ Asian Cup triumph shows better days are on the horizon
creator: Vince Rugari
content: The Matildas are in a deep, dark hole. A high-profile court case , a seven-month stretch without a full-time coach, a series of poor results and an ill-advised radio rant has turned Australia’s favourite team into a national punching bag. The Socceroos are about to resume their tightrope pursuit of a direct qualifying berth at next year’s World Cup, but the outlook for them is also fairly bleak ahead of this month’s must-win clashes against Indonesia and China. Three of the team’s best centre-backs are injured: first it was Alessandro Circati, then Harry Souttar , and now Hayden Matthews – the Sydney FC product who has made an immediate impact at English Championship outfit Portsmouth since transferring there in January for a record fee – is confirmed to be out for the rest of the season with an ankle problem, leaving coach Tony Popovic desperately short of defensive options. But there are better days ahead. In the early hours of Sunday morning (AEDT), the Young Socceroos, the men’s under-20 national team, created history by winning the Asian Cup for their age group. Undefeated. Most of the country was tucked away in bed when they prevailed 5-4 in a penalty shootout over Saudi Arabia, thanks to a Mark Schwarzer-esque one-handed save by Steven Hall with the final spot kick – but the significance of this achievement should not be slept on. This team had already made history by reaching the semi-finals and clinching a spot at the FIFA U-20 World Cup in Chile later this year,...
