title: Видео полного исторического боя Асу Алмабаева с нокаутом в UFC
content: Казахстанский боец Асу Алмабаев (21-2) сразился с ангольцем Манелом Капе (20-7) на турнире по смешанным единоборствам UFC Fight Night 253 в Лас-Вегасе (США) , сообщает Sports.kz. Нокаутом закончился главный бой Асу Алмабаева в UFC Алмабаев стал первым в истории казахстанцем, который выступил в главном бою турнира UFC. Его бой с Капе прошел в наилегчайшем весе и был запланирован на пять раундов. Итогом противостояния стала победа бойца из Анголы техническим нокаутом в третьем раунде. Видео полного боя Асу Алмабаев — Манел Капе можно посмотреть ниже. Таким образом, Капе выиграл 21-й бой в профессиональной карьере, в то время как Алмабаев в третий раз покинул клетку побежденным. Что касается статистики выступлений Асу в UFC, то теперь у казахстанца в рекорд есть одно поражение — 4-1. Видео нокаута Асу Алмабаева в историческом бою в UFC

title: Carnaval de Cajamarca atraerá a 75 mil visitantes y generará impacto económico cerca a S/70 millones
creator: Redacción Diario Correo
content: Junín: Tren brindará servicio turístico en Semana Santa y Fiestas PatriasEl Ministerio de Comercio Exterior y Turismo (Mincetur) informó hoy que el Carnaval de Cajamarca atraerá este año a aproximadamente unos 75 mil visitantes nacionales y extranjeros, generando un impacto económico cercano a los S/ 70 millones.MIRA: Huancayo: Carnavaleros manchan con pintura paredes de la CatedralLa festividad no solo beneficiará a la economía local, sino también a diversos sectores, incluidos el hospedaje, la gastronomía, el transporte de pasajeros, la confección de trajes y las artesanías, promoviendo un desarrollo integral en la región.Según datos proporcionados por la Dirección General de Investigación y Estudios sobre Turismo y Artesanía del Viceministerio de Turismo, se estima que cerca del 94% de los visitantes que arriben a esta celebración serán nacionales, principalmente de Lima, La Libertad y Lambayeque, mientras que el 6% restante serán turistas internacionales. Estos visitantes extranjeros estarán atraídos por la rica cultura y las tradiciones únicas de Cajamarca, contribuyendo a crear un ambiente festivo.La proyección de la ocupación hotelera durante las fechas centrales del carnaval muestra un incremento significativo, alcanzando un pico del 95%, comparado con el 36% registrado en enero de 2025. Esta creciente demanda también se ve reflejada en los precios de alojamiento, con un 54% de los hospedajes elevando sus tarifas hasta en un 50%.Carnaval de...

title: இந்த படத்துல புலி எங்கே இருக்கு? 15 வினாடிகளில் கண்டுபிடிச்சா நீங்க பிரில்லியண்ட்!

content: Optical illusion game: ஆப்டிகல் இல்யூஷன் விளையாட்டுதான் இன்றைக்கு நெட்டிசன்கள் மத்தியில் பிரபலமான விளையாட்டு. உங்கள் நேரத்தை ஆக்கப்பூர்வமான முறையில் பயன்படுத்த விரும்பினால், உங்களால் முடிந்தவரை விரைவில் ஆப்டிகல் இல்யூஷ்ன் விளையாட்டுகளில் விளையாடத் தொடங்குங்கள். ஆப்டிகல் இல்யூஷன் விளையாடுவதன் மூலம், புரிந்துகொள்ளுதல் மற்றும் திறமையை வளர்ப்பதற்கான உங்கள் திறனை உண்மையில் மேம்படுத்த முடியும் பலரும் கூறுகிறார்கள். இந்த ஆப்டிகல் இல்யூஷன் படத்தில் புலி எங்கே இருக்கிறது என 15 வினாடிகளில் கண்டுபிடிக்க முடியுமா என உங்கள் கூர்மையான பார்வைக்கு சவால். கண்டுபிடித்தால் ஆப்டிகல் இல்யூஷனில் நீங்கள் பிரில்லியண்ட், இது உங்கள் கண்களை ஏமாற்றும் தந்திரம். உத்தேசமாக யோசித்து கண்டுபிடிக்க வேண்டிய சவால் இது. ஆப்டிகல் இல்யூஷன் விளையாட்டு மனிதர்களின் பொதுவான பார்வைக் கோணத்தையும் ஒரு காட்சியை எப்படிப் பார்த்து உணர்ந்து புரிந்துகொள்கிறார்கள் என்பதை அடிப்படையாக வைத்து உருவாக்கப்பட்டுள்ளது. ஆப்டிகல் இல்யூஷன் படத்தில் நீங்கள் தேட வேண்டிய விலங்கை ஒரு இடத்தில் இல்யூஷன் செய்து மறைத்துவிட்டு, உங்களின் கவனத்தை வேறு பக்கம் ஈர்க்கும் விதமாக இருக்கும். ஆனால், நீங்கள் கொஞ்சம் ஸ்மார்ட்டாக யோசித்தால் மிகவும் எளிதாக கண்டுபிடித்து விடலாம். இந்த ஆப்டிகல் இல்யூஷன் சவாலை ஏற்று நீங்கள் கொஞ்சம் ட்ரை பண்ணி பாருங்க. இந்த படம் முகநூலில் மசினகுடி டூரிஸம் என்றா பக்கத்தில் வெளியாகி உள்ளது. இந்த படத்தை லாப நோக்கம் இல்லாமல் பொழுதுபோக்கிற்காக பயன்படுத்துகிறோம். இந்த ஆப்டிகல் இல்யூஷன் படத்தில் புலி எங்கே இருக்கிறது என 15 வினாடிகளில் கண்டுபிடிக்க முடியுமா என உங்கள் கூர்மையான பார்வைக்கு சவால். கண்டுபிடித்தால் ஆப்டிகல்...

title: গাজায় যুদ্ধবিরতি বাড়ানোর সিদ্ধান্তে ইসরায়েলের সম্মতি– হামাস কী করবে?
Экс-главком предупредил о конце НАТО из-за Трампа и Украины
creator: Наталия Анисимова
content: Бывший главнокомандующий Вооруженными силами НАТО в Европе адмирал Джеймс Ставридис предупредил в эфире CNN, что блок может прекратить свое существование и трансформироваться в военный альянс европейских стран — Организацию европейского договора. «Мы, вероятно, наблюдаем последние дни НАТО», — сказал Ставридис (цитата по The Telegraph ). Издание пишет, что беспокойство среди европейских членов альянса, вызванное требованием президента США Дональда Трампа повысить оборонные расходы до 5% ВВП, усилилось после его перепалки с украинским президентом Владимиром Зеленским в Белом доме. По словам Ставридиса, основной вопрос для союзников по НАТО заключается в том, кого поддерживать — «подвергшуюся атаке демократию», то есть Украину, или Россию, начавшую военные действия. «Это глубоко вобьет клин в самое сердце альянса», — заявил адмирал, отметив, что последствия будут заметны не только на Украине. Европейские лидеры начнут сомневаться, можно ли доверять Соединенным Штатам как партнеру, считает он. «Дональд Трамп ясно дал понять, что не хочет принимать участия в оказании помощи Украине в дальнейшем», — сказал Ставридис, назвав это геополитической ошибкой «эпических масштабов». The Washington Post , The New York Times и The Wall Street Journal написали, что власти США рассматривают возможность прекратить военную поддержку Киева после неудачной встречи Трампа с Зеленским. В то же время европейские и украинские чиновники в разговоре с WP допустили, что это не...

title: EEUU: Avión de FedEx aterriza de emergencia por impacto de ave e incendio en motor (+ Video)
creator: Cubadebate
content: El aterrizaje forzoso detuvo brevemente el tráfico aéreo como medida preventiva, aunque las operaciones se reanudaron poco después. Foto: AP. Un avión de carga de FedEx realizó un en el Aeropuerto Internacional de Newark Liberty el sábado tras sufrir un impacto de ave que provocó un incendio en uno de sus motores. El incidente, ocurrido alrededor de las 8 de la mañana, , según Lenis Valens, portavoz de la Autoridad Portuaria de Nueva York y Nueva Jersey, citado por medios de prensa. En un audio obtenido por LiveATC, se escucha a un miembro de la tripulación informar con calma sobre la necesidad de y solicitar regresar al aeropuerto. Minutos después, otro interlocutor advierte: . El impacto habría ocurrido cuando la nave volaba a cientos de metros de altura. Las tres personas a bordo desembarcaron sin complicaciones. , según Austin Kemker, portavoz de FedEx, quien destacó que los daños incluyeron un incendio en el motor. “La capacitación, experiencia y profesionalismo demostrados por nuestros pilotos de FedEx fueron ejemplares. Agradecemos las rápidas acciones de nuestra tripulación y de los cuerpos de rescate”, señaló Kemker. Kenneth Hoffman, piloto de otro vuelo, relató que escuchó sobre la emergencia durante el despegue y compartió un video en redes sociales donde se ven llamas saliendo del costado del avión de FedEx en tierra, con equipos de emergencia alrededor. , afirmó Hoffman. 🛬🔥 Aterriza de emergencia un avión de carga en EEUU La aeronave de...

title: Oilers gauging market for Evander Kane
creator: Sportsnet Staff
content: Sitting right up against the salary cap, it'll take some clever manoeuvring should the Edmonton Oilers wish to add ahead of the trade deadline in their push for the Stanley Cup. One of the ways they can clear cap room would be to trade Evander Kane . The team is currently gauging the market to see if there's a potential suitor for Kane and his $5.125 million cap hit, Sportsnet's Elliotte Friedman reported in the latest edition of Saturday Headlines on Hockey Night in Canada. The forward is on the books through the 2025-26 season after putting pen to paper on a four-year, $20.5 million contract ahead of the 2022-23 season in a deal that included a no-trade clause at one point. However, an options finally opened up should the Oilers wish to move on. "Last night, Evander Kane's no-trade protection evaporated — he no longer has a full no-trade clause, he has a partial one," Friedman said. "His situation is that the Oilers are going through those teams, and they're trying to see what the market could be for him." Sportsnet's hockey news breakers, analysts and reporters will have coast-to-coast coverage of all the moves made ahead of this season's NHL trade deadline. Full coverage on March 7 begins at 10 a.m. ET/7 a.m. PT on Sportsnet and Sportsnet+. Kane is currently on the long-term injured reserve after undergoing knee surgery in January. He has yet to suit up for the Oilers this season after undergoing abdominal surgery in the fall and missing the first chunk of the year. The...

title: 고양시, 적극행정으로 경제·민생 규제 혁신 선도
creator: 국민일보
content: 경기 고양시는 기업 성장과 시민 삶의 질 향상을 목표로 경제와 민생의 걸림돌이 되는 불합리한 규제를 개선하는 등 적극행정을 펼치고 있다고 2일 밝혔다. 시가 지난해 발굴한 51건의 규제개선 과제 중 택시운전자격증 지역 제한 폐지, 지식산업센터 통근버스 운영 근거 마련, 공유창고 대여서비스 관련 제도 개선 등 8건이 수용되고 4건은 일부 수용돼 총 12건의 규제가 개선될 전망이다. 택시운전자격증이 시·도별로 제한됐던 기존 제도를 전국 통합 자격증으로 개선해 운전자들의 지역 간 이동 제약을 해소할 예정이다. 이는 내비게이션과 플랫폼 택시서비스 발전으로 지리지식의 중요성이 감소했음을 반영한 결과다. 또한 지식산업센터 인근 교통인프라 부족 문제를 해결하기 위해 통근버스 운영 근거를 마련하고, 공유창고 대여서비스가 주거지역에서도 가능하도록 법령 개정을 추진 중이다. 이는 1인 가구 증가와 개인창고 수요 증가에 따른 사회적 요구를 반영한 것이다. 이와 같은 성과로 시는 2022년과 2024년 행정안전부 지방규제혁신 평가에서 우수 지자체로 선정됐으며, 2023년에는 우수사례 경진대회 장려상을 수상했다. 또한 특별교부세 2억원을 확보하며 규제혁신 선도 도시로 자리매김했다. 시는 규제 발굴에 그치지 않고 개선 효과가 있는 대안을 제시하며 불수용 과제에 대해 논리를 보강해 재협의하는 등 적극행정을 이어가고 있다. 지난해에는 ‘찾아가는 지방규제신고센터’를 운영해 지역 내 기업들의 애로사항을 청취하고...

title: UFC Fight Night results in full as Manel Kape handed major boost after title claim
creator: Joseph McBride
content: Manel Kape made a major statement after securing a third-round stoppage against Asu Almabayev, who hasn't lost a fight since 2017. Almabayev was dominated throughout the main event, just as Kape predicted after manifesting that he would become a UFC champion this year. After the fight, he sent a clear statement to UFC President Dana White by demanding a title shot, putting pressure on him to make the fight against Alexandre Pantoja happen. "Who is next? Who denies my title fight now? I am the best," Kape said after beating Almabayev. Kape promised to put on a good show, and kept his word as he told MMA Fighting ahead of facing Almabayev: "This is finally the year [I become champion]. I believe so. I really believe. I’m in good shape, I’ve been very good in training. Very good in my sparring." Brad Keselowski's surprising role emerges in bid to add new NASCAR manufacturer Kyle Larson told exactly what he is by Christopher Bell after rivalry addressed "I’m going to put on a show, another highlight and then get the title, that’s the future that I see. Only God knows everything and we will see what’s going to happen." Kape requested a title fight against UFC Flyweight champion Alexandre Pantoja after an impressive win over Bruno Gustavo da Silva on Dec. 14, 2024, but his call went unanswered. Instead, Pantoja's next opponent is expected to be No. 4 UFC flyweight contender Kai Kara-France. Despite being snubbed, Kape believes that his title opportunity will come, and believes...

title: Президент Чехии Павел призвал создать коалицию стран, поддерживающих Киев
content: Президент Чехии заявил о возможности создания коалиции стран, которые желают «справедливого мира» на Украине. — написал Павел в соцсети Х. Чешский лидер отметил, что мирное соглашение, не включающее условия киевских властей, будет являться «капитуляцией». Как сообщало , 23 февраля Павел заявил, что необходимо продолжать, несмотря на критику главы киевского режима со стороны президента США , который намерен наладить диалог с Россией. После перепалки в Белом доме между Трампом и Зеленским европейские политики в социальных сетях в адрес главы режима, но ждать от Европы более конфронтационных выпадов в отношении США не стоит, заявил политолог, ведущий научный сотрудник Института Европы РАН .

title: Hôm nay 2/3, giá vàng tiếp tục lao dốc: Điều gì đang xảy ra?
content: Sáng nay, theo giờ Việt Nam, trên thị trường thế giới giá vàng giao quanh ngưỡng 2.857 USD/ounce, giảm 20 USD so với phiên giao dịch trước. So với mốc đỉnh lịch sử từng thiết lập, giá vàng đã giảm tới 98 USD, kết thúc mạch leo dốc liên tục từ cuối tháng 12. Dù vậy, tính trong tháng 2, kim loại quý này vẫn tăng 30,3 USD/ounce (1,07%). Diễn biến giá vàng thế giới. (Theo Kitco). Thị trường vàng vừa trải qua một tuần biến động mạnh, thiết lập kỷ lục mới trước khi lao dốc sâu. Đợt tăng giá suốt 8 tuần của kim loại quý đột ngột dừng lại, xuất phát từ đồng USD lên giá và tâm lý thị trường thay đổi liên quan đến chính sách thuế quan của Tổng thống Mỹ Donald Trump. Nhà chiến lược thị trường Yeap Jun Rong cho rằng, vàng vẫn là kênh trú ẩn an toàn, tuy nhiên hoạt động chốt lời và sự vững mạnh của đồng USD đang tạo áp lực lên giá vàng. Tổng thống Mỹ Donald Trump mới đây đã tuyên bố áp mức thuế 25% đối với hàng hóa nhập khẩu từ Mexico và Canada, cùng mức thuế bổ sung 10% lên các mặt hàng của Trung Quốc, bắt đầu có hiệu lực từ ngày 4/3. Động thái này đã hỗ trợ đồng USD tăng giá và gây áp lực lên thị trường kim loại. Chỉ số USD Index (DXY), thước đo sức mạnh của đồng bạc xanh so với các...

title: ‘Tough if we’re gonna run last’: Ricky’s pointed swipe at critics after Raiders rout in Vegas
content: Canberra coach Ricky Stuart delivered a pointed message to his critics after the Raiders got their NRL premiership underway with a 30-8 victory over the Warriors in Las Vegas. Watch the 2025 NRL Telstra Premiership season opening double-header LIVE from Las Vegas on Kayo, SUN 2 MAR 10AM | New to Kayo? Get your first month for just $1. Limited time offer > Opening the season for the first time in more than three decades, the Raiders produced a dazzling performance at Allegiant Stadium on Sunday morning AEDT , with winger Xavier Savage scoring a double on the right edge before half-time. Meanwhile, the Warriors were sloppy in defence, missing 36 tackles compared to Canberra’s 12. “We’re proud to be part of this, it’s a great occasion,” Stuart told Fox League after the 22-point triumph. “People underestimate these guys. “They’re a tough forward pack, they played against a tough forward pack tonight. “That was brutal in the middle there tonight ... we knew it was going to be a battle, we knew were going to have to be on our game. “We’re had a really good pre-season, and I think that shows.” Stuart also took a swipe at pundits that predicted the Raiders would receive the wooden spoon this season, quipping: “It’s gonna be a tough competition mate if we’re gonna run last.” READ MORE Hoops: Inside Ricky’s Vegas ambush... and the young guns who just put NRL on notice ‘No... title: UAPB defeats Mississippi Valley State 83-58
creator: The Canadian Press
content: ITTA BENA, Miss. (AP) — Doctor Bradley's 26 points helped UAPB defeat Mississippi Valley State 83-58 on Saturday. Bradley also added six rebounds for the Golden Lions (6-23, 3-13 Southwestern Athletic Conference). Klemen Vuga scored 18 points while shooting 6 of 12 from the field and 6 for 8 from the line and added 10 rebounds. Quentin Bolton Jr. had 17 points and shot 7 for 9, including 3 for 3 from beyond the arc. Donovan Sanders led the way for the Delta Devils (3-26, 1-15) with 12 points. Antonio Sisk added 12 points and four steals for Mississippi Valley State. Daniel Umoh had 11 points and eight rebounds. The loss was the Delta Devils' seventh in a row. Both teams play on Thursday. UAPB hosts Jackson State and Mississippi Valley State hosts Alcorn State. ___ The Associated Press created this story using technology provided by Data Skrive and data from Sportradar . The Associated Press

title: أرسنال وليفربول يعودان لملاحقة لوكمان
content: هاي كورة – حصلت أندية الدوري الإنجليزي الممتاز على دفعة معنوية في السباق للتعاقد مع النجم النيجيري أديمولا لوكمان، بعد أن أعلن نادي أتالانتا الإيطالي عن استعداده لبيع اللاعب في السوق الصيفية.لوكمان، الذي أبدع مع أتالانتا وسجل ثلاثية في نهائي الدوري الأوروبي الموسم الماضي، يبحث عن تحدي جديد بعد أن فقد مكانته الأساسية في التشكيلة تحت قيادة المدرب جيان بييرو جاسبريني.وكان لوكمان على وشك الانضمام إلى باريس سان جيرمان الصيف الماضي، لكن الصفقة فشلت في اللحظات الأخيرة، مما فتح الباب أمام أندية الدوري الإنجليزي لاستئناف مفاوضاتهم مع اللاعب.وكان كل من أرسنال وليفربول قد أبديا اهتمامًا بلوكمان في السابق، لكنهما لم يتابعا الصفقة.ومع اقتراب نهاية عقده مع أتالانتا في صيف 2026، يبدو أن النادي الإيطالي يرغب في بيعه هذا الصيف لتجنب خسارته مجانًا في المستقبل.ومن المتوقع أن تصل قيمة الصفقة إلى أكثر من 50 مليون جنيه إسترليني، وهو مبلغ قد يشكل تحديًا لبعض الأندية الأوروبية نظرًا لعمر اللاعب الذي سيبلغ 28 عامًا قريبًا.

title: New York Dolls singer David Johansen dies at 75

title: Govt Jobs 2025: जूनियर इंजीनियर के पद पर निकली सरकारी नौकरी, 8 मार्च से शुरू होंगे आवेदन
creator: TV9 Bharatvarsh
content: जम्मू और कश्मीर सेवा चयन बोर्ड यानी जेकेएसएसबी (JKSSB) ने जूनियर इंजीनियर के कई पदों पर भर्तियां निकाली हैं, जिसके लिए आवेदन मांगे गए हैं. इच्छुक और योग्य योग्य उम्मीदवार जेकेएसएसबी की ऑफिशियल वेबसाइट jkssb.nic.in पर जाकर ऑनलाइन आवेदन कर सकते हैं. इस भर्ती अभियान के तहत कुल 292 पदों पर भर्तियां की जाएंगी. रजिस्ट्रेशन प्रक्रिया 8 मार्च से शुरू होगी और 7 अप्रैल 2025 को खत्म होगी. जम्मू-कश्मीर सेवा चयन बोर्ड परीक्षा की डेट और एग्जाम सेंटर की घोषणा बाद में करेगा.JKSSB JE Vacancy Details:वैकेंसी डिटेल्सजेएंडके पावर ट्रांसमिशन कॉर्पोरेशन लिमिटेड: 92 पदजम्मू विद्युत वितरण निगम लिमिटेड: 60 पदकश्मीर विद्युत वितरण निगम लिमिटेड: 129 पदजेएंडके पावर कॉर्पोरेशन लिमिटेड: 11 पदJKSSB JE Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria: पात्रता मानदंड क्या हैं?शैक्षणिक योग्यता- जो भी उम्मीदवार इन पदों के लिए आवेदन करना चाहते हैं, उनके पास बैचलर डिग्री या एएमआईई (सेकण्ड ए&बी) इंडिया या इलेक्ट्रिकल/इलेक्ट्रॉनिक इंजीनियरिंग में तीन वर्षीय डिप्लोमा या समकक्ष डिग्री होनी चाहिए.उम्र सीमा- सामान्य कैटेगरी के उम्मीदवार और सरकारी कर्मचारियों की अधिकतम उम्र सीमा 40 साल और ओबीसी, ईडब्ल्यूएस, एससी, एसटी के लिए 43 साल होनी चाहिए. वहीं, एक्स सर्विसमैन के लिए अधिकतम उम्र सीमा 48 साल मांगी गई है.JKSSB JE Recruitment 2025 Official NotificationJKSSB JE Recruitment 2025 Application Fees: आवेदन शुल्क कितना है?सामान्य वर्ग के उम्मीदवारों के लिए आवेदन शुल्क 600 रुपये है, अनुसूचित जाति, अनुसूचित जनजाति-1, अनुसूचित जनजाति-2, ईडब्ल्यूएस और पीडब्ल्यूबीडी कैटेगरी के उम्मीदवारों को आवेदन शुल्क के रूप में 500 रुपये का भुगतान करना...

title: മുപ്പാലം നാൽപാലമായി; ഈ മാസം അവസാനത്തോടെ തുറന്നു നൽകും
content: ഇവിടെ പോസ്റ്റു ചെയ്യുന്ന അഭിപ്രായങ്ങൾ മലയാള മനോരമയുടേതല്ല. അഭിപ്രായങ്ങളുടെ പൂർണ ഉത്തരവാദിത്തം രചയിതാവിനായിരിക്കും. കേന്ദ്ര സർക്കാരിന്റെ ഐടി നയപ്രകാരം വ്യക്തി, സമുദായം, മതം, രാജ്യം എന്നിവയ്ക്കെതിരായി അധിക്ഷേപങ്ങളും അശ്ലീല പദപ്രയോഗങ്ങളും നടത്തുന്നത് ശിക്ഷാർഹമായ കുറ്റമാണ്. ഇത്തരം അഭിപ്രായ പ്രകടനത്തിന് നിയമനടപടി കൈക്കൊള്ളുന്നതാണ്.

title: UK PM Starmer meets Ukrainian President Zelensky
content: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer met with visiting Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky. During their meeting at Downing Street, Starmer said Ukraine has “full backing across the United Kingdom.” He stressed Britain’s “unwavering determination” to achieve a lasting peace. Advertisement Zelensky thanked Starmer for the support Britain has shown to Ukraine since the start of the Russia-Ukraine conflict, Xinhua news agency reported. Advertisement Zelensky’s visit came ahead of a defence summit Britain is hosting, with European leaders gathering in London on Sunday to discuss a peace plan for Ukraine. Starmer has said he believes such a deal will have to involve the United States. Zelensky said on social media X shortly before his plane touched down in London earlier Saturday that Ukraine is “ready to sign the minerals agreement” with the United States, but “a ceasefire without security guarantees is dangerous for Ukraine.” Zelensky’s visit to Britain followed his meeting with US President Donald Trump on Friday evening in the White House, where a routine presence in front of a press pool erupted into an unexpected shouting match. The fiery exchange between the two sides started with an interjection by US Vice President JD Vance, who demanded that Zelensky be thankful for Trump’s efforts to get his country out of its three-year conflict with Russia. After the public clash, Zelensky was eventually asked to leave the White House early, leaving the planned minerals deal...

title: Bryce Dallas Howard Shares Touching Tribute to Dad Ron on His 71st Birthday: 'I Love You More Than Words Can Say'
creator: People
content: Bryce Dallas Howard is celebrating her dad Ron Howard 's birthday with a heartfelt tribute. On Saturday, March 1, Bryce, 43, shared a post on Instagram in honor of her dad turning 71. She included a photo of the father-daughter duo sitting together at a table at a gala, with each of them grinning at the camera as Bryce rested her head on her dad's shoulder. "I love you so much Dad, more than words can say 🥹❤️," the actress captioned the sweet photo. "Happy Birthday @realronhoward!⁣" Related: Bryce Dallas Howard Recalls Dad Ron Howard and George Lucas Having Kids at the Same Time: 'They Were Parenting Together' The Jurassic World actress has always been candid about her close relationship with her filmmaker dad. Last month, the two stars appeared on a panel together at MegaCon in Orlando, Fla., and the Happy Days alum spoke about wanting to protect his daughter from the more complicated aspects of becoming a child actor. Opening up about his early life in Oklahoma, Ron recalled how his own parents — director Rance Howard and actress Jean Speegle — encouraged him to start working as a child actor on shows including The Andy Griffith Show (in which he starred as Opie Taylor). Like himself, Ron said Bryce began to "show a real aptitude" for performing when she was just a child — but he explained that he worried at the time about her falling into his shadow . "She would ask about [acting], and my wife Cheryl and I would say, 'No, we can't let you be a child actor,' " the Oscar...

title: தேவாலய திருவிழாவில் 4 பேரின் உயிரை பறித்த இரும்பு ஏணி...ஸ்டாலின் ரூ.5 லட்சம் நிவாரணம் அறிவிப்பு
creator: WebDesk
content: கன்னியாகுமரி மாவட்டம் புதுக்கடை அருகே இணையம் புத்தன்துறை என்ற மீனவ கிராமத்தில் உள்ள தேவாலயத்தில் கடந்த 15 நாட்களாக தேர் திருவிழா நடந்து வருகிறது. திருவிழாவின் ஒரு பகுதியாக மார்ச் 1 ஆம் தேதி இரவு தேர்பவனி நடைபெற இருந்தது. அதற்காக தேரை அலங்காரம் செய்ய தேவாலயத்துக்கு வெளியே 4 பேர் ராட்சத இரும்பு ஏணியை நகர்த்தி சென்றனர். அப்போது அந்த பகுதியில் சென்ற உயரழுத்த மின்கம்பியில் இரும்பு ஏணி உரசி அடுத்த நொடியே உயரழுத்த மின்கம்பியில் இருந்து மின்சாரம் இரும்பு ஏணி வழியாக பாய்ந்தது. இதில் ஏணியை நகர்த்தி சென்ற அருள், மைக்கேல் பிண்டோ உள்பட 4 பேரின் உடலிலும் மின்சாரம் பாய்ந்தது. இதையடுத்து அங்கிருந்தவர்கள் மின்சாரம் தாக்கி உடல் கருகிய நிலையில் இருந்த 4 பேரையும் மீட்டு குழித்துறை அரசு மருத்துவமனைக்கு கொண்டு சென்றனர். பரிசோதித்த மருத்துவர்கள் 3 பேர் ஏற்கனவே இறந்துவிட்டதாக தெரிவித்தனர். இந்நிலையில் புனித அந்தோனியார் ஆலய விழாவின்போது மின்சாரம் பாய்ந்து உயிரிழந்தவர்களின் குடும்பத்தினருக்கு முதலமைச்சர் ஸ்டாலின் ரூ. 5 லட்சம் நிவாரணம் அறிவித்துள்ளார்.

title: 盛弘代表:“平底鞋”走社区 希望让“烟火气”点燃消费
content: 中新网 上海3月2日电 (记者 陈静)“提振经济、拉动消费”是全国人大代表、上海市长宁区虹桥街道古北荣华第四居民区党总支书记盛弘近期调研的方向。 在盛弘看来,提振消费的落脚点在于激活“烟火气”。她近日接受 中新网 记者专访时说,去年,在走访辖区人才公寓的商业配套时,准备选址在这里开新店的一对夫妻给她带来启发。盛弘说,这对夫妻是古北居民,前些年在黄金城道步行街开了一家咖啡店,颇有特色。问及为何想再开一家店?夫妻俩的回答是:“因为这里有‘烟火气’啊!” 说到“烟火气”,盛弘认为,首先要有人气,其次要有氛围感,还要能沉浸式地为消费者提供情绪价值。现在的消费,其实更多在于调动人的“五感”,比如,喝咖啡时看到的景象、听到的背景音乐、咖啡杯上的文化元素等,消费者花钱能够获得更多的价值。二次元、网红IP都是值得关注的。“打造活力街区、提振消费,应该多多关注社区街角,以‘烟火气’激活消费。”她认为,打造百花齐放的创新业态,应多培育沉浸式、生活化、体验新颖的消费新场景,出台更多有利政策。 在调研中,盛弘发现,老百姓更希望在家门口就能方便地消费,解决实际问题。比如:吃饭问题、可供选择的上门养老服务、老人陪诊服务等。长者食堂、社区食堂的可持续发展不仅需要政府努力,也需要激活市场主体的积极性。如何能够更好地撬动社会力量参与也值得思考。 刚步入社会时,盛弘是一位国际物流企业的白领。“那时候,我还兼任了楼宇党支部书记。”这位“80后”全国人大代表说,这为自己后来从事基层工作奠定了基础。从2010年起,脱下“高跟鞋”换上“平底鞋”,盛弘来到虹桥街道工作,直到今天。 她清晰地记得,曾在另一个以老旧公房为主的传统居民区工作了21个月零2天。“回头看看,那段时间,我努力学习和实践如何与社区居民打交道、如何走家串户、如何与居民‘搭上话’交上朋友。”盛弘说,这为她后来到国际社区工作打下了坚实基础。 上海古北国际社区是中国最早的一批涉外居民区。说起十多年的社区工作,盛弘感慨:“社区是宝藏,跟各行各业的人接触,我和伙伴们经常说,要拜居民为师。”2013年春到古北工作后,盛弘和工作人员一起搭建了“古北市民议事厅”,希望工作、生活在辖区的中外居民可共同参与“融情家园”建设。 盛弘坦言,社区工作是与时俱进的——新时代居民需求不同、交流方式不断改变,有很多新型的邻里关系出现。比如:居民和商户就是一种新型的邻里关系。现在街区成立了党支部,也有共治委员会这样多元主体共同参与的治理载体和平台。“作为基层社区工作者,我们积极动员各方力量,践行全过程人民民主。” 在盛弘的办公室有个小茶几,上面堆着两摞厚厚的书籍和杂志。这是她每天要学习的“功课”。她表示,作为全国人大代表,需要充实多领域的知识,也希望能够联动好市、区各级人大代表,集思广益,为民发声。(完)

title: “Render City”; Presidente Nayib Bukele destaca proyectos que son una realidad para los salvadoreños
creator: Redacción Diario La Página
content: El Presidente Nayib Bukele, resaltó en un reciente video los avances de varios proyectos emblemáticos de infraestructura que en el pasado fueron criticados por la oposición, quienes los calificaron como simples “renders”, pero que hoy son una realidad.Entre las obras mencionadas se encuentra la Biblioteca Nacional de El Salvador (BINAES), un moderno centro cultural que ya está en funcionamiento y ha sido reconocido por su innovador diseño y acceso gratuito al conocimiento.También el mandatario destacó el nuevo Hospital Rosales, una obra que transformará el sistema de salud del país con instalaciones de última generación para la atención de pacientes.Además, el Presidente Bukele hizo referencia al Aeropuerto del Pacífico, una infraestructura clave para potenciar el comercio y el turismo en la zona costera del país, así como al Viaducto Francisco Morazán, un megaproyecto que mejorará la conectividad y reducirá significativamente los tiempos de tránsito en la carretera a Los Chorros.

title: Region 6: Christian Brothers collects eight titles in tour-de-force
content: Christian Brothers senior AJ Falcone answered so many questions with three simple words. “It’s a mindset.” He was talking about getting out in the rideout phase to secure the championship at 165 pounds at the NJSIAA/IBEW Local 102 Region 6 championships at Jackson Liberty High School. But he was also talking about what drove his team to reach nine finals, win eight weights and advance 11 wrestlers to the state championships, on tap next weekend at Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City. Falcone’s 2-1 win came at the expense of Point Pleasant Boro sophomore Jake Clayton, who’d come into their bout with a 37-0 record. By the end of regulation, each wrestler had just an escape to show for his work, and neither managed anything in the sudden victory phase. “We have the same wrestling style,” said Falcone, now 28-5 and a two-time region champ. “We wrestled each other in eighth grade and we know each other pretty well. Like I said, it’s all about who wanted it more; who had that mindset. I think it’s a big part of that.” Falcone’s determination brought him more than a bracket sheet. He was presented with the tournament’s Most Outstanding Wrestler plaque at the close of the day’s events. Falcone’s title came during a run of five straight by the Colts that began with junior William Sakoutis at 144 pounds -- another mindset guy. Sakoutis' bid for his first title nearly came to an end in the first minute of the final, when Ocean Township’s top-seeded Michael Volek ducked under him, then took...

title: 罷免9綠委一階未達門檻 郭正亮曝藍基層炸鍋:連這2位都沒達標像話嗎?
creator: 張庭維
content: 全台大罷免烽火四起,中選會27日公布第一階段審查結果,但9件針對民進黨立委的罷免案全數未達門檻,皆需補件,引發廣泛討論。對此,前立委郭正亮在節目《 林嘉源辣晚報 》指出,罷免一階連署門檻僅需1%,結果國民黨卻連這兩位綠委的罷免案都未達標,藍營基層都氣炸了,這樣像話嗎? 透過 追蹤風傳媒 不少罷免團體趕在春節開工後首日遞交第一階段提議書,中選會27日宣布,19個針對國民黨立委,與現被停職的新竹市長高虹安罷免案,第一階段提議書皆審議通過;另外後續送的另外9名立委罷免案則需補件。值得注意的是,9件須未通過的罷免案對象皆為民進黨立委。 對此,郭正亮表示,罷免一階連署門檻僅需1%,結果國民黨卻連原住民選區立委陳瑩、伍麗華的罷免案都未達標,這是國民黨主席朱立倫下令的罷免行動,卻搞成這樣,「這像話嗎?」 郭正亮指出,民進黨明年要參選議員人選已全面動員,但反觀國民黨陣營動員力度明顯不足,「叫你們的選民來連署,這有什麼問題嗎?」他認識的許多藍營基層都對此結果感到非常的不滿。 郭正亮認為,這次的罷免連署挫敗或許有助於喚醒國民黨內危機意識,未通過門檻的罷免案仍有10天補件期限,國民黨應把握時機,儘速亡羊補牢,以免錯失政治攻防良機。

Выяснилось, кто спланировал перепалку Зеленского с Трампа
creator: Ирина Зражевская
content: По мнению британского аналитика Александра Меркуриса, киевский главарь Владимир Зеленский прибыл в Белый дом уже планируя конфликт с президентом США Дональдом Трампом. «Вопреки заявлениям СМИ, особенно европейских, о том, что Зеленский попал в ловушку, факты говорят о том, что Зеленский прибыл в Белый дом с намерением если не устроить скандал, то хотя бы выйти на конфликт с президентом США. Я уверен, что спор начался еще за закрытыми дверями, но Зеленский решил продолжить его перед камерами», - заявил Меркурис на YouTube. По его мнению, ключом к разгадке может быть сделка по минеральным ресурсам, которую политики так и не подписали. Аналитик добавил, что договор был частью плана победы Зеленского. И многие ошибочно считали, что он должен был обеспечить Киеву выигрышную позицию на переговорах. «Суть в том, что минеральная сделка усилила бы заинтересованность США в конфликте, и, с некоторыми уловками, Украина смогла бы вовлечь США в полноценную конфронтацию с Россией, а, может, и в настоящую войну», - указал Александр Меркурис. Между тем, эскалация конфликта с РФ не входит в интересы Соединенных Штатов – Вашингтон хочет лишь сделки с экономической точки зрения, несмотря на призывы Украины на военном вовлечении. Ранее сообщалось, что в Соединенных Штатах ждут публичных извинений от киевского главаря.

title: Overnight break-in at California animal shelter sets dozens of dogs on the loose
content: A person broke into a Southern California animal shelter in the middle of the night on Wednesday, setting dozens of dogs free on city streets. The break-in happened at the San Bernardino City Animal Shelter at 333 Chandler Place at approximately 4 a.m., Sgt. Christopher Gray with the San Bernardino Police Department told SFGATE. Kristine Watson, the director of the City of San Bernardino Animal Services, told SFGATE that the burglar used bolt cutters to cut the lock on the shelter’s front gate and then cut the locks of the dogs’ kennels. A Facebook video posted by the shelter shows a hooded person walking out of the facility as a group of dogs follows. “We were all worried that the dogs are running loose ... are any of them going to be hit by a car? They’re now at risk,” Watson said when describing her initial reaction to the break-in. She said about 25 dogs were running loose on the adjacent street, but Animal Control officers and the San Bernardino Police Department have been able to locate almost all of the animals. Just a few hours after the break-in, four of the dogs were found in a dumpster about a block away, Watson said, and another dog, Thelma, was found at a nearby Target. As of Friday, there is only one dog missing, Louise, who is a 2-year-old blonde Chihuahua. All the dogs were checked by veterinarians and turned out to be fine. Watson said it “doesn’t make sense” why someone would break into the shelter, but she plans to install additional security measures...

title: Evangelio de hoy, domingo 2 de marzo de 2025: “La boca habla de lo que está lleno el corazón”
creator: Redacción LAVOZ
content: En la misa, la Liturgia de la Palabra es uno de los momentos centrales de la celebración. En este punto, se leen los pasajes de la Biblia que permiten adentrarse en las enseñanzas de Jesucristo. Compartimos los textos del domingo 2 de marzo de 2025 publicados por el sitio web del Vaticano. Desde Roma. El papa Francisco envió un mensaje desde el hospital donde permanece internado: “Recen por mí” Liturgia del 2 de marzo de 2025: Primera lectura Lectura del libro del Eclesiástico Sirácida 27, 5-8 Al agitar el cernidor, aparecen las basuras; en la discusión aparecen los defectos del hombre. En el horno se prueba la vasija del alfarero; la prueba del hombre está en su razonamiento. El fruto muestra cómo ha sido el cultivo de un árbol; la palabra muestra la mentalidad del hombre. Nunca alabes a nadie antes de que hable, porque ésa es la prueba del hombre. Liturgia del 2 de marzo de 2025: Segunda lectura Lectura de la primera carta del apóstol san Pablo a los Corintios 1 Corintios 15, 54-58 Hermanos: Cuando nuestro ser corruptible y mortal se revista de incorruptibilidad e inmortalidad, entonces se cumplirá la palabra de la Escritura: La muerte ha sido aniquilada por la victoria. ¿Dónde está, muerte, tu victoria? ¿Dónde está, muerte, tu aguijón? El aguijón de la muerte es el pecado y la fuerza del pecado es la ley. Gracias a Dios, que nos ha dado la victoria por nuestro Señor Jesucristo. Así pues, hermanos míos muy amados, estén firmes y permanezcan...

title: 30-летний троллейбус продают в Новосибирске почти за 200 тысяч
creator: Елизавета Горячева
content: Троллейбус, выпущенный более 30 лет назад, продают в Новосибирске. Транспорт выставили на торги за 196,7 тысячи рублей. Согласно сайту «ГИС Торги», троллейбус ЗИУ-6205 предназначен для городских перевозок пассажиров при температуре от -40 до +40 градусов. Выпущена модель в 1995 году, троллейбус вмещает 166 человек. Балансовая стоимость транспорта составляет почти 637 тысяч рублей, на торги его выставили по рыночной стоимости за 196,7 тысячи рублей. В отчете об оценке имущества указано, что состояние троллейбуса неудовлетворительное, использовать его в качестве транспортного средства невозможно, а ремонт нецелесообразен. НГС направил запрос в пресс-центр мэрии, чтобы узнать, почему продают троллейбус и как давно он не выходит на линию. Недавно в Новосибирске выставили на аукцион автомобиль Audi вишневого цвета.

title: 東京マラソン日本女子1位は安藤友香
content: 【東京マラソン】女子は安藤友香が日本人トップ2時間23分37秒の11位 世界選手権出場に前進 ◇2日◇東京都庁~東京駅前・行幸通り(42・195キロ) 安藤友香(30=しまむら)が日本人トップとなる2時間23分37秒(速報値)の11位でゴールし、世界選手権出場に大きく前進した。

title: South Korea’s Birth Rate Bounces Back For The First Time In Almost A Decade
creator: Serah S. Cherrie
content: South Korea’s birth rate has risen in 2024, breaking a nine-year streak of uninterrupted downtrend. According to a report by Statistic Korea on February 26, KST, the country’s fertility rate rose by 0.03 percent in 2024. This news has sparked significant public discourse as South Korea has been grappling with a demographic crisis due to the falling birth rate and the increase in the elderly population. The South Korean government’s preliminary assessment showed that, on average, a South Korean woman gave birth to 0.75 babies in her lifetime in 2024. The number was 0.73 in 2023. In 2015, this figure was 1.24 and has seen a steady decline ever since. Statistics Korea attributed this rise in fertility rate to an increased number of women in the child-rearing age bracket, pending weddings taking place after a pause due to the COVID-19 outbreak, and an overall positive outlook toward marriage and childbirth. The number of newborns in South Korea reached 238,343 in 2024, 3.6 percent higher than the previous year. This is also the first time in nine years that the number has seen a rise. In 2015, it rose by 0.7 percent to 438,420 and has since gradually declined until 2023. You Hye Mi, the senior presidential secretary for population planning, held a press conference on Wednesday and credited this increased birth rate to the Yoon Suk Yeol administration’s speedy implementation of administrative policies to battle demographic challenges. She specifically referred to measures such as...

title: Emma Navarro luce en Mérida y se ilusiona con el título
creator: Daniel Paulino
content: Instantes después de superar a Elina Avanesian en solo dos parciales, la norteamericana Emma Navarro se dijo despreocupada por ser catalogada como favorita o por su posición en el ranking mundial.Segura de su juego como singlista, la norteamericana indicó después de derrotar a la tenista armenia, que mientras ella se sienta cómoda con el juego que le gusta hacer, le da poco espacio a preocuparse por su colocación en la WTA.También te puede interesar: Emma Navarro supera a Avanesian y alcanza la final del Mérida Open“El nivel que hay entre las 100 o 50 mejores del ranking diría que es muy similar, así que no me afecta mucho donde vaya a estar yo clasificada. title: सोनीपत की जनता दे साथ, टूटने नहीं दूंगा विश्वास : कमल दिवान
creator: sanam grng
content: सोनीपत, 1 मार्च (हप्र)कांग्रेस के मेयर प्रत्याशी नेता कमल दिवान ने कहा कि सोनीपत की जनता एक बार उनका साथ दें, वो कभी जनता के विश्वास को टूटने नहीं देंगे। उन्होंने कहा कि हमेशा जनता की सेवा में तत्पर रहेंगे। कमल दिवान ने शहर के विभिन्न क्षेत्रों में डोर-टू-डोर अभियान के दौरान लोगों से वोट की अपील करते हुए कहा कि 2 मार्च का दिन बदलाव का दिन है। जनता की अनदेखी करने वाले लोगों को आइना दिखाने का दिन है। अब तक जो समस्याएं झेलनी पड़ रही है, उन को दूर करने का दिन है। जनता का हाथ के निशान पर डाला एक-एक वोट नगर निगम क्षेत्र की तस्वीर बदलने का काम करेगा।मेयर प्रत्याशी दिवान ने कहा कि उनका पहला लक्ष्य भ्रष्टाचार को समाप्त करना है ताकि सोनीपत की जनता का हर काम बिना पैसे और बिना किसी तकलीफ के हो सके। वक्त आ गया है कि भाजपा के खोखले वादों का हिसाब लिया जाए। जिस तरह से उनके पिता देवराज दिवान ने जनता की सेवा की थी, उसी तरह से वे भी जनता की सेवा करते रहेंगे।इस दौरान पूर्व सांसद धर्मपाल मलिक, पूर्व विधायक सुरेंद्र पंवार, जयभगवान आंतिल, पदम दहिया, सुरेंद्र शर्मा, अशोक छाबड़ा, प्रदीप गौतम, रणजीत कौशिक, राजीव सरोहा, मनजीत गहलावत, मनोज रिढाऊ, प्रेम रेलन, नीलकंठ मुखीजा आदि भी मौजूद रहे।The post सोनीपत की जनता दे साथ, टूटने नहीं दूंगा विश्वास : कमल दिवान appeared first on dainiktribuneonline.com.

title: Maple Leafs checking centre options, Schenn in focus
creator: Sportsnet Staff
content: Since the William Nylander at centre experiment ended in the pre-season, the Toronto Maple Leafs have been searching for depth down the middle. And ahead of Friday's trade deadline, that is indeed the team's main focus, Sportsnet's Elliotte Friedman reported on the Saturday Headlines segment of Hockey Night in Canada. One player the Leafs are considering? St. Louis Blues pivot Brayden Schenn . "He is definitely a guy Toronto is thinking about very hard," Friedman said. Sportsnet's hockey news breakers, analysts and reporters will have coast-to-coast coverage of all the moves made ahead of this season's NHL trade deadline. Full coverage on March 7 begins at 10 a.m. ET/7 a.m. PT on Sportsnet and Sportsnet+. Still, there may be competition for Schenn's services, with Friedman mentioning the Vegas Golden Knights among the teams who could potentially be interested. Schenn, a 16-year veteran, won the Stanley Cup under current Maple Leafs head coach Craig Berube with the Blues in 2019 and recently suited up in his 1,000th career game. “I love that player. I love the guy. He’s a super human being. 1,000 games is a lot of games in the league," Berube said on Friday. "He’s a dedicated player. I always say that guys who play that long are dedicated to the game. They do all the right things throughout the summer, game in, and game out, preparing. He’s a very prepared player. He looks after his body, he looks after himself and loves the game. He’s a hockey nerd. It was great to see him...

title: No. 2 Duke rolls past Florida State 100-65 following Flagg's injury scare
creator: The Canadian Press
content: DURHAM, N.C. (AP) — Isaiah Evans scored 19 points and No. 2 Duke overcame freshman star Cooper Flagg's injury scare to rout Florida State 100-65 on Saturday night. Flagg sat out more than 11 minutes to end the first half, twice leaving the gym to be evaluated after he was struck in the face on a hard foul. Flagg was on the court for the first 12 minutes of the second half, when he racked up 12 of his 16 points. Kon Knueppel and Khaman Maluach both had 14 points to help Duke (26-3, 17-1 Atlantic Coast Conference) maintain a one-game lead over Clemson in the league standings. Jamir Watkins had 21 points and Jerry Deng added 12 points for Florida State (16-13, 7-11). The Seminoles have lost three straight and four of five. Duke led 14-11 when Flagg departed. The Blue Devils built a 47-30 halftime lead. Takeaways Florida State: The Seminoles have given up more than 90 points twice this season, with both coming in a six-day span after they were drilled by North Carolina on Monday. Duke: The Blue Devils were without starting guard Tyrese Proctor, who sustained a knee injury Tuesday night at Miami. With Flagg out, they still had enough firepower to extend their lead and remain unbeaten at home this season, aided by a season-high 21 offensive rebounds. Key moment Nearly four minutes into the second half, Flagg blocked a shot, resulting in a fast break and Knueppel’s three-point play for a 62-35 lead. Key stat Duke had 12 assists on 16 first-half baskets without committing a turnover...

title: 【RQ決定情報2025】2カテゴリーに登場の『エヴァンゲリオンレーシング サーキットメイト』の新体制が発表
content: 2月28日、ラナエンタテインメントは、スーパー耐久シリーズとFDJフォーミュラドリフトジャパン2025に参戦するエヴァンゲリオンレーシングの2025年参戦体制を発表。チームをサポートする『エヴァンゲリオンレーシング サーキットメイト』の2025年メンバーも公開された。 『ヱヴァンゲリヲン新劇場版』とのプロモーションタイアップにより誕生したエヴァンゲリオンレーシングは、2月28日に2025年の参戦体制を発表。今シーズンは、スーパー耐久とFDJフォーミュラドリフトジャパン2025の2カテゴリーにエントリーする。 スーパー耐久では、継続起用の西村元希、田ヶ原章蔵、加賀美綾佑、霜野誠友、木村貴洋に小西隆詔を加えた6名がエヴァRT初号機Audi RS3 LMSのシェアし、ST-TCRクラスへ参戦する。 FDJフォーミュラドリフトジャパン2025へは、エヴァンゲリオン初号機と2号機、8号機をイメージしたカラーリングの3台のマシンで参戦。それぞれ村上佳、益山航、エコー・ガオがステアリングを握る。 そして、エヴァンゲリオンに登場するキャラクターに扮し、チームをサポートする『エヴァンゲリオンレーシング サーキットメイト』の2025年メンバーも同日に発表された。昨年から継続の赤城ありささん、松田彩花さんに加えて新たに雪野るなさんが起用され、今シーズンも3名体制となった。 今年もスーパーGTに加え、スーパー耐久とFDJでもサーキットに登場する赤城さんが綾波レイ役、2024年に松田さんが式波・アスカ・ラングレー役を引き続き務める。そして、レースアンバサダー初挑戦となる雪野さんが真希波・マリ・イラストリアス役としてサーキットデビューを果たす。 チーム結成15周年の節目の年であり、『新世紀エヴァンゲリオン』のテレビ放送開始30周年でもある2025年。プラグスーツモチーフのコスチュームでチームを盛り上げる3人の活躍に注目だ。 投稿 【RQ決定情報2025】2カテゴリーに登場の『エヴァンゲリオンレーシング サーキットメイト』の新体制が発表 は autosport web に最初に表示されました。

title: Newcastle United fan who was left in a 'state of terror' after being banned from matches over her 'gender critical' tweets receives apology from police
content: Newcastle United fan who was left in a 'state of terror' after being banned from matches over her 'gender critical' tweets receives apology from police By RYAN PROSSER Published: 02:39, 2 March 2025 | Updated: 02:39, 2 March 2025 e-mail View comments Police have apologised for their treatment of a gender-critical football fan accused of committing a hate crime for sharing ' gender critical' posts. Linzi Smith was shocked to be informed that police had launched a hate crime investigation into her, after a fellow fan complained to Newcastle United that trans people would feel unsafe if sat next to her. Officers probed Ms Smith, 34, after she suggested that some transgender people suffered from mental illness. The football fan, who is gay, also wrote online that pro-trans activists wanted to 'trans the gay away'. Ms Smith was interviewed under caution by officers after being threatened with arrest if she walked out. The campaigner said she was left in a 'state of terror' as well as 'embarrassed and humiliated' by officers investigating her case. She said that while she felt 'truly vindicated' by some parts of the report, she felt 'let down and frightened' by officers' actions. Northumbria Police has now admitted failings in the way Ms Smith's case was handled, the Telegraph reported. Linzi Smith (pictured) was investigated by police after making allegedly transphobic comments online, including suggesting that transgender people suffer from mental illness While insisting there...

title: أموريم يعترف: التحديات جعلتني مدربًا أفضل
content: هاي كورة – أكد روبن أموريم، مدرب مانشستر يونايتد، أن النادي يسير على الطريق الصحيح نحو مستقبل أفضل، رغم التحديات الكبيرة التي يواجهها داخل الملعب وخارجه. جاءت تصريحات أموريم بعد أسبوع صعب شهد تعادل الفريق مع إيفرتون، وإعلان النادي عن خطط لتسريح ما يصل إلى 200 موظف. كما واجه الفريق صعوبات في مباراة الدوري ضد إيبسويتش، حيث احتاج إلى أداء دفاعي قوي في الشوط الثاني لتجنب الهزيمة السادسة على أرضه هذا الموسم. ومع ذلك، يبدو أموريم متفائلًا، مؤكدًا أن النادي لديه رؤية واضحة وخطة لتحقيق النجاح في المستقبل. وأضاف أموريم أن التغييرات التي يجريها النادي، رغم صعوبتها، ضرورية لتحقيق الأهداف الطموحة. وأشار إلى أن الفريق بحاجة إلى تحقيق نتائج ملموسة لتعزيز ثقة الجماهير، خاصة مع التركيز المتزايد على بطولتي كأس الاتحاد الإنجليزي والدوري الأوروبي كفرص أخيرة للتأهل للمنافسات الأوروبية الموسم المقبل. كما اعترف أموريم بأن التعامل مع التحديات جعله مدربًا أكثر اكتمالاً، قائلًا: “لن أموت إذا خسرت ثلاث مباريات متتالية، لقد تعلمت ذلك هنا”.

title: ఏపీలో రేషన్ లబ్దిదారులకు షాక్.. ఇది అస్సలు ఊహించలేదుగా!

title: Wrong way, go back: Government urged to change course on road upgrade
creator: Adam Carey
content: There are few places in Melbourne where the divide between city and country looks so stark as while driving along Yan Yean Road. To the west there are new estates filled with freestanding houses, squeezed together on modest blocks with tiny yards. This is the growth suburb of Doreen, population 27,000 and rising. To the east, there are rolling paddocks dotted with grand river red gums. This is the other Doreen, a place of country homesteads, egg farms and pony clubs. Yan Yean Road also exemplifies Doreen’s city-country divide. It’s a critical and congested arterial road for Melbourne’s outer , carrying 24,000 vehicles a day. But for half of its length it still resembles the country road it once was: narrow and undivided, with no footpaths or space for cyclists. Plans to fix the road date back to 2015. The southern half has already been widened and made safer. A decade on, the northern section awaits its turn. “We need this , no one’s questioning that,” says Tony Casey, a veteran real estate agent who has worked in Melbourne’s outer north for more than 40 years. But the Allan government faces a growing revolt over its long-planned road upgrade, both from Doreen business owners whose stores will be bypassed once the upgrade is built and from residents of , who fear the widened road will direct more commuter traffic into their quiet suburb. The upgraded road will change access to the Doreen business precinct, a cluster of about 30 mostly small businesses and a handful of...

creator: Adam Carey
content: There are few places in Melbourne where the divide between city and country looks so stark as while driving along Yan Yean Road. To the west there are new estates filled with freestanding houses, squeezed together on modest blocks with tiny yards. This is the growth suburb of Doreen, population 27,000 and rising. To the east, there are rolling paddocks dotted with grand river red gums. This is the other Doreen, a place of country homesteads, egg farms and pony clubs. Hurstbridge resident Mel Ellis (left) is leading the campaign against the intersection design of Yan Yean Road, with Belinda Thomas and Sue Green. Credit: Simon Schluter Yan Yean Road also exemplifies Doreen’s city-country divide. It’s a critical and congested arterial road for Melbourne’s outer north-east , carrying 24,000 vehicles a day. But for half of its length it still resembles the country road it once was: narrow and undivided, with no footpaths or space for cyclists. Plans to fix the road date back to 2015. The southern half has already been widened and made safer. A decade on, the northern section awaits its turn. “We need this road upgrade , no one’s questioning that,” says Tony Casey, a veteran real estate agent who has worked in Melbourne’s outer north for more than 40 years. But the Allan government faces a growing revolt over its long-planned road upgrade, both from Doreen business owners whose stores will be bypassed once the upgrade is built and from residents of semi-rural Hurstbridge , who...

title: Union’s Tai Baribo’s hat trick earns second win out of the gate
creator: Matthew Degeorge
content: CHESTER —The Bradley Carnell era in Chester began Saturday against the team that ended the Jim Curtin era.The difference was significant.A Tai Baribo hat trick gave the Union a second win under Carnell, avenging the Decision Day loss to FC Cincinnati last year that ended their playoff hopes with a 4-1 win in the home opener at Subaru Park.Bruno Damiani, on his debut, added a fourth in stoppage time to make it six points for the Union to start the season. The Union were the last unbeaten club in MLS to start last season.Baribo’s hat trick is the 14th in Union history, 12 in MLS play, and his second for the Union. He joins Daniel Gazdag and Julian Carranza as the only players with multiple hat tricks in club history. His seventh multi-goal game moves him ahead of Sebastien Le Toux for third in club history, behind only that same pair.The Union were aided by having a stiff wind at their back in the first half, and the mentality was right to make the most of it. Like in the season-opening win over Orlando City, the club has shown its embrace of Carnell’s counter-attacking principles, retaining the ball in key moments to prevent Cincinnati from getting forward and counterpressing in selected areas.And they’ve put the ball in the back of the net in the way they did last year, with each of their first six shots on target becoming goals. That included the first two from Baribo, who is up to five goals on the season and 21 in 23 starts in all competitions since his first start on...

title: No. 2 Duke rolls past Florida State 100-65 following Flagg's injury scare
creator: BOB SUTTON, Associated Press
content: DURHAM, N.C. (AP) — Isaiah Evans scored 19 points and No. 2 Duke overcame freshman star Cooper Flagg's injury scare to rout Florida State 100-65 on Saturday night.Flagg sat out more than 11 minutes to end the first half, twice leaving the gym to be evaluated after he was struck in the face on a hard foul. Flagg was on the court for the first 12 minutes of the second half, when he racked up 12 of his 16 points.Kon Knueppel and Khaman Maluach both had 14 points to help Duke (26-3, 17-1 Atlantic Coast Conference) maintain a one-game lead over Clemson in the league standings.Jamir Watkins had 21 points and Jerry Deng added 12 points for Florida State (16-13, 7-11). The Seminoles have lost three straight and four of five.Duke led 14-11 when Flagg departed. The Blue Devils built a 47-30 halftime lead.TakeawaysFlorida State: The Seminoles have given up more than 90 points twice this season, with both coming in a six-day span after they were drilled by North Carolina on Monday.Duke: The Blue Devils were without starting guard Tyrese Proctor, who sustained a knee injury Tuesday night at Miami. With Flagg out, they still had enough firepower to extend their lead and remain unbeaten at home this season, aided by a season-high 21 offensive rebounds.Key momentNearly four minutes into the second half, Flagg blocked a shot, resulting in a fast break and Knueppel’s three-point play for a 62-35 lead.Key statDuke had 12 assists on 16 first-half baskets without committing a turnover despite...

title: ट्रिपल इंजन सरकार बनते ही विकास की रफ्तार होगी तेज : राजीव जैन
creator: sanam grng
content: सोनीपत, 1 मार्च (हप्र)भाजपा के मेयर प्रत्याशी राजीव जैन ने शनिवार को डोर-टू -डोर मतदाताओं से संपर्क साधकर वोट की अपील की। उन्होंने घर-घर जाकर लोगों से मेयर उप चुनाव में भारी मतों से जीत दिलाने के लिए आशीर्वाद लिया। उन्होंने मतदाताओं का आह्वान किया कि वे 2 मार्च को मेयर उपचुनाव में बढ़चढ़ कर और पूरे जोश के साथ मतदान करें। ट्रिपल इंजन की सरकार बनने पर तेजी से विकास कराया जाएगा। राजीव जैन ने जैन बाग कॉलोनी, आदर्श नगर नगर, जीवन नगर, सेक्टर-14 मेन मार्केट, पटेल नगर, चौहान जोशी, लक्ष्मण कॉलोनी, गोहाना रोड बाईपास, कुम्हार गेट, वाल्मीकि बस्ती, सुजान सिंह पार्क, शास्त्री कॉलोनी, मलिक कॉलोनी, प्रगति नगर, पंचायत भवन, अशोक विहार, विशाल नगर, आर्य नगर, गुगा मंदिर, शीशराम बाग कॉलोनी आदि जगहों पर मतदाताओं से डोर-टू -डोर संपर्क साधा और भाजपा के पक्ष में मतदान करने की अपील की। उन्होंने लोगों को आश्वस्त किया कि उनके मेयर बनते ही जहां सोनीपत के शहरी क्षेत्र का विकास तीव्र गति से होगा, वहीं नगर निगम में शामिल गांवों का शहरी तर्ज पर विकास होगा।The post ट्रिपल इंजन सरकार बनते ही विकास की रफ्तार होगी तेज : राजीव जैन appeared first on dainiktribuneonline.com.

title: GKの時間稼ぎはCKに IFABがルール変更
Lãnh đạo bệnh viện lên tiếng vụ "cò cơm" lôi kéo khách, gây mất trật tự
content: Ngày 2-3, một lãnh đạo Bệnh viện Đa khoa vùng Tây Nguyên (tỉnh Đắk Lắk) cho biết đơn vị đang tiếp tục phối hợp cùng cơ quan chức năng xử lý tình trạng "cò cơm" lôi kéo người nhà bệnh nhân trước cổng bệnh viện, gây mất an ninh trật tự. "Cò cơm" lôi kéo khách vào quán ăn Theo vị này, nguyên nhân sâu xa của tình trạng trên một phần do căn-tin của bệnh viện không hoạt động trong khi nhu cầu của bệnh nhân, người nhà và cả lực lượng y tế rất lớn. Trước đó, năm 2023 một công ty có trụ sở tỉnh Vĩnh Phúc đã trúng đấu giá thuê mặt bằng kinh doanh tại căn-tin Bệnh viện Đa khoa vùng Tây Nguyên. Tuy nhiên, quá trình hoạt động kinh doanh không hiệu quả, trong đó lại đổ lỗi do hoạt động từ thiện của bệnh viện. "Gần 1 năm qua, công ty này không hoạt động căn-tin nữa. Do vi phạm hợp đồng, bệnh viện buộc khởi kiện ra tòa để xem xét xử lý theo quy định để sớm được tổ chức đấu thầu, hoạt động lại căn-tin" - lãnh đạo Bệnh viện Đa khoa vùng Tây Nguyên thông tin. Được biết, tòa án đã mời Bệnh viện Đa khoa vùng Tây Nguyên và công ty trên giải quyết, thương lượng. Nhằm phục vụ nhu cầu rất lớn từ nhân dân và lực lượng y tế của bệnh viện, công ty này đã đồng ý di dời các tài sản để giao lại...

title: 10 carreras universitarias que la IA recomienda no estudiar en México porque serán mal pagadas
creator: Ale Huitron
content: La elección de carrera universitaria es una de las decisiones más importantes para el futuro profesional, ya que el campo laboral es un factor capaz de determinar el área a la que sería mejor perfilarse.Debido a que se trata de una decisión importante para el futuro, también se debe tomar en cuenta la vocación y las demandas del mercado. Para facilitar la elección de carrera universitaria, se le preguntó a la Inteligencia Artificial (IA) las 10 licenciaturas que no se recomienda estudiar debido a que el campo laboral es bajo y podría llevar a malos salarios. En su respuesta, la IA tomó en consideración los siguientes puntos por lo que no se recomienda estudiar estas 10 carreras: Saturación del mercado laboral: algunas carreras universitarias cuentan con un alto número de egresados cada año que generan una sobreoferta de profesionales que provocan la reducción de salarios. Baja demanda laboral: diversas licenciaturas tienen pocas aplicaciones prácticas en sectores que generen ingresos significativos, ya que se pueden limitar a la docencia o investigación. Precariedad en los sectores económicos asociados: algunas áreas suelen estar ligadas a trabajos temporales o informales con largas jornadas laborales y remuneraciones bajas. Falta de oportunidades en sectores especializados: algunas licenciaturas dependen de un mercado reducido, en los puestos son limitados y competitivos. Desvalorización sociocultural y económica: profesiones relacionadas con el arte o...

Khu trọ nhỏ, tình người lớn: Nhiều quy tắc nhưng có người gắn bó gần 10 năm
content: Khu trọ an cư cho những công nhân khó khăn Khu nhà trọ ở 164/8 Tập Đoàn 6B, P.Tân Tạo A, Q. Bình Tân (TP.HCM). Trong không gian trọ đầy kỷ cương ấy, không ít người đã gắn bó suốt nhiều năm, coi đây là ngôi nhà thứ hai, chốn an cư, nơi những tình người ấm áp được vun đắp từng ngày. Bà Đào Thị Hóa (60 tuổi), chủ trọ không chỉ nổi tiếng với lòng nhân ái mà còn với sự kỹ tính, cẩn trọng trong việc quản lý. Được xây dựng từ những đồng tiền vất vả của hai vợ chồng bà từ thuở còn làm công nhân, dãy trọ này được bà Hóa giữ gìn với những quy định nghiêm ngặt: không ăn nhậu gây ồn ào, không dắt người lạ vào phòng... Nghe có vẻ nghiêm khắc, nhưng chính những điều này đã tạo nên một không gian yên bình, an toàn cho những công nhân, sinh viên. Bà Hóa thân thiết với vợ chồng Nhơn và những người thuê trọ khác ẢNH: KIM NGỌC NGHIÊN Chia sẻ về quãng thời gian hơn 8 năm gắn bó với khu trọ của bà Hóa, Trần Thị Như Ý (26 tuổi), quê tỉnh Cà Mau không khỏi xúc động. Cô nhớ về những ngày khó khăn khi gia đình từ quê lên, công việc không ổn định, nhưng bà Hóa vẫn luôn tạo điều kiện, giúp đỡ hết lòng. Ý gọi bà Hóa là "cô Năm", vì bà không chỉ là chủ trọ mà còn là người bà hiền hậu trong...

title: Regreso a clases: 5 recomendaciones para elegir una movilidad escolar segura para tus hijos
creator: Sandra Campó
content: La elección del transporte escolar es una preocupación importante para los padres, especialmente aquellos que tienen hijos que inician la etapa escolar. Esta decisión no debe tomarse a la ligera porque no siempre es la más segura.“El año pasado se registraron más de 64 mil accidentes en las calles, muchos de ellos involucrando movilidades escolares”, advirtió Eduardo Chávez de Piérola, gerente legal de la Asociación Peruana de Empresas de Seguros (Apeseg).Según datos de Equifax, Lima Metropolitana alberga más de 7 mil instituciones educativas y casi 2 millones de estudiantes, lo que genera una alta demanda de servicios de transporte escolar.5 recomendaciones para elegir una movilidad escolar seguraPara elegir una movilidad escolar segura, se deben considerar los siguientes aspectos:Seguridad: verificar que el vehículo cuente con los implementos de seguridad necesarios, como cinturones de seguridad, piso antideslizante, extintor, botiquín de primeros auxilios y señalización adecuada (cono o triángulo de seguridad).Respaldo: asegurarse de que la movilidad esté autorizada por la institución educativa y que el servicio cuente con buenas referencias de otros padres.Documentación: la movilidad debe tener el Seguro Obligatorio de Accidentes de Tránsito (SOAT) vigente, el Certificado contra Accidentes de Tránsito (CAT) y el Certificado de Inspección Técnica Vehicular Complementaria (CITV).Experiencia: el conductor debe contar con la licencia de conducir A2B o...

content: 中新网 3月2日电 据“国家版权”微信公众号消息,为严厉打击影院偷拍盗录、非法传播行为,维护良好院线电影版权保护秩序,提升公众电影版权保护意识,今年1月以来,国家版权局、国家电影局、公安部、文化和旅游部相关部门联合部署开展第7次院线电影版权保护专项行动。 截至2月20日,专项行动查办涉春节档电影侵权盗版案件22起,抓获偷拍盗录、违法传播人员40余人,推动相关网络平台删除涉春节档电影侵权链接229.57万条、封禁限播反复侵权账户4116个,严厉打击院线电影盗录传播行为,为正版院线电影保驾护航。专项行动期间,各地版权执法部门查办了一批院线电影盗录传播典型案件。 1.北京顺义某外籍人员盗录传播院线电影案。根据国家版权局移转线索,北京市版权执法部门查办该案。经查,2024年12月以来,某外籍人员受境外盗版团伙指使,在北京某影院盗录《毒液:最后一舞》《焚城》并通过网盘传播。目前,北京市文化市场综合执法总队已对该外籍人员立案查处。 2.天津滨海赵某某盗录传播春节档院线电影案。根据国家版权局移转线索,天津市滨海新区版权执法部门查办该案。经查,2025年1月30日,赵某某为提高社交平台个人账号关注度,在天津某影院盗录《哪吒之魔童闹海》并通过网络社交平台个人账号传播,导致盗版影片通过网络迅速扩散。目前,天津市滨海新区文化和旅游局已对赵某某立案查处。 3.山西吕梁张某某盗录传播春节档院线电影案。根据国家版权局移转线索,山西省吕梁市版权执法部门查办该案。经查,2025年1月29日,张某某为让他人观看,在吕梁某影院盗录《熊出没·重启未来》并通过网络社交平台个人账号传播,导致盗版影片通过网络迅速扩散。目前,山西省吕梁市文化市场执法支队已对张某某立案查处。 4.吉林永吉林某某盗录传播春节档院线电影案。根据国家版权局移转线索,吉林省吉林市版权执法部门查办该案。经查,2025年1月29日,林某某在永吉县某影院观看《哪吒之魔童闹海》并通过网络社交平台个人账号进行直播,导致盗版影片通过网络迅速扩散。目前,吉林省吉林市永吉县文化市场综合行政执法大队已对林某某立案查处。 5.江苏宿迁王某某盗录传播春节档院线电影案。根据国家版权局移转线索,江苏省宿迁市版权执法部门查办该案。经查,2025年1月29日,为通过网络销售盗版影片牟利,王某某在沭阳县某影院盗录《熊出没·重启未来》并通过网络进行传播。目前,江苏省宿迁市沭阳县文化市场综合执法大队已对王某某立案查处。 6.江西萍乡王某某等盗录传播春节档院线电影案。根据国家版权局移转线索,江西省萍乡市版权执法部门查办该案。经查,2025年1月29日、30日,为通过网络销售盗版影片牟利,王某某等3人在萍乡多家影院先后盗录《封神第二部:战火西岐》《蛟龙行动》《射雕英雄传:侠之大者》《熊出没·重启未来》并通过网络进行传播。目前,江西省萍乡市文化市场综合执法支队已对王某某等3人立案查处。 7.广东湛江李某某等盗录传播春节档院线电影案。根据国家版权局移转线索,广东省湛江市版权执法部门查办该案。经查,2025年1月30日,为通过网络销售盗版影片牟利,李某某等5人先后在廉江某影院盗录《唐探1900》《哪吒之魔童闹海》并通过网盘传播。目前,广东省湛江市廉江市文化市场综合执法支队已对李某某等5人立案查处。...

title: Detiene Operativo Conjunto a pareja en la vía corta a Chihuahua por posesión de troca robada
creator: Editor
content: Derivado de las acciones para la disuasión de los delitos, el Operativo Conjunto integrado por la Agencia Estatal de Investigación y Ejército Mexicano, recuperó una pick up de la marca GMC, línea Sierra, modelo 2021, que contaba con reporte de robo interpuesto el 14 de febrero de 2025, en Denver, Colorado.La acción tuvo lugar este sábado 01 de marzo, a la altura del kilómetro 120 +500 de la carretera vía corta Parral – Chihuahua, en donde los cuerpos de seguridad instalaron un punto de control y realizaron una revisión a dicho automotor.Tras verificar el número de serie en el Sistema Batic, el cual arrojó que era robado, por lo que se informó a los tripulantes de nombres Jesús Laureano O. P. y Laura Lizbeth S. D., que quedaban detenidos por el probable delito de posesión de vehículo con reporte de robo.Fueron puestos a disposición del Ministerio Público de la Fiscalía de Distrito Zona Sur para definir su situación legal.**De acuerdo con las leyes y normas vigentes, los detenidos se presumen inocentes mientras no se declare su responsabilidad mediante sentencia emitida por la autoridad judicial (artículo 13 del Código Nacional de Procedimientos Penales).

title: Las 30 frases más destacadas del discurso de Javier Milei en la Asamblea Legislativa 2025
content: Eran las 21:06 cuando el presidente Javier Milei subió las escalinatas del Congreso de la Nación y fue recibido por la vicepresidenta Victoria Villarruel y por el titular de Diputados, Martín Menem . Cinco minutos después ingresó al recinto y a las 21:14 inició su discurso. A lo largo de 71 minutos, el jefe de Estado defendió su gestión, a los integrantes de su gabinete , propuso objetivos ambiciosos -un nuevo acuerdo con el FMI, reformas penales y migratorias-, arremetió contra Axel Kicillof y le dio al Congreso gran parte de la responsabilidad, al reclamarle que apoye sus reformas para que el país logre un cambio positivo y sostenible. Incluso hubo un durísimo cruce dialéctico con Facundo Manes que terminó con un confuso episodio con Santiago Caputo . Antes de comenzar a desarrollar su discurso, Milei pronunció de modo informal una frase de introducción simbólica: “ Que no crezca la cantidad de dinero ”. Y luego comenzó a desarrollar lo que había preparado para exponer ante la Asamblea Legislativa. ACUERDO CON EL FONDO MONETARIO -"Estamos avanzando en un acuerdo con el FMI para poder terminar de sanear el balance del BCRA y salir definitivamente del cepo cambiario durante este año". -“El presente acuerdo con el FMI buscar restaurar el BCRA para que la inflacion sea un mal recuerdo del pasado. El dinero que ingrese, el Tesoro lo utilizará para cancelar parte de su deuda con el BCRA ” -“En los próximos días le pediré al Congreso que apoye al gobierno...

title: रोहतक में महिला कांग्रेस नेता हिमानी नरवाल की हत्या, सूटकेस में मिला शव
creator: sanam grng
content: रोहतक, 1 मार्च (निस)कांग्रेस की एक महिला नेता हिमानी नरवाल की बेरहमी से हत्या कर दी गयी। बदमाश शव को सूटकेस में डालकर उसे सांपला स्थित बस स्टैंड के समीप सड़क के किनारे फेंक कर फरार हो गए। नरवाल राहुल गांधी की भारत जोड़ो यात्रा में शामिल रही है। वह लोकसभा चुनाव व विधानसभा चुनाव में सक्रिय रही हैं। पुलिस ने शव को पोस्टमार्टम के लिए पीजीआई भेज दिया और घटना की जानकारी मृतका के परिजनों को दे दी है। पुलिस मामले की गहनता से छानबीन कर रही है।शनिवार दोपहर को राहगीरों ने सांपला बाईपास पर सड़क के किनारे संदिग्ध परिस्थितियों में एक सूटकेट पड़ा देखा। राहगीरों द्वारा सूचना पाकर सांपला पुलिस मौके पर पहुंची और सूटकेस को खोलकर देखा तो पुलिसकर्मी दंग रह गए। सूटकेस में एक युवती का शव था, जिसके मुंह से खून निकल रहा था। जांच पड़ताल के दौरान यह बात सामने आई कि युवती एनएसयूआई की नेता रही है और जोकि राहुल गांधी की भारत जोड़ो यात्रा में विशेष रूप से शामिल रही थी। कांग्रेस विधायक बीबी बत्रा का कहना है युवती कांग्रेस कार्यकर्ता रही है और लोकसभा और विधानसभा में सक्रिय रही थी। उन्होंने मांग की कि हत्या की जांच के लिए एसआईटी गठित की जाए। पुलिस मामले की गंभीरता से जांच कर रही है। सांपला थाना प्रभारी का कहना है कि पोस्टमार्टम रिपोर्ट आने के बाद ही हत्या का पता चल पाएगा। जांच के लिए तीन टीमें गठित की गयी हैं।कांग्रेस नेता हिमानी नरवाल हत्याकांड की हो उच्च स्तरीय निष्पक्ष जांच : हुड्डापूर्व मुख्यमंत्री भूपेंद्र सिंह हुड्डा ने कहा कि रोहतक के हिमानी नरवाल हत्याकांड की खबर सुनकर वे स्तब्ध हैं। एक लड़की की इस तरह हत्या होना और उसका सूटकेस में शव मिलना, बेहद दुखदाई और आघात पहुंचाने वाला है। यह अपने आप में प्रदेश...

title: Смоленские студенты медики отметили Масленицу
content: В актовом зале Смоленского государственного медицинского университета состоялось яркое мероприятие, посвященное празднованию Масленицы. Более 300 студентов собрались, чтобы окунуться в атмосферу народных гуляний и насладиться традициями одного из самых любимых праздников в России. Вечер был насыщен смехом и радостью благодаря усилиям членов Клуба "Эскулап". Они подготовили веселые конкурсы и увлекательную викторину, посвященную истории и обычаям Масленицы. Студенты активно участвовали в играх, демонстрируя смекалку и изобретательность, а также узнали много нового о празднике. Особое внимание было уделено гастрономической части мероприятия. Профком студентов СГМУ организовал угощение блинами с чаем, что стало приятным дополнением к праздничной атмосфере. Блины — символ солнца и благополучия — украсили вечер и порадовали участников своим вкусом. Мероприятие прошло в теплой и дружеской обстановке, оставив яркие впечатления у всех присутствующих. Праздник Масленицы в СГМУ стал еще одним подтверждением того, что студенческая жизнь полна ярких событий и радостных моментов.

title: Kingda Ka fue demolida: así cayó la montaña rusa más alta y rápida del mundo en Nueva Jersey
content: Dina Boluarte Papa Francisco Dólar en Perú Alianza Lima vs Sporting Cristal Niño rescatado Loreto San Marcos Senamhi Aeropuerto Jorge Chávez Sunat Donald Trump César Acuña Horóscopo Fonavi Roger Amuruz ÚLTIMAS NOTICIAS POLÍTICA ECONOMÍA SOCIEDAD MUNDO PERÚ DEPORTES ESPECTÁCULOS DATEC DÓLAR ESTADOS UNIDOS CULTURAL Últimas Noticias La montaña rusa Kingda Ka, ubicada en Nueva Jersey, ha sido demolida como parte de la renovación de Six Flags Great Adventure, tras casi dos décadas de emociones en 139 metros de altura. La famosa montaña rusa Kingda Ka , ubicada en Nueva Jersey , ha sido demolida como parte de un plan de renovación del parque Six Flags Great Adventure . Este icónico atractivo, que alcanzaba los 139 metros de altura y los 206 kilómetros por hora, fue testigo de la adrenalina de más de 12 millones de visitantes en sus casi dos décadas de funcionamiento. La implosión de Kingda Ka, anunciada previamente, se llevó a cabo el 28 de febrero y fue parte de una inversión de más de 1.000 millones de dólares por parte de la corporación Six Flags. Las autoridades locales habían advertido a la comunidad sobre las explosiones rápidas que se producirían, instando a los vecinos a tomar precauciones, especialmente aquellos con mascotas. Un video aéreo capturado por Fox29 Filadelfia muestra el impresionante colapso de la estructura, que se derrumbó en cuestión de segundos, dejando una nube de humo tras de sí. Este evento marca el fin de una era...

title: Sabah floods subside, all PPS closed
content: KOTA KINABALU : All Temporary Relief Centres (PPS) in flood-affected districts across the state have been closed as the floods have completely subsided. Only Telupid continues to shelter 350 evacuees from 102 families as of 8 am today, housed in five PPS. Telupid district officer Celestine Jetony, who also chairs the District Disaster Management Committee, officially declared the end of the flood disaster. “Based on field reports and information from our agencies, I hereby declare that all PPS have been closed as of 8 am, following inspections confirming that the affected residents’ homes are safe for occupancy,“ she said. Heavy rainfall on the evening of Feb 26 caused flooding in several villages in the Paitan and Telupid districts. As a result, several PPS were opened in Telupid that night, followed by additional centres in Paitan the next day. However, as floodwaters receded and homes were deemed safe for occupancy, all PPS in Paitan were closed yesterday evening. Meanwhile, 350 evacuees from 102 families housed in five PPS in Telupid were allowed to return home starting at 8 am today. Telupid and Paitan are located in Sabah’s interior, approximately 200 km and 230 km east of Kota Kinabalu, respectively.

Cuenta Coahuila con esquema básico de vacunación disponible
creator: NOTICIAS DE HOY
content: Coahuila mantiene de manera permanente su campaña de vacunación del esquema básico, con dosis disponibles en los 133 Centros de Salud Urbanos y Rurales, así como en Hospitales Generales e Integrales de la entidad , gracias al esfuerzo coordinado entre el estado y la federación, destacó el Gobernador Manolo Jiménez Salinas. “Coahuila es uno de los estados con mayor calidad de vida, y parte de esa calidad implica que nuestra gente tenga acceso a servicios de atención médica especializada y de primer nivel, como la vacunación, un derecho libre y gratuito que significa el primer paso hacia la protección de enfermedades prevenibles ”, puntualizó el Mandatario. TE PUEDE INTERESAR: Alerta en Coahuila: refuerzan vacunación ante brote de sarampión en Texas En coordinación con Mejora Coahuila, s e realizan brigadas de vacunación gratuita en escuelas, barrios y colonias del estado, con el objetivo de ampliar la cobertura a poblaciones vulnerables, incluyendo personas sin derechohabiencia, habitantes de zonas de difícil acceso y grupos de riesgo como menores de edad, adultos mayores, mujeres embarazadas y personas con enfermedades crónicas o alguna discapacidad. El secretario de Salud, Eliud Aguirre Vázquez, informó que todas las vacunas del esquema básico para prevenir enfermedades como sarampión, tos ferina, neumococo, tétanos, rotavirus, COVID-19 e influenza, están disponibles de manera gratuita en las 8 Jurisdicciones Sanitarias, en un horario de 9:00 a 14:30...

title: 1A boys basketball: Seton Catholic turns sights to Yakima after loss to Lynden Christian in state opener
creator: Micah Rice
content: MOUNT VERNON — The Seton Catholic boys basketball team has been down this road before. For the second year in a row, the Cougars opened the Class 1A state tournament against perennial power Lynden Christian. Like last year, Seton Catholic will face a loser-out game in the Round of 12 after falling 74-57 on Saturday at Mount Vernon High School. But unlike last year, the Cougars know what to expect next week in Yakima. Unlike last year, when Lynden Christian won 71-39, Seton Catholic gave the No. 3 seed Lyncs a tough test. The No. 6 Cougars kept pace through three quarters before being outscored 24-13 in the fourth. After winning the program’s first state trophy by placing sixth, Seton Catholic is confident they can go farther. That quest begins in the Yakima Valley SunDome on Wednesday against No. 11 Cashmere. With nearly all of last year’s team back, the Cougars have been waiting to return to Yakima. Seton nearly pulled the upset of last year’s tournament in the quarterfinals, losing to eventual champion Zillah 56-54. “Ever since we lost last year to Zillah, we’ve been craving getting back to the dome,” senior Rico George said. “All offseason we were super motivated. This is exactly where we want to be.” Saturday, Seton Catholic showed its maturity against a Lynden Christian team that has finished no worse that third in the last four state tournaments, winning titles in 2022 and 2023. The Cougars weathered foul trouble. Trico League MVP Kaiden Wilson stayed on the floor for...

title: US national anthem booed at WWE elimination chamber in Toronto
content: During the World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) elimination chamber in Toronto, Canada, audience members booed when the national anthem for the US was played. The crowd at the wrestling competition were booing as American singer Elizabeth Irving performed a rendition of the US national anthem “Star Spangled Banner”, after America announced high tariffs of 25 per cent on the imports of several Canadian goods. Also Read: Donald Trump says tariff plans for Canada, Mexico, China to kick in on March 4 The elimination chamber takes place right before the beginning of the world's biggest wrestling spectacle, WWE Wrestlemania. During the event, Star Sports commentator Pat McAfee criticised the display of anti-US sentiment, saying, “It kind of sucks that it's in the terrible country of Canada that booed our national anthem to start this entire thing,” as quoted by Fox News. Also Read: Indo-Canadian minister Anita Anand now says she will contest the next Federal election A similar incident took place last month during a NHL hockey match between the two countries in Montreal, where fans of both teams booed each other's national anthems. There were three fights in the first nine seconds of a Canada-US opening matchup at the recent 4 Nations Face-Off tournament as well. Ludhiana: Agri varsity secures patent for portable maize dryer for safe storage
content: On Saturday, the Punjab Agricultural University (PAU) secured a patent for its portable maize dryer which can help reduce moisture in freshly harvested crops for safe storage. The dryer, designed by the department of Processing and Food Engineering was developed in response to a 2016 request from the secretary of agriculture, Punjab. The dryer was conceptualised and designed by Dr Mahesh Kumar and Dr Satish Kumar as per international standards and fabricated by NU Tech Dairy Engineers, Ambala under a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with PAU. Giving details, Dr Mahesh informed that the dryer is mounted on a trolley platform, is portable and highly efficient, making it ideal for rural areas where grain drying is a challenge. “With a capacity of 3 tons per batch, it effectively reduces the moisture content of freshly harvested maize from 25% to 14%, ensuring safe storage. It can be operated using a 35 HP tractor PTO or a 15-kW electric power source,” he said. The drying unit features a three-pass indirect heating diesel-fired furnace, consuming 3-4 liters of diesel per hour. “Designed with modern controllers, including a VFD system, waste heat recovery unit, automated temperature control (50°C-90°C), and a flame-based optical sensor, the dryer ensures precision heating and energy efficiency,” he informed. Dr Satish Kumar further elaborated that the PAU Portable Maize Dryer has undergone successful field testing since December 2016. It was demonstrated at Rajpura New Grain...
