"We Can Get Back At Elon": Anti-DOGE Protests Hit Tesla Stores In US
content: Demonstrators gathered outside Tesla stores across the US Saturday to protest the automaker's billionaire CEO, Elon Musk, and his push to slash government spending on behalf of President Donald Trump. The demonstrations are part of a growing backlash in North America and Europe to Musk's disruptive role in Washington. Critics of Trump and Musk hope to discourage and stigmatize purchases of Tesla, the electric car company that is the world's most valuable automaker. Liberal groups for weeks have organized anti-Tesla protests in hopes of galvanizing opposition to Musk's Department of Government Efficiency and energizing Democrats still demoralized by Trump's November victory. "We can get back at Elon," said Nathan Phillips, a 58-year-old ecologist from Newton, Massachusetts, who was protesting in Boston on Saturday. "We can impose direct economic damage on Tesla by showing up at showrooms everywhere and boycotting Tesla and telling everyone else to get out, sell your stocks, sell your Teslas." Musk is taking direction from Trump to slash federal spending and sharply reduce the workforce, arguing that Trump's victory gave the president and him a mandate to restructure the US government. DOGE officials have swiftly gained access to sensitive databases, directed thousands of federal job cuts, canceled contracts and shut down sections of the government, including the US Agency for International Development. Musk's critics say his actions defy Congress's power to control the US...

title: पुलिस हिरासत से भागने की कोशिश में गैंगस्टर मैक्सी घायल
creator: Rajinder Dhawan
content: एस. अग्निहोत्री/ हप्रजीरकपुर, 1 मार्चएसएएस नगर पुलिस और पंजाब एंटी गैंगस्टर टास्क फोर्स (एजीटीएफ) की एक बड़ी कार्रवाई के दौरान डेराबस्सी में जीरकपुर-अंबाला राजमार्ग पर घग्गर पुल के पास पुलिस हिरासत से भागने की कोशिश करते समय गैंगस्टर मलकियत उर्फ मैक्सी बाएं पैर में गोली लगने से घायल हो गया। यह जानकारी शनिवार को पुलिस महानिदेशक (डीजीपी) पंजाब गौरव यादव ने दी। उन्होंने बताया कि राजासांसी के निकट रोड़ाला गांव का गैंगस्टर मैक्सी विदेशी आतंकवादी गोल्डी बराड़ और गैंगस्टर गोल्डी ढिल्लों का गुर्गा है और उनके इशारे पर जबरन वसूली का रैकेट चला रहा था। हाल ही में मैक्सी और उसके साथी संदीप उर्फ दीप को पटियाला पुलिस ने आर्म्स एक्ट के एक मामले में गिरफ्तार किया था। इसके बाद दोनों को एसएएस नगर पुलिस शुक्रवार को प्रोडक्शन वारंट पर पटियाला जेल से लायी थी। जनवरी 2025 में उपरोक्त आरोपियों ने मोहाली के एक प्रॉपर्टी डीलर को 50 लाख रुपए की फिरौती के लिए निशाना बनाया था। डीजीपी गौरव यादव ने कहा कि मैक्सी के खुलासे के बाद डीएसपी डेराबस्सी बिक्रमजीत सिंह बराड़ के नेतृत्व में पुलिस टीम आरोपी को उसके कबूलनामे के अनुसार जीरकपुर-अंबाला हाईवे पर एक सुनसान जगह पर ले जा रही थी, ताकि .32 कैलिबर की पिस्तौल , जोकि उसने पीड़ित प्रॉपर्टी डीलर को नुकसान पहुंचाने के इरादे से छिपाया था, बरामद की जा सके।मौके पर पहुंचने पर आरोपी ने हिरासत से भागने के प्रयास में पुलिस टीम पर गोलीबारी शुरू कर दी। इस बीच, जवाबी गोलीबारी के दौरान आत्मरक्षा में मैक्सी के बाएं पैर में गोली लग गई और अब उसका सिविल अस्पताल मोहाली में इलाज चल रहा है। डीजीपी ने बताया कि हथियार के साथ उसके कब्जे से तीन कारतूस और दो खाली खोखे भी बरामद किए गए हैं।...

title: Paolla Oliveira mostra look para Baile e fala de expectativa para o desfile da Grande Rio
content: Depois de participar do bloco Cordão da Bola Preta no Rio de Janeiro na manhã deste sábado (01.03), agora Paolla Oliveira aproveita mais um evento carnavalesco: a atriz é a rainha do Baile do Copa , promovido pelo icônico hotel Copacabana Palace. Antes de curtir a folia, Paolla bateu um papo com a Vogue sobre os preparativos para aguentar a maratona nesta época do ano, já que na terça-feira (04.04) ela ainda desfila como rainha de bateria da Grande Rio. "A adrenalina é tão grande durante essa maratona que, na verdade, é o psicológico que precisa estar forte, mais do que o físico, para conseguir dar conta de toda a energia e da intensidade dos dias de folia." Sobre o desfile de terça-feira, ela diz que está "superansiosa". Neste ano, a escola de Duque de Caxias tem como tema “Pororocas Parawaras: As Águas dos Meus Encantos nas Contas dos Curimbós”, homenageando o estado do Pará. "É uma ansiedade boa, de emoção!" Já para o Baile deste sábado, a atriz se vestiu de acordo com a temática “Oceano: Infinito Azul” , uma homenagem à grandiosidade dos mares e à importância de sua preservação. A produção à la sereia é assinada por Victor Hugo Mattos, com styling de Rita Lazzarott. Abaixo, confira a conversa na íntegra com a atriz. Vogue: Como foi a escolha do look para o Baile da Copa? Paolla: A escolha do look para o Baile do Copa foi uma experiência maravilhosa! Como sempre, contei com o olhar incrível da [stylist] Rita Lazzarotti, que trouxe...

title: High-stakes father-son feud rocks Singapore property giant
Trump ha firmato l'ordine per rendere inglese lingua ufficiale
creator: test@mail.com
content: (ANSA) - WASHINGTON, 01 MAR - Come anticipato nei giorni scorsi, Donald Trump ha firmato l'ordine esecutivo che stabilisce l'inglese come la lingua ufficiale degli Stati Uniti. Si tratta di una novità assoluta poiché nei suoi quasi 250 anni di storia gli Usa non hanno mai avuto una lingua ufficiale a livello federale. L'ordine esecutivo annulla il mandato federale di Bill Clinton che obbligava le agenzie a fornire assistenza linguistica a chi non parla inglese. "Nell'accogliere i nuovi americani, una politica volta a incoraggiare l'apprendimento e l'adozione della nostra lingua nazionale renderà gli Stati Uniti una casa condivisa e consentirà ai nuovi cittadini di realizzare il sogno americano", si legge nella nota della Casa Bianca che annuncia la firma dell'ordine esecutivo. "Parlare inglese non solo apre le porte a livello economico, ma aiuta i nuovi arrivati ;;a impegnarsi nelle loro comunità, a partecipare alle tradizioni nazionali e a restituire qualcosa alla nostra società". (ANSA).

title: Με διάταγμα Τραμπ τα αγγλικά αναγνωρίζονται ως η επίσημη γλώσσα των ΗΠΑ
creator: Άλκης Αποστολόπουλος
content: Ο Αμερικανός πρόεδρος Ντόναλντ Τραμπ υπέγραψε χθες Σάββατο εκτελεστικό διάταγμα το οποίο καθιερώνει τα αγγλικά ως την επίσημη γλώσσα στις ΗΠΑ, με στόχο να «προάγει την ενότητα» της χώρας. «Είναι προς το συμφέρον της Αμερικής να ορίσει μία – και μόνο μία – επίσημη γλώσσα», υπογραμμίζεται στο διάταγμα «τιμώντας τη μακρά παράδοση πολύγλωσσων Αμερικανών πολιτών, οι οποίοι έμαθαν αγγλικά και τα δίδαξαν στα παιδιά τους», όπως αναφέρει. Η πρωτοβουλία αποσκοπεί «στην προαγωγή της ενότητας και τη διατήρηση κοινής αμερικανικής κουλτούρας για όλους τους πολίτες» της χώρας, επισημαίνεται. Οι ΗΠΑ δεν είχαν καθιερώσει επίσημη γλώσσα μέχρι σήμερα. Το διάταγμα που υπέγραψε ο Τραμπ ακυρώνει εκείνο που είχε υπογράψει το 2000 ο τότε πρόεδρος Μπιλ Κλίντον, το οποίο είχε στόχο να διευκολύνει την πρόσβαση «πολιτών με περιορισμένη γνώση της αγγλικής γλώσσας» στις δημόσιες υπηρεσίες. Πλέον, οι ομοσπονδιακές υπηρεσίες δεν θα υποχρεούνται να παρέχουν υπηρεσίες σε άλλες γλώσσες πλην της αγγλικής, αλλά θα εναπόκειται στη διακριτική τους ευχέρεια. Στο παρελθόν, νομοθετικές πρωτοβουλίες για την καθιέρωση επίσημης γλώσσας στις ΗΠΑ είχαν απορριφθεί από το Κογκρέσο των ΗΠΑ. Περίπου 43 εκατομμύρια άνθρωποι στις ΗΠΑ μιλούν ισπανικά στο σπίτι τους, σύμφωνα με επίσημα δημογραφικά στοιχεία του 2023.

title: 越前町選挙きょう投開票 午前11時現在の投票率17.57% 【福井】

మైమరపిస్తున్న కన్నప్ప టీజర్
creator: krishna
content: శివ భక్తుడైన కన్నప్ప పురాణ కథను ఆధారంగా చేసుకుని విష్ణు మంచు డ్రీమ్ ప్రాజెక్ట్‌గా ‘కన్నప్ప’ సినిమాను తెరకెక్కిస్తున్న సంగతి తెలిసిందే. అవా ఎంటర్‌టైన్‌మెంట్, 24 ఫ్రేమ్స్ ఫ్యాక్టరీ బ్యానర్ల మీద డా. మోహన్ బాబు నిర్మాణంలో ముఖేష్ కుమార్ సింగ్ ఈ చిత్రాన్ని తెరకెక్కిస్తున్నారు. ఈ చిత్రంలో మోహన్ బాబు, అక్షయ్ కుమార్, మోహన్‌లాల్, ప్రభాస్, కాజల్ అగర్వాల్ వంటి వారు ముఖ్య పాత్రల్ని పోషించారు. ఈ మూవీ ఏప్రిల్ 25న గ్రాండ్‌గా రిలీజ్ కాబోతోంది. ఈ క్రమంలో ప్రమోషన్స్‌లో భాగంగా కన్నప్ప టీజర్‌ను రిలీజ్ చేశారు. ఈ టీజర్‌లోని ఒక్కో షాట్, యాక్షన్ సీక్వెన్స్, విజువల్స్ అన్నీ కూడా ప్రేక్షకుల్ని మైమరపించేలా ఉన్నాయి. మరీ ముఖ్యంగా విష్ణు చేసిన యాక్షన్ సీక్వెన్స్, శివపార్వతులుగా అక్షయ్ కుమార్, కాజల్ అగర్వాల్ కనిపించిన తీరు.. టీజర్ చివర్లో రుద్రుడిగా ప్రభాస్ ఎంట్రీ.. ఆ క్లోజప్ షాట్స్‌కు అభిమానులతో పాటుగా, సినీ లవర్స్ అంతా ఫిదా అయ్యేలా ఉన్నారు. ఈ రెండో టీజర్‌తో కన్నప్ప మీద అంచనాలు మరింతగా పెరిగాయి. ఈ మూవీని ఏప్రిల్ 25న ప్రపంచ వ్యాప్తంగా తెలుగు, తమిళ, కన్నడ, మలయాళ, హిందీ భాషల్లో రిలీజ్ చేయబోతోన్న సంగతి తెలిసిందే.

title: India’s Balancing Act: Navigating Trump’s Unpredictable Geopolitical Shifts
content: Former U.S. President, Donald Trump’s foreign policy has always been characterized by an “America First” approach, often at the expense of traditional alliances. His recent controversial actions—such as isolating U.S. allies, supporting Russia in the United Nations by refusing to name it as an aggressor, and potentially attempting to draw Russia away from China—signal a major shift in global geopolitics. These moves will have far-reaching consequences, affecting not just Europe and Asia but also India’s strategic positioning. Below is a detailed breakdown of these developments and their implications.How Will India Be Impacted?Implications for India-Russia Relations; If Trump successfully pulls Russia away from China, India could benefit. Moscow has historically been a key defense and energy partner for New Delhi. A Russia less dependent on China would mean fewer concerns for India about Russia-China military cooperation and arms transfers.Strategic Balancing in the Indo-Pacific; India has been strengthening its partnerships with the U.S., Japan, and Australia through the QUAD, while also maintaining its historical ties with Russia. If Trump weakens U.S. alliances in Asia, India might need to play a more proactive role in regional security, possibly taking a leadership position in balancing China’s aggression.China’s Growing Regional Dominance; if Trump completely isolates U.S. allies, China could become the dominant force in Asia, challenging India’s security interests. This...

title: 趙少康取代朱立倫選黨主席救國民黨? 媒體人:PO文砲轟有意涵
content: ▲趙少康突然發文砲轟國民黨。(資料照/記者屠惠剛攝) 記者陶本和/台北報導 針對民進黨9位立委的罷免案一階連署審查未過,中廣前董事長趙少康大怒,發文痛批沒看過這麼弱的在野黨。對此,資深媒體人黃創夏1日表示,趙少康的發文意涵是「國民黨爛黨,一定要有人來救,趙少康來救」,他認為,本來大浪當前不可以換黨主席,但現在國民黨主席朱立倫留任或7月延後選舉的正當性都沒有了。 民進黨新聞部主任吳崢在政論節目上爆料,其實趙少康臉書的發文很節制,他在趙少康的節目錄影時,趙少康看到手機跳出來訊息,就跟旁邊國民黨立委說,「你們國民黨真的是爛黨,連署都連不過,搞什麼?民進黨怎麼都過了呢?不認真擺攤,只想用抄的,根本不認真」。 黃創夏認為,趙少康的貼文有意涵,國民黨爛黨一定要有人來救,趙少康來救,這是他臉書整個的意義,彼可取而代之,意涵已經出來。 他說,有人為藍營開脫,說民進黨有資源,國民黨一窮二白、寸步難行,但趙少康的貼文強調,趙少康跟侯友宜的錢都給了,國民黨區域立委自己,每人也都有政黨補助金,結果都沒有拿出來用。 黃創夏也舉趙少康貼文底下的民眾留言,認為風向就是國民黨弱到掉渣,朱立倫早該下台,還有人說趙少康選黨主席才有救。 黃創夏表示,本來以罷制罷,國民黨30幾個,民進黨10個,大浪當前不可以換黨主席,七月不可以補選,但是現在選票上可能都是國民黨,沒有民進黨的,沒有藍綠對決,就只剩陣地保位戰,現在朱立倫繼續留任或延後選舉的正當性都沒有了。 黃創夏說,現在是第一局上半,19比0要換總教練,七月黨主席就要改選了,沒有延後的理由,誰可以救國民黨?他相信,趙少康的嗅覺一直都很敏銳的。 對於趙少康在臉書砲轟一事,朱立倫回應,在第一階段,有很多的青年朋友、志工,他們的努力,碰到中選會這麼嚴格的審查,對他們來講也是一項很大的挑戰,但是黨中央還是感謝這些志工、青年朋友的熱情,「我們要多給他加油」。 朱立倫說,雖然在這個過程當中,有一些不如意的地方,但是他相信在補件的過程,應該多給這些青年朋友加油,多給大家來鼓勵,畢竟他們有這樣的熱情,都是應該予以的肯定。 ▲國民黨主席朱立倫。(資料照/記者鄭佩玟攝)

title: Dallas police confirm no active shooter at cheer competition
content: A fight at a Dallas convention center where the National Cheerleaders Association All-Star Championship is being held this weekend caused loud noises that led to panic and injuries today, officials said. The Dallas Police Department responded to an “incident” at the Kay Bailey Hutchison Convention Center around 1 p.m. local time and determined no shooting had occurred. According to a DPD statement, "The preliminary investigation determined a fight between two people led to multiple poles being knocked down, which caused a loud noise. This noise contributed to panic inside the building, prompting people to rush outside in a stampede. There were multiple non-life-threatening injuries during the chaos." Police evacuated the building as a precaution, the department said, and shut down the cheer event for the day. Later on Saturday, competitors and family members were allowed to return to the convention center to retrieve items that may have been left behind. The competition will resume Sunday. The NCA All-Star Championship is expected to bring more than 58,000 people to the area through the weekend, more than 30,000 of them cheerleaders from 43 states and nine countries.

title: TransPerfect Acquires Technicolor Games
content: Leading Gaming Studio to Become Division of TransPerfect Gaming SAN FRANCISCO and BANGALORE, India , March 1, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- TransPerfect , the world's largest provider of language and AI solutions for global business, today announced it has acquired Technicolor Games, the gaming division of Technicolor Group, S.A. Financial terms of the transaction were not disclosed. With offices in London , San Francisco , Montreal , and Bangalore , Technicolor Games includes more than 400 creative artists specializing in concept art, 3D art, animation, VFX, and cinematics. The company works with a global clientele—including major developers like Electronic Arts, Capcom, and 2K—on AAA titles such as Dragon Age: The Veilguard, Hogwarts Legacy, FC25, and Street Fighter 6. As part of the deal, TransPerfect will welcome all Technicolor Games India employees back into the Bangalore facility—the company's largest—to ensure continuity of business for all clients. Division CEO Andy Emery and VP of Global Business Development Eric Williams will continue to lead Technicolor Games, which will operate as a division of TransPerfect Gaming. Emery and Williams will join TransPerfect's senior leadership team. TransPerfect Gaming provides comprehensive video game solutions, from pre-production to launch to player support. Its global team ensures an outstanding gaming experience in any market, offering expertise in accessibility, art production, audio services, localization, marketing, quality...

title: 日本岩手縣山火持續 火場面積擴大至約1800公頃
content: 日本岩手縣的山火已經持續燃燒4日,火場面積擴大至約1800公頃。 日本放送協會報道,三陸町綾里地區北部和西部的火勢蔓延,令火場面積一日內擴大約400公頃。 山火暫時造成1人死亡,至少84棟房屋受損。 多地發佈避難指示,受火災影響,部分鐵路和公共交通停運或繞道。消防部門正通過地面和空中滅火,防止火勢蔓延至住宅區。

title: Cuál fue el rating del discurso de Javier Milei en la apertura de sesiones del Congreso
4-year-old spots flames on roof, saves apartment from potential large fire
creator: WHIO
content: A 4-year-old boy spotted a fire Friday, noticing the flames early and making a difference in what could have been a large apartment fire. [DOWNLOAD: Free WHIO-TV News app for alerts as news breaks ] News Center 7′s Malik Patterson speaks with the 4-year-old and his mother LIVE on News Center 7 at 11. TRENDING STORIES: Isaac Grubb and his mom Selena were taking advantage of the nice weather on Clayton Road in New Lebanon. Issac was riding his bike when pointed out something across the parking lot. “I saw fire and smoke,” Issac said. Selena said she was confused at first. “I thought that people up there were grilling because it was just white smoke. So I didn’t think anything of it,” Selena said. “I went over there to investigate anyways, and sure enough, there was a tiny fire that started.” Then, Selena called 911. “It was so windy, I was afraid it was going to start escalating from there,” Selena said. New Lebanon firefighters thanked Issac for spotting the fire so quickly, saying nobody was hurt thanks to Issac. “It makes me very proud, very proud,” Selena said. “He’s very mature for his age. And it just makes me really happy that you can identify a hazard like that.” Issac told News Center 7 he is thinking of being a firefighter when he grows up. Fire investigators said there will be new information on the fire available Monday. [SIGN UP: WHIO-TV Daily Headlines Newsletter ]

title: Watch: Man's Life-Risking Pull-Up Stunt on Power Lines Shocks the Internet
creator: editor@republicworld.com (Digital Desk)
content: Updated 07:52 IST, March 2nd 2025 A viral video showed a man doing pull-ups on live electric wires, triggering backlash. Viral Video: When people share videos of dangerous stunts online, they often go viral. In one such shocking video, a man was seen doing pull-ups on electric wires, leaving the internet both amazed and concerned. The video, shared on Instagram by @FitnessHaven, shows the man gripping electric wires connected to utility poles and pulling himself up, a risky act that could have easily resulted in a fatal accident. Watch the video: The video quickly went viral and gained 2.2 million views, sparking widespread criticism among netizens for the man’s dangerous behavior. Read Also: Viral Video Madness: Teens Try To Overturn Train In Hardoi For Reels, Caught By RPF Internet Sparks Outrage As the video spread, social media users wasted no time in expressing their disapproval. Many criticized the man for his irresponsibility, with some expressing genuine concern for his safety. One user commented, "This is beyond stupidity. One wrong move and he could have lost his life!" Another wrote, "Why are people risking their lives just for a few likes and views?" Others were shocked by the reckless stunt. "Electric wires? Seriously? This is how people end up in tragic accidents," one user said. Another added, "This is not bravery; it’s pure madness!" “People will do anything for views these days. This is just insane!” wrote one user. Another sarcastically added, “Natural...

Lo que (no) dijo Javier Milei de la política energética, Vaca Muerta, las tarifas y la minería
बनाना चाहते हैं हलवाई जैसी खस्ता-स्वादिष्ट गुजिया, इस बार होली से पहले ट्राई करें ये रेसिपी
content: होली के त्योहार को खास बनाने के लिए लोग अलग-अलग तरह की खाने-पीने की चीजें बनाना पसंद करते हैं। होली के त्योहार से पहले कई लोग गुजिया बनाने की तैयारी में भी जुट जाते हैं। अगर आप भी घर पर हलवाई जैसी खस्ता और स्वादिष्ट गुजिया बनाना चाहते हैं, तो ये बेहद आसान रेसिपी आपके लिए काफी ज्यादा मददगार साबित हो सकती है। आइए बिना मावा के गुजिया बनाने के तरीके के बारे में जानकारी हासिल करते हैं... गुजिया बनाने के लिए आपको शक्कर, नारियल, बेकिंग पाउडर, नमक, ओटमील, आटा और बहुत थोड़े से घी की जरूरत पड़ेगी। अगर आप गुजिया को हेल्दी तरीके से बनाना चाहते हैं, तो गुजिया को तलने की जगह आप एयर फ्रायर का इस्तेमाल भी कर सकते हैं। गुजिया बनाने के लिए सबसे पहले एक कटोरे में आटा, ओटमील, घी, नमक और बेकिंग पाउडर निकाल लीजिए। आपको इन सभी चीजों को अच्छी तरह से मिक्स कर लेना है। अब गर्म पानी की मदद से इस मिक्सचर को गूंथ लीजिए। गुंथे हुए इस मिक्सचर को लगभग 30 मिनट तक कपड़े से ढक कर रख दीजिए। ध्यान रहे कि कटोरे को ढकने के लिए आपको मिस्लिन कपड़े का इस्तेमाल करना है। गुजिया की स्टफिंग के लिए एक कटोरे में शक्कर, नारियल और घी को मिक्स कर लीजिए। इसके बाद आपको आटे के मिक्सचर को पूरी की शेप में बेल लेना है और फिर इन पूरियों में स्टफिंग भर लेनी है। अब थोड़ा सा तेल लगाकर गुजिया को लगभग 10 मिनट तक 180 डिग्री पर प्रीहीट एयर फ्रायर करें। आप गुजिया को बेक करने के लिए ओवन का इस्तेमाल भी कर सकते हैं। होली के त्योहार पर गुजिया की ये रेसिपी घर पर आए मेहमानों का दिल खुश करने में कामयाब हो सकती है। यकीन मानिए घर पर बनी ये गुजिया बच्चों से लेकर बड़ों तक, सभी को काफी ज्यादा पसंद आएगी।

title: Man Dupes People Of Rs 10 Lakh Over Pretext Of Recruitment In Army, Arrested
content: A coordinated effort by the Military Intelligence (MI) unit of the Army's Southern Command and Pune city Police has resulted in the arrest of an individual implicated in a fraudulent Army recruitment scheme, officials said. The suspect, identified as Suryawanshi Nitin Balaji from Latur district, was apprehended in the vicinity of the Southern Command headquarters in Pune on Saturday, said a senior official of Pune Police. According to police authorities, Suryawanshi targeted prospective candidates from economically weaker backgrounds in Maharashtra and Karnataka, promising them recruitment into the Army. It is alleged that he demanded Rs three lakh per candidate, fraudulently amassing an estimated sum of Rs 5-10 lakh. The arrest followed a complaint lodged by a 23-year-old candidate, resident of Nanded district, who had paid Rs 1.75 lakh to the accused. The complainant, a farmer preparing for recruitment in the Army and police services, encountered Suryawanshi at Latur railway station. The accused falsely claimed to be an active-duty Army personnel and assured the complainant of recruitment. Subsequently, the complainant met Suryawanshi near the Sub Area Canteen at the Southern Command headquarters, where he handed over the money in cash and through UPI transactions. However, when the complainant persisted in inquiring about his recruitment status, the accused began ignoring his calls. Upon receiving intelligence regarding the fraudulent activities, the MI unit shared the...

title: Frontalkollision auf der Sihltalstrasse – drei Verletzte
content: Auf der Sihltalstrasse kam es am Samstagabend zu einer Frontalkollision. Ein 18-Jähriger geriet auf die Gegenfahrbahn und prallte in das Auto eines 77-Jährigen. Alle drei Beteiligten wurden leicht bis mittelschwer verletzt und ins Spital gebracht. Polizei, Feuerwehr und Rettungsdienste waren im Einsatz, die Ermittlungen laufen. Bei einer Frontalkollision auf der Sihltalstrasse sind am späten Samstagabend drei Personen verletzt worden. Ein 18-Jähriger war gegen 22 Uhr in Richtung Zürich unterwegs, als er aus bisher noch ungeklärten Gründen plötzlich auf die Gegenfahrbahn geriet. Dort krachte er frontal in das Auto eines 77-Jährigen und seiner Beifahrerin. Alle drei Beteiligten wurden leicht bis mittelschwer verletzt und mussten mit Rettungswagen ins Spital gebracht werden, wie die Kantonspolizei Zürich berichtet. Die Sihltalstrasse blieb für rund drei Stunden gesperrt, eine Umleitung wurde eingerichtet. Im Einsatz waren vor Ort mehrere Polizeikorps, Feuerwehren sowie Rettungsdienste, unterstützt von der Staatsanwaltschaft Zürich – Limmat und einem Abschleppdienst. Die Ermittlungen zum Unfallhergang laufen. Wir wissen, wie wichtig es ist, eure Meinung zu teilen. Leider müssen wir die Kommentarspalte bei diesem Artikel geschlossen lassen. Es gibt Themen, bei denen wir wiederholt Hasskommentare und Beleidigungen erhalten. Das bedauern wir sehr. Bei Storys rund um Todesfälle, Verbrechen und Unglücke verzichten wir ebenfalls auf die Kommentarfunktion. Uns ist der...

title: Murió Erika Morales, la joven que había solicitado la eutanasia tras quedar cuadrapléjica
content: “Vuela muy alto mi bello ángel, te amo hermanita siempre”, escribió Tatiana Morales, al lado de una foto de su hermana Erika qué falleció esta tarde, después pasar tres años en la clínica, en estado de cuadraplejia. Le puede interesar: Germán Calle, el reconocido empresario colombiano que se codea con ricos y famosos fue condenado por estafa agravada El caso de Erika fue tendencia los últimos días de febrero, pues su familia denunció que la joven, oriunda Sotomayor en Nariño, había solicitado la eutanasia a través de comunicaciones asistidas por su familia, pero la EPS Emssanar le había negado el procedimiento. Erika, de 20 años, quería acabar con el dolor físico y emocional que padecía a diario, desde hacia más de 3 años, cuando fue atacada por otras dos mujeres que la golpearon con una botella de whisky en la cabeza provocándole un infarto cerebral y una lesión medular severa que terminó dejándola cuadrapléjica. Después de que el caso se hizo viral en las redes sociales y los medios de comunicación, la EPS aprobó el procedimiento. “Quiero expresar que son muchos sentimiento encontrados, que esto no es fácil, no es fácil perder a una hermana, mi única hermana. Saben, ningún comentario malintencionado me importa hoy. Solo sé que fue la prueba de amor más grande que le estoy dando a mi hermana. Que ella va a estar bien, que logré que fuera escuchada. Espero seguir luchando por la justicia de mi hermana. Es un hecho todo, fue aprobado. Lo...

title: サッカー=セルティック前田、得点ランキングトップタイに
content: [1日 ロイター] - サッカーのスコットランド・プレミアリーグは1日、各地で試合を行い、セルティックの前田大然がセントミレン戦で今季リーグ戦12点目をマーク。ランキングトップに並んだ。 先発した前田は1─1の前半44分にPKを獲得。これをアルネ・エンゲルスが決めて、セルティックが勝ち越しに成功した。前田は1点リードの後半43分に左足のシュートでゴール左隅に流し込み、アディショナルタイム5分までプレーした。 旗手怜央はフル出場。後半23分にクロスでセルティックの3点目をアシストし、5─2の勝利に貢献した。 セルティックは29試合を終えて勝ち点75。2位レンジャーズに16ポイント差をつけて首位を独走している。

title: San Diego FC makes its home debut before a sellout crowd in a city hungry for top-level soccer
creator: Greg Beacham, The Associated Press
content: SAN DIEGO (AP) — A match decades in the making finally happens Saturday night when San Diego FC debuts on its home field in front of a sellout crowd of fans starved for elite professional sports — and particularly hungry for top-level soccer. San Diego's first Major League Soccer club began competition as the league's 30th franchise last week, and made an immediate splash by beating the defending MLS Cup champion LA Galaxy on their home field. A week later, San Diego formally christens Snapdragon Stadium, the new arena built on the Mission Valley ground once occupied by the oft-renamed home of MLB's Padres and the NFL's Chargers. The night is a dream come true for generations of San Diego soccer fans, who have watched while products of their extensive youth systems advanced to all levels of the international game. San Diego's year-round sunshine and location on the border with Mexico make it a soccer haven, but after years of failed attempts to get a serious team in a top North American league, those fans finally have a well-organized, well-funded team to call their own. Danish winger Anders Dreyer, who scored both goals in San Diego's 2-0 victory over the Galaxy last week, already has a feeling for his new town's passion for the sport. He hopes San Diego FC will send a message immediately. "Hopefully it's going to be a magical night, and we want to make it that for the fans and for the city," Dreyer said. “You can really feel the energy from the fans and the passion about...

title: US Sees 1st Measles Death In Decade: Here's What To Know, How To Avoid It
content: Measles is rarely seen in the United States, but Americans are growing more concerned about the preventable virus as cases continue to rise in rural West Texas. This week, an unvaccinated child died in the West Texas outbreak, which involves more than 120 cases. The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said the last confirmed measles death in the United States was in 2015. There are also nine measles cases in eastern New Mexico, but the state health department said there is no direct connection to the outbreak in Texas. Here's what to know about the measles and how to protect yourself. It's a respiratory disease caused by one of the world's most contagious viruses. The virus is airborne and spreads easily when an infected person breathes, sneezes or coughs. It most commonly affects kids. "On average, one infected person may infect about 15 other people," said Scott Weaver, a center of excellence director for the Global Virus Network, an international coalition. "There's only a few viruses that even come close to that." Measles first infects the respiratory tract, then spreads throughout the body, causing a high fever, runny nose, cough, red, watery eyes and a rash. The rash generally appears three to five days after the first symptoms, beginning as flat red spots on the face and then spreading downward to the neck, trunk, arms, legs and feet. When the rash appears, the fever may spike over 104 degrees Fahrenheit, according to the CDC. There's no specific treatment...

title: पर्सनल लोनवरही मिळणार टॅक्स डिस्काऊंटचे बेनिफिट्स, जाणून घ्या
creator: एस. कुलकर्णी
content: पर्सनल लोनवर तुम्हाला सूट हवी असेल तर ही बातमी नक्की वाचा. पर्सनल लोन इतर कर्जांप्रमाणे कर सवलतीस पात्र नसतात. पण काही खास प्रकरणांमध्ये हे शक्य आहे. हो. आम्ही सत्य बोलत आहोत. याविषयीची माहिती पुढे जाणून घेऊया. तुमच्यापैकी अनेकांनी पर्सनल लोन घेतले असेल. पण पर्सनल लोनवरही प्राप्तिकरात सूट मिळू शकते, हे तुम्हाला माहित नसेल. तुम्हाला माहित आहे का की पर्सनल लोनही करमुक्त आहे. याविषयी जाणून घेऊया. सर्वसाधारणपणे पर्सनल लोन इतर कर्जांप्रमाणे करसवलतीस पात्र नसतात. पण काही खास प्रकरणांमध्ये तुम्ही यावरील कपातीचा ही फायदा घेऊ शकता.तुम्ही पर्सनल लोनचा वापर घर खरेदी, बांधणी किंवा नूतनीकरणासाठी करत असाल तर. अशा परिस्थितीत तुम्ही इन्कम टॅक्सच्या कलम 80C 24B 80E 371 अंतर्गत व्याज भरण्यावर वजावटीचा दावा करू शकता. त्याचप्रमाणे शिक्षणाचा खर्च भागविण्यासाठी पर्सनल लोनचा वापर केल्यास त्यावर टॅक्स डिडक्शनचाही लाभ घेता येतो. याशिवाय व्यवसायासाठी केलेल्या खर्चावरही कर कपातीचा दावा केला जाऊ शकतो.काय म्हणतात तज्ज्ञ?कर तज्ज्ञ बळवंत जैन यांच्या मते, पर्सनल लोनवरील इन्कम टॅक्सचा फायदा केवळ दोन अटींमध्ये मिळतो. प्रथम, जर आपण घर खरेदी करण्यासाठी कर्ज घेतले असेल तर. त्यामुळे त्यावर तुम्हाला करसवलत मिळणार आहे. येथे हे लक्षात घेतले पाहिजे की, हा लाभ केवळ घर खरेदीवर आहे, भूखंड खरेदी वर नाही. तर, हा लाभ केवळ जुनी करप्रणाली असलेल्यांनाच मिळतो. दुसरं म्हणजे तुम्ही व्यावसायिक खर्चासाठी पर्सनल लोन घेत असाल, तर तुम्ही तुमच्या पर्सनल लोनचा वापर बिझनेस खर्च भागवण्यासाठी केला आहे हे रिटर्नमध्ये दाखवावं लागतं. या दोन अटी वगळता पर्सनल लोनवरील प्राप्तिकरात कोणतीही सवलत नाही.व्याजावरील कर वजावटपर्सनल लोनवर डायरेक्ट...

title: Cuộc Bắc tiến của các “đại gia” xứ Nam: 7-Eleven, GS25, Toshin và Thiso Mall ồ ạt mở siêu thị ở Hà Nội
content: Từ khi mua lại thương hiệu Emart tại Việt Nam của đối tác ngoại, tỷ phú Trần Bá Dương không giấu tham vọng lớn với mảng bán lẻ. Trong báo cáo thị trường mới đây từ Savills Hà Nội, thủ đô đang tiếp tục khẳng định sức hút của mình trên bản đồ bán lẻ với sự ra mắt của hàng loạt trung tâm thương mại (TTTM) mới. Sau thành công của Lotte Mall Westlake từ năm 2023, năm 2025 sẽ chào đón Hanoi Centre – dự án được Keppel thuê toàn bộ khu trung tâm thương mại để quản lý, vận hành và khai thác, hứa hẹn mang lại hiệu quả tương tự. Cùng với đó, năm 2026, Savills Hà Nội tiết lộ thị trường sẽ sôi động hơn với sự xuất hiện của Thiso Mall và Toshin tại Starlake. Thiso Mall là thương hiệu thuộc tập đoàn Thaco của tỷ phú Trần Bá Dương, kinh doanh và quản lý vận hành các bất động sản với mô hình “một điểm đến - nhiều tiện ích, dịch vụ”. Từ khi mua lại Emart tại Việt Nam của đối tác ngoại, ông Dương không giấu tham vọng lớn với mảng bán lẻ. Tại Hội nghị năm 2022, Thaco công bố mục tiêu đầy tham vọng đến năm 2026: Mở 20 đại siêu thị Emart, doanh số 1 tỷ USD và dẫn đầu thị trường đại siêu thị tại Việt Nam. Không riêng Thaco, 7-Eleven mới đây cũng xác nhận sẽ mở cửa hàng tại Hà Nội. Thông tin này được công bố...

title: OFICIAL: Olancho FC despide a Primi Maradiaga; este es su reemplazo
creator: Noticias de Fútbol y Actualidad Deportiva | La Prensa.
content: Oficial. Luego de la dura derrota del Olancho FC por 0-3 ante el Real España, se ha confirmado la salida del entrenador Ramón ‘Primi’ Maradiaga del club. Los Potros no encontraron su rumbo en la primera vuelta del Torneo Clausura 2025 y solo consiguieron una victoria tras nueve jornadas. Fue ante el Motagua en la fecha 2. Bajo el mandato del Primi, los Potros empataron en cinco ocasiones y cayeron en tres, teniendo solo ocho puntos tras nueve jornadas en la presente campaña de la Liga Nacional. Tras su irregular primera vuelta, el Olancho FC ha tomado la decisión de poner fin a su vínculo con Ramón ‘Primi’ Maradiaga y su reemplazo en los banquillos quedaría bajo el mandato de Reynaldo Tilguath, quien estuvo como su asistente técnico en el torneo. Cabe destacar que esta decisión ya estaba contemplada desde el fichaje de Tilguath, ya que su contrato estipulaba que, en caso de que Primi dejara el club, él asumiría el cargo de entrenador del equipo en el campeonato. “¡Gracias, profesor Ramón Maradiaga! Le deseamos mucho éxitos en sus nuevos proyectos deportivos”, anunció el Olancho FC a través de sus redes sociales. El anuncio del Olancho FC sobre la salida de Primi Maradiaga. Primi Maradiaga asumió el cargo en septiembre del 2024 con los Potros del Olancho en el pasado torneo, en donde los llevó hasta semifinales del Apertura, eliminando en el repechaje a Marathón . Este es el tercer entrenador despedido en lo que va del Torneo Clausura 2025. Cabe destacar que...

title: Florida Panthers acquire D Seth Jones in a trade with the Chicago Blackhawks
content: SUNRISE, Fla. — The defending Stanley Cup champion Florida Panthers acquired defenseman Seth Jones in a trade with the Chicago Blackhawks on Saturday night. Florida got Jones and a 2026 fourth-round pick from Chicago for goaltender Spencer Knight and a conditional first-round pick in next year’s draft. The Blackhawks also are retaining 26% of Jones’ salary. It is another huge acquisition for Florida, which already has key players like Aleksander Barkov, Matthew Tkachuk, Sam Reinhart, Anton Lundell, Carter Verhaeghe and Gustav Forsling locked up for at least three more seasons after this - and now lands a top-line defenseman in Jones, who is under contract through 2030. “Seth is an elite veteran defenseman and a proven leader in our league,” said Bill Zito, the general manager and president of hockey operations for the Panthers. “He has been one of the most consistent players of the past decade serving as a reliable workhorse on both sides of the puck, and he will help our club continue to compete at the highest level.” The 30-year-old Jones was the No. 4 overall pick by Nashville in the 2013 entry draft, taken two spots after Florida chose its current captain, Aleksander Barkov, that year. Jones went right to the NHL after the draft - starting his career with the Predators, then spending six seasons in Columbus and the last four seasons in Chicago. The Blackhawks never made the playoffs in Jones’ tenure there and aren’t in postseason contention this year, which led to him...

title: Gratitude flows from Naikore for team
creator: Vereimi Wara
content: A GRATEFUL Vitalina Naikore, vice-captain of the Rooster Chicken Fijiana Drua team, expressed her profound gratitude for her teammates in putting together their dynamic Super W opener victory against the Waratahs last Friday.Naikore relayed her appreciation for the team, after the side secured a 23-17 win against their opponents in a match where the Fijiana Drua weighed down their dominance of the game with an iron fist from kick-off to full-time.“I really thank the girls for giving their effort, proud of them. Even the new girls that are coming in, (such as) the development players, so happy for them and yes we had a good result,” Naikore stated after the match.She set a mark of her own too with the fastest try in Super Rugby W, made just eight seconds after kick-off.While her dash for the try-line painted astonishment on the faces of those who witnessed it, she remained humble for the overall victory of the team.“First of all, I would like to thank the Lord for giving us the strength today. Yeah, it was a very good game for us, the Waratahs gave us a good game,” an elated yet breathless Naikore said.The vice-captain acknowledged the work of head coach and former Flying Fijian Ifereimi Rawaqa as a catalyst in the victory earned by the side.“Yes, I really think it was a good coach, he gave us what things (we needed) we have to play in the ground so yes he just said to play together as a team so yes we (the Fijiana Drua) are so happy,” Naikore expressed.The Fijiana Drua take...

title: Kerala ITI student undergoes multiple surgeries after violent classroom clash in Palakkad
content: Ottapalam (Kerala): A student of after being assaulted by a classmate. K.J. Sajan (20), a native of Shoranur, suffered a fractured nose and underwent two surgeries at a private hospital in Thrissur. Ottapalam police said a case has been registered against Kishore, a native of Palappuram, in connection with the incident. The assault took place on February 19 at 10 am inside a classroom. Both students are in the first year of their automobile engineering course. According to the complaint, Kishore grabbed Sajan while he was seated on a bench, leading to a scuffle. During the altercation, Kishore allegedly hit Sajan in the face, causing serious injuries. Sajan was initially taken to Ottapalam Taluk Hospital by his father's friend. Due to the severity of the injury, he was later shifted to a hospital in Thrissur. Doctors could not conduct an immediate specialist examination due to swelling near his nose. A subsequent check-up confirmed that his nose bridge was fractured. Sajan's father, Adv. K.A. Jayachandran said that the surgeries were performed on Friday. The procedures included septoplasty to correct the displacement of the nasal bridge and nasal bone reduction. Hospital authorities stated that Sajan is expected to be discharged on Monday. Police said the incident began as a casual exchange but escalated into a physical altercation. CCTV footage of the assault has been retrieved. A case for assault has been registered against Kishore, while he has also filed a complaint...

title: Journalism makes strong Kentucky Derby bid by winning San Felipe Stakes
creator: LA Times
content: The Kentucky Derby picture got more muddled after the penultimate series of races to determine which horses will make the starting gate at Churchill Downs on May 3. The big winner Saturday was Journalism in the Grade 2 $300,000 San Felipe Stakes at Santa Anita . The 3-year-old son of Curlin won his third straight race, beating the highly regarded Barnes , who was undefeated in two races going into the San Felipe. Journalism was comfortably rated in the middle of the five-horse field until the top of the stretch where he effortlessly blew past Barnes to win by 13⁄4 lengths. The remainder of the field, in order of finish, was Barnes, Rodriguez, Mellencamp and Smooth Cruisein . Berlin Wall scratched before the race. Read more: Will California ever approve Historical Horse Racing machines to help save the sport? “Obviously it’s nice to have a horse on the Triple Crown trail,” said winning trainer Michael McCarthy. “The connections have had a lot of success, there are some new people involved with the horse. It is always great to have a horse that can take you places and he looks like he is taking himself and everybody else with him. “I was fairly confident [Saturday]. I wouldn’t say I was overly confident, but I thought he was doing well enough to make some noise today. It is a little overwhelming to think of where this horse could go.” Jockey Umberto Rispoli also noted how easily the 3-year-old colt won. “He is the kind of horse that for the first furlong he needs to adjust...

title: Harrison Ford diagnosed with shingles, forced to step down as 2025 Oscars presenter: Report
content: Hollywood icon Harrison Ford will no longer be presenting at the 2025 Academy Awards after being diagnosed with shingles. According to Entertainment Weekly, the 82-year-old actor had to withdraw from his presenter duties after falling ill on February 29. Despite the setback, reports confirm that Ford is “doing OK” physically. His representatives have not yet released an official statement. Ford bows out due to health reasons Just days before his diagnosis, Ford attended the 2025 Screen Actors Guild (SAG) Awards, where he participated in a lighthearted skit alongside Shrinking co-star Jessica Williams. The duo shared an amusing moment on stage, with Williams teasing Ford for chewing food at an inopportune time. Also read: Billy Joel,75, falls mid-performance, sparks health concerns Shingles is a viral infection that causes a painful rash, but it is not life-threatening. Before his diagnosis, Ford was announced as one of the presenters for the prestigious event, alongside A-list names such as Gal Gadot, Zoe Saldaña, Andrew Garfield, Margaret Qualley, Samuel L. Jackson, Rachel Zegler, Alba Rohrwacher, and Dave Bautista. The ceremony will also see The View host Whoopi Goldberg return to the Oscars stage for the first time in nearly a decade. Other high-profile presenters include Halle Berry, Willem Dafoe, Lily-Rose Depp, Elle Fanning, Selena Gomez, Cillian Murphy, Bowen Yang, John Lithgow, Emma Stone, Ana de Armas, and Ben Stiller. title: DISCOVERING FIJI | Ratu Sukuna’s pool in Nadarivatu
creator: Ana Madigibuli
content: HERE is something quite mystical about the misty mountains of Nadarivatu and its dreamlike features intertwined with rich historical tales that captivate those who visit the highlands.Nestled in the mountaintops of the Colo-North territory, Nadarivatu’s history tells of a once thriving government administrative centre in the late 1800s that gradually became forgotten.Once known as a popular hill station and sanatorium, Nadarivatu has enthralled some of Fiji’s great leaders.These leaders include Fiji’s fifth governor, Sir John Bates Thurston, resident commissioner, Adolph Brewster and even the late statesman, Ratu Sir Lala Sukuna.Even though the mastermind behind the hill station was Sir John Bates Thurston, its groundwork was carried out by the then Colo-North and Colo-East resident commissioner, Adolph Brewster.Adolph Brewster, the eldest son of Paul Joske of Suva had founded the hill station and sanatorium as described in his book “The Hilltribes of Fiji”.Brewster’s father, Joske was a pioneer settler in Fiji and the famous Joske’s Thumb was named after him.Today, some of the sites from the old hill station still stands, acting as a tourist attraction to those who wish to experience that rustic side of Fiji.One of those historical sites is the swimming area for the late statesman, Ratu Sir Lala Sukuna. It was a place the late statesman visited often during his stay in Nadarivatu, especially during Fiji’s drier months.Situated within the Nadarivatu Forest Park boundary,...

The right to disconnect is becoming the right to sue
content: Copy link Copied Copy link Copied Subscribe to gift this article Gift 5 articles to anyone you choose each month when you subscribe. Already a subscriber? Login Most workers invoking the Albanese government’s new right to disconnect are using it to sue their employer over sackings or disciplinary decisions, including by not responding to misconduct allegations, the latest cases reveal. The Fair Work Commission told a Senate hearing last week that, since the right came into effect in August, four of the seven cases before the commission had been made under adverse action and dismissal laws. Three other cases involved a dispute over the right, while a fourth dispute had been withdrawn. title: Maruti Ertiga टॅक्स फ्री खरेदी करा, लाखोंची बचत होईल, जाणून घ्या
creator: एस. कुलकर्णी
content: तुम्हाला कार घ्यायची आहे का? कार घ्यायची आहे पण ती स्वस्तात हवी आहे का? त्यातही तुम्हाला 7 सीटर घ्यायची आहे का? या तिन्ही प्रश्नाची एकच खास ऑफर आम्ही तुम्हाला सांगणार आहोत. विशेष म्हणजे ही ऑफर तुम्हाला परवडणारी आहे. हो. आम्ही सत्य बोलत असून तुम्हाला या किफायतशीर ऑफरविषयी सांगणार आहोत.आज आम्ही तुम्हाला Maruti Ertiga 7 सीटर अगदी स्वस्तात खरेदी करण्याचा एक चांगला मार्ग सांगणार आहोत. विशेष म्हणजे तुमची यात 1.04 लाख रुपयांची बचत होऊ शकते. कॅन्टीन स्टोअर डिपार्टमेंटच्या (सीएसडी) कर्मचाऱ्यांना करात मोठी सूट मिळते. याविषयी पुढे जाणून घेऊया.भारतातील नंबर 1 बेस्टसेलर 7 एमपीव्ही Maruti Ertiga 7 सीटर ही कंपनी बऱ्याच काळापासून आपल्या सेगमेंटमध्ये आघाडीवर आहे. जर तुम्हीही या एमपीव्हीचे चाहते असाल आणि ते घरी आणू इच्छित असाल तर आज आम्ही तुम्हाला Maruti Ertiga 7 सीटर अगदी स्वस्तात खरेदी करण्याचा एक चांगला मार्ग सांगणार आहोत. त्यामुळे या कारवर तुम्हाला 28 टक्क्यांऐवजी फक्त 14 टक्के जीएसटी भरावा लागणार आहे. चला तर मग जाणून घेऊया काय आहे ही पद्धत.Maruti Ertiga सीएसडी प्राइसकॅन्टीन स्टोअर डिपार्टमेंटच्या (सीएसडी) कर्मचाऱ्यांना करात मोठी सूट मिळते. कार24 नुसार, सध्या Maruti Ertiga साठी कॅन्टीनची किंमत 7.89 लाख रुपये आहे. सिव्हिल मॉडेलची किंमत 8.84 लाख रुपये आहे. म्हणजेच सीएसडी दरानुसार तुम्ही प्रत्येक व्हेरियंटवर 95,000 रुपयांपर्यंत टॅक्स वाचवू शकता. जर तुम्ही सीएसडी दरानुसार ही कार खरेदी करण्यास पात्र असाल तर तुम्ही प्रत्येक व्हेरियंटवर 1.04 लाख रुपयांपर्यंत बचत करू शकता.भारतात अहमदाबाद, कोलकाता, मुंबई, दिल्ली अशा शहरांसह देशभरात एकूण 34 सीएसडी कॅन्टीन डेपो आहेत. ही सीएसडी कॅन्टीन भारत...

title: दूतावासको सेवा प्रभावकारी बनाउने दक्षिण कोरियाकी राजदूतको प्रतिबद्धता
content: दक्षिण कोरियाको लागि नेपाली राजदुत शिवमाया तुम्बाहाम्फेले दूतावासलाई प्रवासीसँग प्रत्यक्ष जोड्ने प्रतिबद्धता जनाएकी छन्। गैर आवासीय नेपाली संघ(एनआरएनए)को आयोजनामा भएको अन्तरक्रिया कार्यक्रममा बोल्दै राजदूत तुम्बाहाम्फेले कोरियामा रहेका नेपालीको समस्या समाधानका लागि आफूले अभिभाकीय भूमिका खेल्ने समेत बताइन्। 'मैले नेपाली समुदायका समस्यालाई नजिकबाट बुझ्ने प्रयास गर्दैछु। दूतावासलाई प्रवासी नेपालीहरूसँग अझ सशक्तरूपमा जोड्नु पर्छ,' उनले भनिन्, 'नेपाली श्रमिकहरूका हकहितका लागि कोरियाका विभिन्न निकायहरूसँग निरन्तर समन्वय गर्दै दूतावासका सेवा प्रवाहलाई प्रभावकारी बनाउन म केन्द्रित हुनेछु।' श्रम काउन्सिलर मैया कँडेलले नेपाली श्रमिकहरूको सुरक्षाका लागि दूतावासले आवश्यक सहयोग तथा परामर्श निरन्तर उपलब्ध गराउने प्रतिबद्धता जनाइन्। एनआरएनए दक्षिण कोरियाका अध्यक्ष बुद्धि गुरुङले प्रवासी नेपालीहरूका समस्याहरू समाधान गर्न एनआरएनए दक्षिण कोरिया दूतावाससँग सहकार्य गर्दै अगाडि बढ्ने बताए। कार्यक्रममा विभिन्न नेपाली संघसंस्थाका पदाधिकारीहरू, व्यवसायी, विद्यार्थी, श्रमिक, राजनीतिक दलका पदाधिकारी, एनआरएनए अभियन्ता तथा सामाजिक अभियन्ताहरूको उल्लेखनीय उपस्थिति रहेको थियो। सहभागीहरूले रोजगारी सुरक्षा, श्रमिक कल्याण, कानुनी सहयोग, भिसा र आप्रवासनसम्बन्धी मुद्दा, सामाजिक एकता, सांस्कृतिक, पर्यटन , विद्यार्थीका समस्या तथा दूतावास सेवामा सुधारको विषयमा आफ्ना जिज्ञासाहरू राखेका थिए।

title: テニス=ATXオープン、第1シードのペグラが決勝進出
content: [1日 ロイター] - 女子テニスのATXオープンは1日、米テキサス州オースティンでシングルス準決勝を行い、第1シードのジェシカ・ペグラ(米国)は決勝進出を果たした。 ペグラはアイラ・トムリャノビッチ(オーストラリア)と対戦。第1セットを6─1で手にすると、第2セットは4─6で落としたが、第3セットを6─3で制した。 もう1試合では第5シードのマッカートニー・ケスラー(米国)がヒリート・ミネン(ベルギー)を7─5、6─4のストレートで下した。

title: Ludhiana: Class 8 PSEB science exam an easy ride
content: The Punjab School Education Board (PSEB) conducted the Class 8 science exam on Saturday. Known to be a subject that often challenges students, this year’s science paper was a smooth ride for most examinees. Sonam Singh, a student of Ram Krishna Memorial Senior Secondary School, Tajpur Road, said that the paper was easy to solve. She said that out of four diagram-based questions, one was slightly tricky. The multiple-choice questions were simple, and some questions were even repeated from previous years’ exams. She expects to score around 70 out of 80 marks. Another student, Srishti, admitted that only a few questions from the chapter on Light were difficult, but the rest of the exam was straightforward and manageable. Suman, a science teacher at Government Senior Secondary School, Dhanansu, acknowledged that a few students might have struggled with the diagram-based questions, but overall, the exam was similar in difficulty to previous years.

title: Oscar 2025: Jurados admiten que NO VIERON CINTAS NOMINADAS a Mejor Película
creator: Jhosselyn Molero
content: Los premios de la Academia de Artes y Ciencias Cinematográficas , considerados la máxima distinción en la industria cinematográfica, han sido objeto de controversia una vez más. Recientemente, algunos votantes de los Premios Oscar 2025 han admitido que no vieron todas las películas nominadas antes de emitir su voto, lo que ha generado muchas críticas e indignación. En un artículo publicado por la revista Entertainment Weekly, varios directores anónimos compartieron sus opiniones y decisiones respecto a las nominaciones de este año, sin haber visto todas las películas por las que votarán. Uno de ellos confesó no haber visto ' La sustancia ' ni ' Aún estoy aquí '. Además, explicó que no logró terminar la primera entrega de ' Dune ' e, increíblemente, que -debido a su duración- ni siquiera tenía prisa en ver la segunda parte. “Todavía hay tiempo para reevaluar, pero me costó mucho. Conociéndome a mí mismo, esperaría votar por Anora o The Brutalist, pero una de ellas me pareció un poco tonta y la otra explotadora”, señaló el votante, que prefirió no revelar su nombre. Asimismo, otro director reconoció no haber visto ' Aún estoy aquí ', pero expresó su pesar por ello: “Pido disculpas a Fernanda Torres (por no haber visto su película). Tampoco vi ' La sustancia ', que es importante para esta categoría”, mencionó con suma incoherencia, al reflexionar sobre su voto en la categoría de Mejor Actriz. Aprovecha la NUEVA EXPERIENCIA, recibe por...

US pushes for Gaza truce on Ramadan: Israel agrees, Hamas insists on full ceasefire
content: Cairo: Israel has agreed to a US-backed proposal to extend the Gaza ceasefire through Ramzan and Passover, according to an official statement from Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s office. The proposal, presented by US envoy Steve Witkoff, aims to extend the current truce until April 20, allowing more time for negotiations on a permanent ceasefire and the release of remaining hostages. However, Hamas has rejected extending the first phase of the ceasefire and is demanding that discussions immediately shift to the second phase, which would involve a complete halt to hostilities and a full prisoner exchange. The Israeli statement outlines that under the new proposal, the ceasefire would continue through Ramzan and Passover, with half of the remaining hostages (both living and deceased) released on the first day. The rest would be freed only if an agreement is reached on a permanent ceasefire. Israeli officials argue that extending the ceasefire will provide an opportunity for further negotiations and prevent an immediate resumption of fighting. However, Hamas has rejected an extension of Phase 1 and insists that discussions move forward into Phase 2, which was originally agreed upon in January 2025. The militant group has called for the release of all hostages in a single exchange deal, along with guarantees of an end to Israeli military operations in Gaza. An unnamed Hamas official, quoted by Al Jazeera, stated that prolonging the first phase contradicts the original truce...

title: Suspect wanted for malicious mischief in Centralia
creator: KIRO
content: The Centralia Police Department is looking for a person suspected of malicious mischief. According to police, around 2:30 a.m. on Saturday, a person was caught on camera firing into the window of a business near 100 Harrison Avenue. Police do not know whether the weapon was a small caliber rifle, pellet or BB gun. If you have any information that can help identify the suspect you are asked to call 360-330-7680 or email Officer Alvarenga at aalvarenga@cityofcentralia.com or submit a tip anonymously on www.cityofcentralia.com/crimetips

title: 米 英語を公用語に指定する大統領令
content: トランプ大統領が英語をアメリカの公用語にする大統領令 非英語話者への言語支援提供義務も廃止へ アメリカのトランプ大統領は、英語をアメリカの公用語とする大統領令を発表しました。アメリカが連邦レベルで公用語を定めるのは初めてです。

title: Elon Musk and Shivon Zilis Announce Another Unique Baby Name
creator: Andrea Francese
content: Elon Musk is a father yet again. The controversial technology mogul has announced the arrival of his 14th child, and the news has undoubtedly turned heads. The baby’s name is especially interesting, but Musk is known for picking some pretty unique names for his offspring.Elon Musk and Shivon Zilis unveil unique baby nameElon Musk is the father of at least 14 children, but it doesn’t look like he’ll be running out of baby name ideas anytime soon. He is known for his unique baby name choices, and the name of his newest arrival is no different. Shivon Zilis, the child’s mother, announced the arrival of Seldon Lycurgus on X (formerly Twitter). While the duo didn’t go into detail about the meaning of the name, the Daily Beast suggests it’s a name that makes a statement. According to the outlet, Seldon likely refers to a character in a science fiction novel. Hari Seldon, the possible namesake, was a visionary. The novel series Foundations is also a TV show. The child’s middle name, Lycurgus, likely references the military-focused ancient Greek lawmaker, Lycurgus.Elon Musk | Andrew Harnik/Getty ImagesMusk and Zilis, who have a complicated and often mysterious relationship, already shared three children when Seldon arrived. They have similarly interesting names. The couple welcomed twins Strider and Azure in 2021. Their daughter, Arcadia, joined the family in 2024.Elon Musk has 10 other children, tooWhile Zilis only has the four children she shares with Musk, her co-parent has at...

title: 太田光 事務所のカジノ問題に言及
content: 太田光、タイタンのオンラインカジノ該当者発覚に言及 名前を公表しない意図も「必ず法的な責任を負って...」【ほぼ全文】 お笑いコンビ・爆笑問題・太田光が、2日放送のTBS系『サンデー・ジャポン』(前9:54)に出演。1日、所属事業所のタイタンがオンラインカジノ問題について内部調査をしたとし、該当者4人がいることが発覚したと報告したことについて言及した。自らの言葉で、事務所としての判断、該当者に対する対応などを伝えていった。

Arshdeep Singh comes in, Mohammed Shami rested: India's likely XI vs New Zealand in Champions Trophy 2025
content: Having already booked their seat in the semi-finals, India take on New Zealand in their final Champions Trophy 2025 Group A fixture, in Dubai on Sunday. New Zealand have also booked their seat in the semis, but the fixture will decide the final standings of Group A. They are currently top, level on points with India, but with a higher net run rate. They last met in an ICC global event at the 2023 ODI World Cup semi-finals, where India won at home. So that will serve as motivation for Rohit Sharma and Co., but historically, they have always found it hard against New Zealand in global events. India trail 5-10, and have lost to New Zealand in a WTC final and also at the 2019 ODI World Cup semi-finals, which also turned out to be MS Dhoni’s final international match. Also Read: ‘India could have complained that if we play in Pakistan...’: Uthappa brutally silences Champions Trophy venue controversy For the upcoming match, India are also expected to make 1-2 changes in their playing XI and give some key players rest. Against New Zealand, India are expected to go with their usual opening pair of skipper Rohit and Shubman Gill. Rohit was dismissed early against Pakistan, for 20 off 15 balls, and will look to make amends. On the other hand, Shubman Gill, who got a match-winning unbeaten ton vs Bangladesh, narrowly missed out on a half-century vs Pakistan. Virat Kohli will slot in at no. 3, and although there were question marks on his form, he proved his critics with a match-winning...

title: అమరావతి నిర్మాణ పనుల్లో వేగం.. రూ.1816 కోట్లతో హైకోర్టు, అసెంబ్లీ భవనాలు
content: ఆంధ్రప్రదేశ్‌లో ముఖ్యమంత్రి నారా చంద్రబాబునాయుడు నేతృత్వంలో టీడీపీ-జనసేన-బీజేపీ కూటమి ప్రభుత్వం అధికారంలోకి వచ్చిన తర్వాత రాజధాని అమరావతి నిర్మాణ పనులు మళ్లీ మొదలయ్యాయి. ఈ క్రమంలోనే తాజాగా ఏపీ అసెంబ్లీ, హైకోర్టులకు పర్మినెంట్ బిల్డింగ్‌లు నిర్మించేందుకు రాజధాని ప్రాంత అభివృద్ధి ప్రాధికార సంస్థ-సీఆర్‌డీఏ తాజాగా టెండర్లు పిలిచింది. ఈ రెండు భవనాలకు రూ.1816 కోట్లను అంచనా వ్యయంగా సీఆర్డీఏ అధికారులు నిర్ణయించారు. అయితే గత 5 ఏళ్ల పాటు పనులు చేయకపోవడంతో ఈ వ్యయం భారీగా పెరిగిందని పేర్కొన్నారు. శనివారం రోజున ఈ పనులకు బిడ్లు ఆహ్వనించగా.. ఈనెల 17వ తేదీ మధ్యాహ్నం 3 గంటల వరకు టెండర్లు దాఖలు చేసుకునేందుకు గడువు ఇచ్చారు. అదే రోజు సాయంత్రం 4 గంటలకు బిడ్లు తెరవనున్నారు. ఇక ఈ మొత్తం రూ.1816 కోట్ల అంచనా వ్యయంలో రూ.768 కోట్లతో ఆంధ్రప్రదేశ్ శాసనసభను నిర్మించాలని.. మరో రూ.1048 కోట్లతో ఏపీ హైకోర్టు భవనాలను నిర్మించేందుకు ఏజెన్సీల నుంచి బిడ్లు పిలిచారు. టెండర్లు దాఖలు చేసిన తర్వాత బిడ్‌లు తెరిచి ఆయా సంస్థల అర్హతలను పరిశీలించి ఖరారు చేయనున్నారు. ఏపీ అసెంబ్లీ బిల్డింగ్ విభిన్నంగా ఉండటంతో గుత్తేదారుల కోరిక మేరకు ఫోస్టర్స్‌ సంస్థతో ఇటీవల సీఆర్డీఏ వర్క్‌షాప్‌ కూడా నిర్వహించింది. బిల్డింగ్ ఆకృతులు, నిర్మాణ శైలిపై వారికి అవగాహన కల్పించింది. ఏపీ అసెంబ్లీ భవనాన్ని అమరావతి ప్రభుత్వ సముదాయంలోని సూపర్‌ బ్లాక్‌-ఈలో నిర్మించాలని నిర్ణయించారు. మొత్తంగా 103.76 ఎకరాల్లో.. 11.21 లక్షల చదరపు అడుగుల విస్తీర్ణంలో ఆంధ్రప్రదేశ్ శాసనసభ నిర్మాణం జరుపుకోనుంది. బేస్‌మెంట్, గ్రౌండ్‌ ఫ్లోర్‌తోపాటు 3 అంతస్తులతో అసెంబ్లీ భవనాన్ని నిర్మించనున్నారు. లండన్‌కు చెందిన ఫోస్టర్స్‌ సంస్థ ఏపీ అసెంబ్లీ బిల్డింగ్ నిర్మాణానికి సంబంధించిన...

title: Indonesians swindled by scams using President Prabowo deepfakes
L’anglais devient la seule langue officielle aux Etats-Unis, après un décret de Donald Trump
content: Jusque-là, les Etats-Unis ne reconnaissaient pas de langue officielle unique. Ce sera dorénavant le cas avec l’anglais après la signature d’un décret, samedi 1 er mars, par le président américain, Donald Trump. « Il est dans le meilleur intérêt de l’Amérique de désigner une – et seulement une – langue officielle » , explique le texte. « Ce décret rend hommage à la longue tradition de citoyens américains polyglottes qui ont appris l’anglais et l’ont transmis à leurs enfants pour les générations à venir » , est-il également écrit dans ce décret présidentiel, qui entend « promouvoir l’unité et entretenir une culture américaine commune à tous les citoyens » du pays. Le décret signé par le milliardaire républicain révoque au passage un autre texte de 2000, signé par le président Bill Clinton, qui avait pour but d’améliorer l’accès aux services publics pour « les personnes dotées d’une maîtrise limitée de l’anglais » . Concrètement, les agences fédérales n’auront plus l’obligation de fournir des services dans des langues autres que l’anglais, même si elles seront toujours autorisées à le faire. La version espagnole du site de la Maison Blanche toujours fermée La question de l’établissement d’une langue officielle aux Etats-Unis est un serpent de mer de la vie politique du pays. Au cours du siècle passé, de nombreuses propositions de loi sur le sujet ont échoué à être adoptées au Congrès. Plus de trente Etats ont déjà adopté des...

title: Dak Prescott on his hamstring rehab: I'll be ready when it matters
content: Dak Prescott’s right hamstring tore off the bone in a Week 9 game against the Falcons. He continues to rehab four months after season-ending surgery. Prescott told Patrik Walker of the team website that he is not fully cleared yet but healing. “I wouldn’t say I’m running full speed yet,” Prescott said Saturday, “but everything’s on the right track , and I’m excited.” It remains to be seen whether Prescott will return in time to participate in the offseason program. “I’m not going to put a timeline on it, but I’ll be ready for the first game, and when anything matters, and very, very ready,” Prescott said. “I’m feeling good. I’m doing more and more. The last two weeks have been huge and progressive for me.” The Cowboys likely will be deliberate in Prescott’s return, though the Cowboys have a new head coach and a new play caller in Brian Schottenheimer. Prescott has missed a total of 26 games the past five seasons with ankle, calf, thumb and hamstring injuries. He also had a shoulder injury that caused him to miss practice time in training camp in 2021.

content: , bintang , sedang berada di tengah sorotan setelah dirinya dilaporkan ragu-ragu menandatangani kontrak baru. Direktur olahraga Bayern Munich, Max Eberl, memberikan peringatan tegas bahwa tidak ada pemain yang lebih besar dari klub. Spekulasi mengenai masa depan Kimmich semakin memanas dalam 24 jam terakhir, terutama setelah Arsenal dikabarkan telah menghubungi pihaknya untuk membahas kemungkinan transfer musim panas ini. Advertisement Kontrak Kimmich di Allianz Arena akan berakhir pada akhir musim ini, memungkinkannya bernegosiasi dengan klub di luar Bundesliga. Bayern Munchen sebelumnya menawarkan perpanjangan kontrak tiga tahun kepada Kimmich, tetapi kabarnya tawaran itu ditarik karena sang pemain belum memutuskan masa depannya. Kini, Kimmich diberi tenggat waktu untuk memilih apakah akan bertahan atau mencoba tantangan baru di liga lain. Max Eberl, direktur olahraga Bayern Munchen, menegaskan bahwa tidak ada pemain yang lebih besar dari klub. Eberl menyatakan bahwa jika ada pemain yang merasa dirinya di atas klub, maka mereka akan dilepas. "Secara umum, tidak ada yang lebih besar dari klub," kata Eberl kepada Bild. "Jika seorang pemain memutuskan untuk pergi, maka itu keputusannya. FC Bayern akan tetap berjalan. Kami belum mencapai titik itu dengan Kimmich." Meski begitu, Bayern Munchen belum menutup pintu bagi Kimmich untuk bertahan. Mereka masih berharap sang gelandang memilih memperpanjang kontrak, meski mungkin dengan gaji yang lebih rendah dari yang diterimanya saat...

title: Hamas Shares Hostage Video Calling For Truce, Israel Says "Propaganda"
content: Israel snubbed as "propaganda" a video released by the Palestinian Hamas group of an emotional moment between two hostage brothers. Hamas asserted in the video that "time is running out" and only a ceasefire agreement will bring the hostages back, but Israel remained defiant. A statement from Israel Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's office said the hostages are being used for "psychological warfare" and the government will be undeterred by such tactics. "The Hamas terrorist organization has, this evening, disseminated another cruel propaganda video in which our hostages are forced to engage in psychological warfare. Israel will not be deterred by Hamas propaganda. We will continue to act relentlessly for the return of all of our hostages and until all objectives of the war are met," said the Prime Minister's Office. NDTV Exclusive: Not Muslims Or Christians - Another Syrian Ethnic Group Caught In Crossfire The three-minute video showed Israeli Argentinian brothers, Yair Horn and Eitan Horn, bidding goodbye shortly before the former was released on February 15. A third hostage, Sagui Dekel-Chen, who was also freed, was also seen in the video along with two others whose faces were blurred. In the video, Eitan is heard pleading with his family and friends to continue their protests and "do everything" to bring back the hostages. "This is not logical to separate families. Do not destroy our lives. Tell my mother, my father and everyone to continue demonstrations and do not...

title: フィギュア=世界ジュニア選手権、島田が男女通じて初の3連覇
content: [1日 ロイター] - フィギュアスケートの世界ジュニア選手権は1日、ハンガリーのデブレツェンで競技を行い、女子では16歳の島田麻央が男女を通じて初の3連覇を達成した。 島田はフリーでは冒頭のトリプルアクセル(3回転半ジャンプ)と4回転トーループを決めて、ショートプログラムに続いてトップに。自己ベストの合計230.84点をマークし、2位の韓国の選手に約40点差をつけて圧勝した。 16歳の中井亜美は合計185.89点で4位。15歳の和田薫子は合計181.65点で8位だった。

title: За сутки в Бурятии на пожарах погибли два человека
content: В Бурятии за сутки на пожарах погибли два человека. Как сообщили в региональном МЧС, в Улан-Удэ на улице Ивана Земнухова горел жилой дом. - В результате пожара поврежден дом на 35 «квадратах» с обрушением кровли. В ходе разбора конструкций здания под завалами был обнаружен 87-летний мужчина без признаков жизни, - сообщают спасатели. Причиной возгорания мог стать аварийный режим работы электросети. Другой пожар произошел в Гусиноозерске. Там горела одна из квартир многоэтажного жилого дома. Из здания самостоятельно эвакуировались восемь взрослых и двое детей. С верхних этажей звеном газодымозащитной службы спасено 19 человек, в том числе 4 ребенка. Пожар ликвидирован на 4 кв. м. Из горящей квартиры огнеборцы вывели 60-летнего мужчину. У него имелись признаки отравления продуктами горения. Пострадавшего доставили в больницу, вскоре медики констатировали его смерть. В МЧС отметили, что к пожару привело неосторожное обращение с огнем при курении. Автор:

title: 세계 상장사, 4분기 순이익 21% 증가... 美 최근 3년 중 최고치
creator: 홍승우
content: [사진=게티이미지] 지난해 4분기 세계 주요 상장기업들의 실적이 미국을 중심으로 크게 개선됐다. 2일 일본 니혼게이자이신문(닛케이)이 보도한 바에 따르면 미국, 일본, 유럽, 중국 등 주요국 상장사 약 1만8800개사의 결산 자료를 분석한 결과 순이익이 약 1조776억 달러(약 1576조원)로 전년 동기 대비 21% 증가했다. 이는 2021년 4분기 이후 가장 높은 수준이다. 분석 대상 기업들은 시가총액 기준으로 전 세계 상장사의 80%가량을 차지한다. 국가별로 보면 미국 기업들이 실적 개선을 주도했다. 미국 상장사의 순이익은 28% 증가하며 3년 만에 최고치를 기록했다. 특히 아마존 등 대형 기술 기업들의 실적이 두드러졌다. 미국 외 지역에서는 대만 TSMC를 포함한 아시아(중국과 일본 제외) 상장사의 순이익이 45% 늘어나며 가장 높은 증가율을 보였다. 일본 상장사는 11% 증가한 반면 유럽 기업들의 순이익은 7% 증가하는 데 그쳤다. 닛케이는 "4분기 호실적은 인공지능(AI) 관련 수요 증가 등이 미국 기업 실적을 끌어올린 영향"이라면서도 "미국 경제 성장 둔화 가능성이 여전히 존재해 증시에는 불안 요소로 작용할 수 있다"고 분석했다. #상장사 #미국 #시가총액 좋아요 0 화나요 0 추천해요 0 var prevMyType1 = "";var prevMyType2 = "";if(""==" on") { prevMyType1 = 1;} else if(""==" on") { prevMyType1 = 2;} if(""==" on") { prevMyType2 = 3;}// 뉴스 추천function fn_news_recommand1(news_id, recommand_type, type_bold) { $.ajax({ url: '/ajax/news_recommand', type:...

title: ススキノ首切断事件 被告一家の自宅は台所の蛇口から水が出なかった
content: 2023年7月、札幌市・ススキノのホテルで頭部を切断された男性の遺体が発見された事件。逮捕された親子3人のうち、殺人ほう助や死体損壊ほう助などの罪に問われている父・田村修被告(61)の 員 は、2月18日に結審した。検察は懲役10年を求刑しており、判決は3月12日に言い渡される予定だ。 修被告は2月4、5日の公判で、事件の顛末を詳細に語っていた。判決前に被告の主張を振り返る。 を傍聴したライターの普通氏がレポートする。【前後編の前編】 公判の冒頭、弁護人から被害者、遺族への言葉を求められた修被告は、こう述べた。 「この件により亡くなった被害者様、そのご家族、関係者をはじめ多くの方に取り返しのつかないご迷惑をかけたことを本当に申し訳なく思っております」 丁寧な言葉遣いなのだが、傍聴席で聞いているとどこか違和感があった。後に 長から「正直、感情が見えない」と指摘された通り、修被告の話し口は落ち着いているとも取れるが、非現実的な事件にいまだ茫然しているとも取れる。また厳しい表現をするならば、娘・瑠奈被告(31)が殺人罪に問われている事件なのに、他人事に感じられるほど淡々としすぎていると感じる口調、受け答えであった。 自宅が瑠奈被告の物で溢れ、寝床を確保できず事件当時はネットカフェなどで寝泊まりしていた修被告。それでも、毎朝のように自宅に寄ってから出勤をしていた。足の悪い母・浩子被告(62)の代わりに家庭ゴミを出し、頼まれた買い物の差し入れをしていたという。公判中、修被告が挙げた自宅の状況には驚かされた。 修被告「カーポートのキャンプ用品で湯を沸かして差し入れていました」 弁護人「家で、お湯を沸かすのは困難な状態だったのですか」 修被告「はい、物がたくさんあったので」 弁護人「そもそもキッチンから水は出るのですか」 修被告「蛇口の不具合で出ません。洗面台から水を持っていきます。野菜を洗うのも洗面台から水を持ってきます」 修理を依頼するにも「物をよけられないほど物が多い」と述べる通り、修理業者も呼べない。またボイラーも壊れていたという。そのような生活環境下で、少しずつ精神をすり減らしていたことが想像に難くない。 瑠奈被告と被害者男性の“初夜”が不本意な形となり、再会を懸念していた両親。浩子被告としては、引きこもりだった瑠奈被告の外出を喜ぶ一方で、暴力団を騙った脅迫文言を作成するなど、会わせたくない思いが強かった。しかし、修被告としては再度嫌な思いはしてほしくないと思いつつ、そこは「男女の問題なので」と、浩子被告とは少し温度差はあったように感じられる。 そして、事件は起きてしまう。7月2日午前3時、自宅にて修被告は瑠奈被告から「首を拾った」と聞かされる。しかし、それがどういうことか瑠奈被告には訊ねない。非現実的な発言に思考が追い付かなかったのかもしれない。 しかし、それ以降、自身の目で遺体を確認し、遺体が損壊される様子を目の当たりにしても、7月23日の逮捕日まで瑠奈被告を咎めたり、動機を訊ねることなどもいっさい行わなかった。 弁護人「なんでそういう会話がないんですか?」 修被告「普段から非現実的な答えが多く、通常会話が成立しにくい。いちいち確認する習慣がなくなっていました。諦めてしまっていました」 弁護人「どうしてこれ買うの? というのと、どうして殺した?...

title: DN liên quan Bamboo Capital và ông Nguyễn Hồ Nam vừa bị HNX tạm dừng lô trái phiếu 3.000 tỷ theo yêu cầu của Cơ quan Nhà nước
content: DN này vừa bất ngờ báo lỗ với "gánh nợ" 7.000 tỷ - gấp 3,5 lần vốn chủ sở hữu. Sở Giao dịch Chứng khoán Hà Nội (HNX) vừa thông báo về quyết định tạm ngừng giao dịch đối với lô trái phiếu HIC12103 của CTCP Đầu tư và Dịch vụ Helios - doanh nghiệp có liên quan đến ông Nguyễn Hồ Nam (cựu Chủ tịch HĐQT Bamboo Capital). Quyết định này được đưa ra theo yêu cầu của cơ quan nhà nước có thẩm quyền. Bị HNX tạm dừng lô trái phiếu 3.000 tỷ theo yêu cầu của Cơ quan Nhà nước Theo thông báo từ HNX, việc tạm ngừng giao dịch đối với trái phiếu HIC12103 (có mã công bố thông tin là HISCH2124001) sẽ có hiệu lực từ ngày 25/2/2025. Nguyên nhân cụ thể không được tiết lộ, chỉ biết rằng quyết định này dựa trên quy định tại điểm b khoản 1 Điều 12 Quy chế giao dịch trái phiếu doanh nghiệp riêng lẻ. Theo văn bản công bố thông tin chào bán trái phiếu của Helios, lô trái phiếu HISCH2124001 được phát hành ngày 23/6/2021, với mục đích tăng quy mô vốn hoạt động. Cụ thể là để thực hiện hoạt động mua bán sáp nhập công ty hoặc dự án bất động sản, và/hoặc hợp tác với các đối tác để phát triển các dự án bất động sản tiềm năng. Lô trái phiếu này của Helios có tổng giá trị 3.000 tỷ đồng với kỳ hạn ban đầu 36 tháng,...

title: Sacramento's Sabonis leaves game against Rockets in first quarter with hamstring injury
creator: Kristie Rieken, The Associated Press
content: HOUSTON (AP) — Sacramento’s Domantas Sabonis left Saturday night’s game against the Houston Rockets early in the first quarter with a hamstring injury and the team said he wouldn’t return. Sabonis was running down the court about a minute into the game when he pulled up and grabbed his left hamstring. Interim coach Doug Christie took a timeout and Sabonis was lifted from the game and taken to the locker room. The team announced that he had a hamstring injury and would miss the rest of the game. Sabonis entered the game averaging 19.9 points, 14.4 rebounds and 6.3 assists per game. ___ AP NBA: https://apnews.com/hub/nba Kristie Rieken, The Associated Press

title: 안산시의회, 2025년 의회 연구활동 심의위원회 열어
creator: 박재천
content: [사진=안산시의회] 경기 안산시의회가 최근 2025년도 의회 연구활동·운영 심의위원회를 열고, 올해 활동하는 3개 의원 연구단체 등록을 의결했다. 2일 시의회에 따르면, 지난 달 28일 의회 대회의실에서 진행된 연구활동 심의위원회에는 사전 등록신청서를 제출한 3개 연구단체 대표 의원들과 최진호 심의위원장을 비롯한 심의위원회 위원들이 참석했으며, 각각 제안설명과 심사를 진행한 결과, 3개 단체 모두 심사를 통과했다. 심의위원들은 연구 주제의 참신성 및 정책 연계, 연구 계획의 적정성, 연구활동비 산정의 적합 여부 등을 심의해 적합 판정을 내렸다. 등록된 의원 연구단체는 박은경 박태순 한갑수 한명훈 의원이 참여하는 ‘페어플레이 안산’과 현옥순 설호영 이진분 최찬규 의원이 뜻을 모은 ‘소소한 연구모임(소상공인 소득증대를 위한 연구모임)’, 그리고 황은화 선현우 유재수 이혜경 의원이 꾸린 ‘너와 나의 연결고리’다. googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1681949839646-0'); }); 관련기사 안산시의회, 박은정 의원 대한민국지방의정봉사대상 수상 [사진=안산시의회] 각각 안산시 직장운동경기부의 발전 방향 모색과 소상공인 소득증대 방안을 중심으로 안산시 상권 활성화를 통한 민생경제 안정화 방안에 관한 연구, 상호문화도시 안산의 사회적 통합으로 다문화 주민을 이방인이 아닌 이웃으로 받아들이기 위한 정책 연구 등을 그 수행 과제로 삼았다. 이들 단체의...

title: दररोज जेवल्यानंतर ‘हा’ पदार्थ खा आणि निरोगी आरोग्य जगा, जाणून घ्या फायदे....
creator: निर्मिती तुषार रसाळ
content: भारतीय स्वयंपाकघरांमध्ये अनेक विविध प्रकारच्या मसाल्यांचा वापर केला जाते. मसाल्यांमुळे जेवणाची चव वाढत नाही तर त्याचा तुमच्या आरोग्याला देखील खूप फायदा होतो. मसाल्यांमधील पोषक घटक तुमच्या शरीराला निरोगी ठेवण्यास मदत करतात. त्यामधील एक मसाला म्हणजे लवंग. आयुर्वेदानुसार, लवंग तुमच्या आरोग्यासाठी अत्यंत फायदेशीर मानली जाते. लवंगचा वापर तुमच्या आहारामध्ये हजारो वर्षांपासून केला जातो. अनेक पदार्थांमध्ये त्याची चव वाढवण्यासाठी लवंगचा वापर केला जातो. लवंगमध्ये भरपूर प्रमाणात अँटीऑक्सिडंट, अँटीबॅक्टेरियल आणि अँटी-इंफ्लेमेटरी गुणधर्म आढळतात ज्यामुळे तुम्हाला आजारांपासून लढण्यासाठी उर्जा मिळते.तज्ञांच्या मते, तुम्ही जेवणानंतर दररोज एक लवंग खाल्ल्यामुळे तुमच्या आरोग्याला अनेक फायदे होऊ शकतात. दररोज लवंग खाल्ल्यामुळे तुमचं आरोग्य निरोगी राहाते आणि शरीराला पोषण मिळण्यास मदत होते. लवंग खाल्ल्यामुळे तुमच्या शरीरातील अनालश्यक पदार्थ निघून जातात आणि तुमची रोगप्रतिकारकशक्ती वाढवण्यास मदत होते. तुमच्या शरीरातील रोगप्रतिकारकशक्ती वाढल्यामुळे तुम्हाला कोणत्याही प्रकारचा संसर्गाचा आजार होणार नाही. चला तर मग जाणून घेऊया दररोज लवंग खाण्याचे फायदे.पचनक्रिया सुधारते – लवंग तुमच्या पचनशक्तीसाठी फायदेशीर ठरते. लवंगमधील सक्रिय एंजाइम तुमच्या पोटाचे आरोग्य निरोगी ठेवण्यास मदत करते, ज्यामुळे गॅस, अपचन आणि आम्लपित्तची समस्या कमी होते. नियमित लवंग खाल्ल्यामुळे पोटाची जळजळ आणि सूज यापासून आराम मिळतो.रोगप्रतिकारकशक्ती वाढते – लवंगामध्ये असलेले अँटीऑक्सिडंट आणि अँटीव्हायरल गुणधर्म शरीराची रोगप्रतिकारक शक्ती मजबूत करतात, ज्यामुळे सर्दी आणि खोकला यांसारख्या हंगामी आजारांपासून आराम मिळण्यास मदत होते.दात आणि...

title: Disappointed, she almost throws her lottery ticket away, but changes her mind and wins $20 million. - Stewartville Star
サッカー=レーバークーゼン快勝、板倉のボルシアMGは完勝
content: [フランクフルト(ドイツ) 1日 ロイター] - サッカーのドイツ1部ブンデスリーガは1日、各地で試合を行い、2位レーバークーゼンがアイントラハト・フランクフルトに4─1で快勝した。 敵地に赴いたレーバークーゼンは前半26分、同29分と立て続けに2点を奪うと、同33分にもパトリック・シックが決めて7分間で3ゴール。その後1点を返されたが、後半17分にアレイクス・ガルシアがミドルシュートを決めて試合を締めくくった。 板倉滉と福田師王が所属するボルシアMGはハイデンハイムに3─0で完勝。板倉はフル出場し、福田はベンチ入りするも出場はなかった。佐野海舟がフル出場したマインツはライプチヒに2─1で勝利した。 三好康児所属のボーフムはホッフェンハイムに0─1で黒星。三好は後半30分から出場した。 24試合を終えて、レーバークーゼンは勝ち点53とし、首位バイエルン・ミュンヘンとの8ポイント差をキープした。マインツは同41で欧州チャンピオンズリーグ出場圏内の暫定4位に浮上。ボルシアMGは同37で8位、ボーフムは降格圏から2ポイント差の16位。
